channel.title: Action on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Action on Game Vibe

item.title: Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return Special Edition
item.description: Game Description Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return Special Edition is a special edition that offers a fresh look at the often overlooked sequel to the legendary platformer. The process of passing has been significantly simplified due to modern innovations. The save anywhere function is now available, eliminating the need to look for special places to record progress. There is also an option to rewind time, allowing you to undo an unsuccessful action or a missed jump.

item.title: Military Logistics Simulator
item.description: Game Description Military Logistics Simulator is a first-person simulator dedicated to managing the complex support mechanisms of modern armies. The project proposes to concentrate not on front-line battles, but on rear operations, on which the outcome of any armed conflict depends. Players will have to go through professional growth from an ordinary supply chain to an experienced quartermaster, taking full responsibility for organizing and protecting supply chains in hostile territory. The main goal is not the destruction of the enemy, but the systematic restoration of the war-torn region, including the rescue of the surviving population and the revival of critical infrastructure.

item.title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
item.description: Game Description Terminator 2D: NO FATE is an arcade action game, the plot of which is based on the events of the cult sci-fi action film, offering to relive iconic episodes in a 2D side-scroller format. Gamers take control of characters such as Sarah Connor and T-800, who will have to thwart the plans of Skynet’s artificial intelligence. The main enemy is the invulnerable T-1000, and the main task is to prevent the total destruction of humanity in the coming war.

item.title: Eternity Egg
item.description: Game Description Eternity Egg is a chaotic action-adventure platformer with a concept that harkens back to the 3D gaming era of the mid-90s. The visual component of the project deliberately uses stylized polygonal graphics with characteristic shiny surfaces, creating a distinctive and recognizable retro image. This bizarre world is inhabited by grotesque and sometimes awkward creatures, whose appearance perfectly complements the overall atmosphere of a surreal and unpredictable journey. An integral part of this experience is the high-energy electronic trance soundtrack, which sets a fast-paced and intense rhythm to everything that happens.

item.title: Bits and Bops
item.description: Game Description Bits and Bops is a collection of original rhythm challenges, with each challenge featuring its own soundtrack and unique characters. The gameplay involves hammering nails to the beat, capturing a photo of a rare sea creature, or synchronizing jumping on a handcar as mole miners to keep it moving. Other tasks include pairs skating on ice, where you have to match your partner’s movements to avoid falling, or hitting coins thrown by a monkey to aim them accurately at a suitcase.

item.title: Boxing Simulator
item.description: Game Description Boxing Simulator is a complex project that combines elements of a sports manager and a fighting game. The basis of the gameplay is the creation and development of your own training room, which includes the purchase of a variety of equipment, from boxing rings to weight training equipment. Management also involves recruiting new athletes every day, each with a unique set of characteristics such as health, strength and speed.

item.title: Dunjungle
item.description: Game Description Dunjungle is a 2D game where gamers take on the role of a monkey tasked with protecting the jungle from a corrupting force. The gameplay is a mixture of exploration, combat and survival. Each dungeon that users encounter transforms with each playthrough, creating a unique experience every time. Such a dynamic environment forces gamers to be on alert. One moment you might be faced with a swarm of unusual enemies, and the next you might find yourself walking through treacherous traps.

item.title: Mutant Football League 2
item.description: Game Description Mutant Football League 2 is a brutal arcade reimagining of American football, where athletes are replaced by teams of orcs, skeletons and deadly robots. The project is an ideological continuation of the cult classic, relying not on realism, but on dark humor and spectacular matches in the 8 vs 8 format. Each arena is a high-danger zone filled with circular saws, mines and other deadly traps. Unpredictability is also introduced by sudden events that can radically change the balance of power during the competition.

item.title: NeverAwake FLASHBACK
item.description: Game Description Delving into the surreal world of subconscious nightmares, NeverAwake FLASHBACK offers a confrontation with distorted childhood memories. The project’s universe is filled with grotesque opponents, which are materialized phobias. The monsters are not demons, but hated vegetables, frightening dentists and other traumatic images from the past of the young heroine named Rem. On this dangerous journey through the recesses of consciousness, she is accompanied by her faithful plush companion Gabe-chan.

item.title: 16 Cyber-Personalities: Survivors
item.description: Game Description 16 Cyber-Personalities: Survivors is a dynamic top-down roguelight shooter, the arena of which is the protagonist’s subconscious. The concept is based on the MBTI personality typology, which is reflected in the key mechanics. The gamer controls four elemental spirits, each of which symbolizes certain character traits. The process of their improvement occurs through unique branches of pumping, which allows you to turn elementals into powerful companions. The main task is to repel the attacks of sinister forces hiding in the depths of the mind.

item.title: Angeline Era
item.description: Game Description Angeline Era is a 3D adventure in which former soldier Tetsu Kinoshta must find the truth in a chaotic world. Together with the angel Arcas Gemini, he must break through the storm hiding the angels' mothership, the Throne, to uncover its secrets and determine the future. Traveling through the lands of Era, inhabited by people, angels and fairies, is permeated with an atmosphere of betrayal and unfulfilled desires. To achieve the goal, the heroes will have to explore many locations, from primeval forests and treacherous mountains to abandoned mines and ruins with traps.

item.title: Dungeon Rampage
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Rampage is a cooperative action role-playing game in which groups of up to 4 adventurers go into dangerous dungeons to destroy monsters and search for treasure. The project offers a choice of 8 unique heroes with distinctive fighting styles, from the classic Berserker to the exotic Combat Cook. A deep customization system allows you to fine-tune your characters to suit your preferences, using hundreds of equipment options and skills.

item.title: HELL OF FEAR: Mind Breach
item.description: Game Description HELL OF FEAR: Mind Breach is a sci-fi project with horror elements, where the main task is to preserve life in the oppressive environment of an underground scientific center on a distant planet. Exploration of this large-scale facility, consisting of 26 separate compartments, requires extreme caution, as any area contains lethal threats and hidden secrets. The chances of survival are determined by careful management of supplies and careful tactics in confrontations with the monstrous creatures generated by the complex.

item.title: Bober Bros No Means Nothing
item.description: Game Description Bober Bros No Means Nothing is about violation of personal space and silent horror born from awkward pauses and hostile glances. The narrative places the hero in an oppressive atmosphere, where a mundane work shift at the packaging turns into a test of strength due to a colleague who constantly tests other people’s boundaries. Attempts to relax at home also turn into failure due to noise from the neighboring apartment and mysterious holes in the walls.

item.title: Deadly Delivery VR
item.description: Game Description Deadly Delivery VR is a cooperative virtual reality horror game in which the main goal is to transport cargo through dangerous, procedurally generated mines. The project involves full physical interaction with the environment and other characters, and the implementation of spatial sound and distance-based voice chat enhances the immersion effect. The process of delivering packages takes place in completely dark tunnels inhabited by various hostile entities. Successfully completing a shift requires couriers to move stealthily, make quick dashes and be constantly vigilant in order to avoid unwanted encounters with dungeon dwellers who can not only steal valuable cargo, but also take lives.

item.title: Pawn Planet
item.description: Game Description In Pawn Planet you will plunge headlong into the crazy world of an interstellar pawn shop. Forget dusty earthly stores; it’s a galaxy filled with strange clients and even stranger objects. Here you will have to test your customer service skills by dealing with grumpy Glurgs and outrageous Zilarians who are eager to make a sale or a profitable deal. But in “Planet of Pawns” you need to do more than just bargain.

item.title: Cloudheim
item.description: Game Description Cloudheim is a cooperative action role-playing game where the main task for a group of up to 4 adventurers is the revival of lands destroyed during Ragnarok. The physical combat system allows you to throw opponents into the air for long combos. A completely destructible environment becomes not just decoration, but a tactical tool for inflicting additional damage on enemies. The process of creating equipment and weapons is integrated directly into the gameplay, allowing you to craft items without having to stop at the menu.

item.title: Eufloria Classic
item.description: Game Description Eufloria Classic is a strategic project whose main goal is to colonize asteroids with the help of living organisms. The basis of expansion is the cultivation of special units called seedlings, whose production is established on unique Dyson trees. The essence of the process is to direct a swarm of these creatures towards hostile asteroids. Their task is to reach the core of a celestial body and subjugate it, which requires refined tactical maneuvers and competent distribution of available resources.

item.title: FEROCIOUS
item.description: Game Description FEROCIOUS is an atmospheric adventure in a lost prehistoric world inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs. The main character learns a story about sea monsters and missing sailors who visit the mysterious fog over the Pacific Ocean. There is a distress signal from a group of investigative journalists that lead the protagonist to the territory of a tropical island located among a foggy cloud. The hero will make his way through the jungle, facing large and predatory monsters.

item.title: ROUTINE
item.description: Game Description ROUTINE begins with an exploration of a silent lunar base, an object built according to the canons of ideas about the future from the 80s. The initial search for information quickly gives way to the direct need to survive in the face of an unknown threat. A hostile presence confronts the player, identifying them as the main danger inside the abandoned complex. The tension mounts as they realize their complete isolation and the fact that every shadow may hide mortal danger.

item.title: Titans of the Past
item.description: Game Description Titans of the Past is a role-playing project with tactical elements, in which the main goal is the development of your own settlement. The construction and improvement of buildings requires resources obtained during risky forays. Each adventure is a procedurally generated route consisting of various nodes: dungeons, rest camps, trading points and unexpected events. Such a metaprogression system allows you to invest the received materials in the city even after unsuccessful expeditions, gradually opening up access to new opportunities for subsequent batches of heroes.

item.title: Kingdom of Night
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere in Kingdom of Night takes gamers to the streets of Watford, where night demons live. The game is an isometric role-playing adventure game made in the style of retro projects of the 80s. The plot takes place in the eighties, where a mysterious satanic cult appears in Arizona. Cultists call upon the ancient evil Baphomet, which begins to dominate the town of Watford, attacking civilians.

item.title: Scrabdackle
item.description: Game Description Scrabdackle stands out for its visual style. All graphics in this project were drawn by hand. She mixes pencil drawings with pixel art. Externally, the indie title is reminiscent of early flash games. The video game itself is an adventure game with elements of RPG, Metroidvania and action. The camera in it is located at the top and at an angle. The player controls a magician. He has inventory and a spell book.

item.title: She's Leaving
item.description: Game Description Shes Leaving is about the constant feeling of being stalked and the fine line where the prey and the hunter change places. The project offers to immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror with a first-person view, where survival directly depends on stealth and ingenuity. Confronting an unrelenting enemy poses a difficult choice: confront the threat head-on or flee for your life, using only a stun gun for self-defense that provides a brief respite.

item.title: Simogo Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Simogo Legacy Collection is an anthology of 7 classic projects, representing an eclectic collection of works from the past. In addition to the main works, the publication is supplemented by an extensive archive of rare materials. Among them you can find a digital book, an audio drama in podcast format, as well as previously unreleased musical compositions. Of particular interest are game prototypes and interactive storytelling, which allow you to look at the creative process from the inside.

item.title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
item.description: Game Description MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is a side-scrolling beat ‘em up focused on interstellar conflict. The player will have to choose from 15 heroes to confront the Annihilation Wave, a force threatening the galaxy under the leadership of Annihilus. The story takes place in a variety of locations, starting on Earth, such as New York, and extending into space, including the Negative Zone. Figures like Nova, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Phyla-Vell and Captain America are among the available protagonists to join the efforts against this galactic menace.

item.title: One Last Raid
item.description: Game Description One Last Raid is an action RPG with roguelike elements, where the main goal is to survive 20 rounds in a closed arena. Successful completion of a full cycle of tests guarantees the preservation of all obtained equipment for subsequent races. However, any death of the protagonist leads to the permanent loss of all progress made during the current session. To minimize risks, it is possible to leave the battle early after every fifth stage, securing the trophies received.

item.title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
item.description: Game Description Ayasa: Shadows of Silence is about a poetic journey through the depths of conscience, where the main confrontation unfolds within the personality itself. The process of progressing through the story is a combination of exploring six surreal worlds, solving puzzles and episodes requiring survival. Control is entrusted to a girl named Ayasa, who will have to master special talents to navigate the treacherous environment and interact with interactive elements.

item.title: Death In Abyss
item.description: Game Description Death In Abyss becomes a real test of strength for connoisseurs of intense shooters, because the project requires honed reflexes and virtuoso control of the combat apparatus. The flight system is designed for the fast maneuvers, including evasive maneuvers and sharp turns, needed to survive high-dynamic collision environments. Confrontation with hostile life forms is based on the use of a powerful arsenal. Each successful elimination of an enemy allows you to absorb his vital energy to restore your own reserve of strength, which forces you to constantly be on the move and conduct an aggressive battle.

item.title: Mechanical Fury - Prologue
item.description: Game Description Mechanical Fury - Prologue is a fast-paced shooter, the plot of which is built around revenge on the sinister Doctor Adrian. The story begins with the protagonist losing his arm, in place of which the antagonist installs a multifunctional grappling hook. Now the protagonist, with the support of his girlfriend, will have to thwart the villain’s plans to activate the Second Armageddon. To do this, it is necessary to completely eliminate his army of machines scattered throughout the Forbidden Island.

item.title: Bloodface
item.description: Game Description Bloodface is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in a cruel medieval world engulfed in the flames of civil war. The protagonist will have to restore order using a merciless combat system with an emphasis on close combat. There is complete freedom to choose tactics: from secretly eliminating enemies to violent head-on collisions. An extensive arsenal of all kinds of weapons and a variety of combat techniques allow you to choose your individual style of play.

item.title: No, I'm not a Voenkom
item.description: Game Description No, I’m not a Voenkom is a psychological thriller whose plot revolves around a sudden invasion of personal space. A sharp knock on the door becomes a catalyst for a whole series of tense events that test the protagonist’s endurance. Every interaction with the outside world becomes a difficult choice between trying to remain safe and risking succumbing to destructive curiosity. The oppressive atmosphere of an old apartment, where the air is saturated with the smell of dust and paint, increases the feeling of isolation.

item.title: Ragnar
item.description: Game Description Ragnar is a roguelike game set in Norse mythology, where the main goal is to confront the god of deception Loki and his attempt to change the fate of Ragnarok. A system of dynamic progression and permanent improvements allows you to become more powerful with each new foray into changing worlds. You can combine divine blessings, abilities, and legendary weapons to create your own fighting style. For example, you can combine the power of Tyr’s Spear of Justice with Freya’s Phantom Ambush, forming unique tactical combinations to crush your enemies.

item.title: Afallon
item.description: Game Description Afallon is a high fantasy role-playing game in which the world constantly evolves in response to the actions of the protagonist. Completed tasks forever change the appearance of settlements and camps, opening new paths or changing existing locations. As the hero’s power grows, the level of threat also increases: the usual opponents are replaced by stronger enemies, maintaining the difficulty at the current level. Changing the time of day directly affects the environment - at night, merchants go to bed, and bandits and ghosts appear on the roads.

item.title: Ars Notoria
item.description: Game Description Ars Notoria is a world of fantasy adventure where you are free to explore open spaces and hunt powerful possessed creatures. In this survival RPG, you can defeat the baddies alone or team up with friends to create your own faction of adventurers. Start your journey as a simple poor man, but using the magical ability “Bind Souls”, take control of unique adventurers, each of whom has their own special skills and weapons.

item.title: Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons is a colorful adventure with roguelike elements set in a whimsical world made entirely of sweets. The gameplay revolves around exploring ever-changing dungeons and castles filled with dessert-shaped enemies. From the treasures found, special ingredients are obtained that are necessary to enhance the abilities of the main character. Repeated completion of levels allows you to accumulate resources for learning new skills, opening access to previously inaccessible areas.

item.title: Duil
item.description: Game Description Duil is a side-scrolling action platformer. The player takes control of Duil, a mysterious knight. The mysterious and hostile world hides multiple secrets and surprises. The central character will face monsters, bosses and minions of the dark lord. The protagonist will fight, get new equipment and upgrade his own skills. The plot begins with an army of evil spirits invading the Kingdom of Targat. Commander-in-Chief Vezruvil decides to attack peaceful lands and enslave them.

item.title: Hail to the Rainbow
item.description: Game Description Hail to the Rainbow puts users in the shoes of Ignat, a young man navigating the harsh post-apocalyptic world of cyberpunk Russia. Having grown up alone after losing his parents, Ignat knows what he needs to do to survive. His life in this grim reality becomes routine until an unexpected email changes everything, sending him down a path of uncertainty and discovery. In an environment where survival is key, the title invites gamers to explore a chaotic world, piecing together its fragments and uncovering secrets hidden in the ruins of the past.

item.title: Infinite Lives
item.description: Game Description Infinite Lives is a shared universe where superhumans and subhumans wage an ongoing struggle for total control over the metropolis. The protagonist must forge his own origin story in a city plagued by supernatural violence. In this endless cycle, one must either gain powers beyond the human, or lose the remnants of the spirit, turning into something worse. Hundreds of other heroes and villains also lay claim to dominance, using their unique talents to conquer every corner of the map.

item.title: Street Racer Collection (QUByte Classics)
item.description: Game Description Street Racer Collection (QUByte Classics) is a hybrid of arcade racing and combat competitions, where reaching the finish line is just one part of success. The main way to interact with opponents is not just overtaking, but direct physical elimination using special techniques. You can control a dozen colorful pilots, each of whom has a vehicle with unique attack capabilities. Competitions take place on routes full of dangers, running through both recognizable landmarks and completely fantastic areas.

item.title: AFTERBLAST
item.description: Game Description AFTERBLAST is a fast-paced first-person shooter with rogue-lite elements that takes you on an epic journey across a devastated planet. As you progress through randomly generated dungeons, you’ll encounter hordes of monsters and bosses, and you’ll need dozens of guns and other weapons to defeat them. In this world, chaos came without warning and wreaked havoc on the once beautiful planet of Aryasan. The skies dimmed, the vegetation withered, and animals began to attack each other as resources dried up.

item.title: Brotherhood
item.description: Game Description Brotherhood is a first-person shooter game about escaping from a secret scientific facility. The main character is an experimental subject whose body turned out to be immune to a dangerous mutagen. This substance not only did not harm him, but also endowed him with almost invulnerability, turning into a source of strength. The protagonist will have to fight his way to freedom through the dark corridors of an ancient prison located in the mountains of Switzerland.

item.title: Cowboy Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cowboy Life Simulator will take players to the Wild West of the 19th century and allow them to master the life of a cowboy, taking care of his family and daily fighting the dangers that the environment presents. The most powerful enemy is hunger. But the hero is not going to put up with everyday life and craves adventure. But the protagonist is not some experienced warrior or the best shooter in the Wild West, so other important farming tasks await him.

item.title: A.I.L.A
item.description: Game Description A.I.L.A is a first-person psychological horror game set in a near future where immersive technology blurs the line between reality and simulation. The main character is Samuel S, the only video game tester whose task is to test the capabilities of revolutionary artificial intelligence. The system analyzes the user’s deepest fears in order to create unique and truly frightening virtual scenarios based on them. An artificial intelligence known as AILA physically manifests itself in the form of a charismatic British teenager and begins to gradually permeate every aspect of Samuel’s life.

item.title: Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward
item.description: Game Description Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward is a strategic project in which each new playthrough poses unique tactical challenges to the gamer. The core of the gameplay is constant adaptation to increasing challenges, requiring refined skills and flexible thinking. To enhance your capabilities during battles, you will have to collect over 100 different relics, the combinations of which provide access to unique fighting styles. Even defeat does not mean the end, since the guardian of dreams becomes stronger after each failure, which allows him to overcome increasingly difficult challenges and build a perfect line of defense against monsters.

item.title: Slyders
item.description: Game Description Slyders is about going from newbie to god of destruction in short 15-minute runs where you have to go it alone against insane hordes of demons. The battlefield is rapidly filled with a barrage of shells, transforming what is happening into a real hell of bullets across vast locations. To survive in the epicenter of this chaos, you need to wisely use an extensive system of improvements, combining dozens of active and passive abilities.

item.title: TORMENTOR
item.description: Game Description TORMENTOR takes you on a journey through the twisted mind of a maniac. Take on the role of a ruthless torturer who has taken over an abandoned prison filled with victims sentenced to death. As the game progresses, you will struggle with a developing mental illness that robs you of your memories and causes dangerous episodes of fainting. To keep your mind under control, you’ll work with an organized crime group that operates on the dark web to obtain an experimental sanity-preserving drug for you.

item.title: Constance
item.description: Game Description Constance is about creative burnout and the struggle with inner demons, embodied in an action-platformer format. The main character, an artist named Constance, finds herself trapped in a colorful but fading inner world. Armed with a brush, she must confront her own fears and mental blocks, which have taken the form of hostile creatures and mysterious characters that reflect aspects of her psyche. The key mechanic that determines the gameplay is the Corruption system.

item.title: Of Ash and Steel
item.description: Game Description Of Ash and Steel is a role-playing adventure in an open world, where the center of the story is not a famous warrior, but an ordinary cartographer. His name is Tristan, and he finds himself on the bleak island of Greyshaft after a shipwreck caused by a cataclysm called the Blight. Being a person not accustomed to battles, the protagonist is forced to adapt to harsh realities and learn to survive in a lawless world.

item.title: DYSTHANASIA
item.description: Game Description DYSTHANASIA is a depressing project, plunging into an atmosphere of total despair and madness. The setting is a gloomy research complex, where the main character comes to her senses within the walls of a cold morgue. The surroundings, with uncured bloodstains and unidentified remains of flesh, clearly hint at a recent tragedy. The space is filled with inhuman moans emitted by grotesque creatures that mercilessly pursue the protagonist. Any mistake in this hostile world leads to instant and cruel death.

item.title: Maktala: Slime Lootfest
item.description: Game Description Maktala: Slime Lootfest is an incremental project in which each battle opens up new ways to destroy countless hordes of opponents. To fine-tune and improve your character, a system for mining ore and processing precious stones is provided, allowing you to adapt the style of play to your liking. Significant support in battles is provided by a faithful archer, who independently enters the battle and exterminates enemies, being next to the main character.

item.title: Daisen
item.description: Game Description Daisen is a fast-paced first-person shooter that tells the story of the fate of a girl who finds herself at the center of a mysterious anomaly spreading. The protagonist is Emilia Svitanko, an ordinary girl who inevitably becomes a tool for containing chaos. She will have to figure out the reasons for the anomalous influence that has engulfed the surrounding lands. A key feature of the combat system is the complete absence of ammunition and reloading.

item.title: Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment
item.description: Game Description Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment is an action RPG whose combat system offers a comprehensive approach to destroying enemies. Gamers are given the opportunity to throw opponents into the air and then perform long aerial combinations, which allows them to accumulate a special scale. Filling this meter will activate temporary buffs that can change the outcome of the battle. In addition, the arsenal of techniques includes parries and attacks from behind, which open up access to devastating charged strikes.

item.title: ZAKO NO AHIRU
item.description: Game Description ZAKO NO AHIRU is a 2D platformer of increased difficulty, the main goal of which is to conquer an inaccessible peak to the accompaniment of caustic comments. Every action is tirelessly watched by a girl named Sugaki Mary, who lives next door. She’s ready to make a caustic remark or an inappropriate joke at any time, using an arsenal of more than 800 fully voiced lines. The reward for your patience and skill will be one of 7 endings, each of which represents a unique surreal situation, reminiscent of a dream.

item.title: Cleared Hot
item.description: Game Description Cleared Hot is an arcade helicopter shooter in which the laws of physics become the main weapon in the hands of the pilot. The story follows a combat veteran who, after leaving the army, lives a secluded life in a Texas trailer. Having received an old helicopter at his disposal, he returns to the sky again, where he will face numerous opponents. The combat vehicle is equipped not only with machine guns and missiles, but also with a unique cable and magnet system that allows you to interact with the environment.

item.title: Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road
item.description: Game Description Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road means constantly fighting, strengthening and collecting resources on a desperate journey to the saving Arch. The basis of all gameplay is the defense of a constantly moving fortified city, which represents the last stronghold of civilization. On his way, merciless hordes of monsters stand in their way, seeking to wipe out this mobile shelter from the face of the earth. Survival directly depends on the ability to repel attacks from both small monsters and giant bosses that threaten the integrity of the tower.

item.title: Morphos
item.description: Game Description Morphos is a psychological horror in which the line between reality and madness is blurred within the walls of a mysterious scientific complex. Exploring the dark underground corridors involves solving numerous puzzles and confronting anomalous phenomena. The space around is constantly changing, turning into intricate labyrinths and distorting the usual perception. Survival will require stealthy movement, competent management of resources and the use of various types of weapons for self-defense from monsters.

item.title: Neon Inferno
item.description: Game Description Neon Inferno is a hybrid side-scroller whose gameplay is an explosive combination of 2D run-and-gun and gallery shooter. The basis of the combat system is the ability to fire at opponents who are simultaneously in the foreground and in the background. Tactical depth is provided by the Bullet Time mechanic, which allows you to deflect enemy projectiles, as well as the ability to hijack vehicles to pursue targets.

item.title: S.E.M.I. – Side Effects May Include...
item.description: Game Description SEMI – Side Effects May Include is a cooperative action game for 1-4 players, in which the main goal is to escape from a special hospital. Experimental drugs are the main tool for survival and at the same time a source of chaos. After taking the pill, the patient gains superpowers, but along with them, completely unpredictable side effects. Well-coordinated teamwork becomes the key to success, because at any moment the situation can get out of control.

item.title: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up
item.description: Game Description WAR RATS: The Rat em Up depicts the Great Rat War, plunging gamers into conflict with armies of TechnoRats. In this world inhabited exclusively by rats, the TechnoRat entity, a unified consciousness of cyborg rodents, seeks to consume all organic matter and turn it into metal structures. The gameplay features side-scrolling combat where you must fight alongside hired troops to reclaim the land of Ratopia. The task is to push back enemy forces and seize a bridgehead at the enemy base.

item.title: BIRDCAGE
item.description: Game Description BIRDCAGE is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter where gameplay focuses on unique sword mechanics to fend off attacks and destroy enemies. The project takes inspiration from the arcade classics of the 90s, offering a polished combat system and stylized graphics. The pilot is required not only to dodge hundreds of projectiles, but also to actively use the blade to break through enemy squadrons. The title requires high concentration and sharp reflexes to survive in the chaos of battles.

item.title: Brush Burial: Gutter World
item.description: Game Description Brush Burial: Gutter World is a dark, immersive simulator that revolves around completing missions across four carefully crafted and interconnected locations. The narrative structure offers one Great Contract and three Minor Contracts, encouraging repeated exploration of levels to experiment with tactics to eliminate opponents. Successfully completing challenges and progressing unlocks access to dozens of unique cosmetic items, including unique outfits for the main character, which significantly increases the replayability of the project.

item.title: Christmas Story
item.description: Game Description Christmas Story not only creates a deceptive feeling of festive warmth, but also immerses you in a chilling story where the line between fiction and reality is rapidly blurring. The narrative is transformed under the influence of the actions and choices of the gamer himself, turning a cozy Christmas night into a real nightmare. The symbols of the holiday familiar from childhood take on sinister features, and the crackling of wood in the fireplace gives way to oppressive silence.

item.title: Mara
item.description: Game Description Mara is about a daring robbery of an ancient tomb, recently discovered by a group of archaeologists far from prying eyes. The events take place in the vicinity of an abandoned mine located near the city, in the depths of which a tomb with priceless relics is hidden. The main character, being an experienced thief, receives an order from a buyer of stolen goods to steal these artifacts for their subsequent sale.

item.title: Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault
item.description: Game Description Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault challenges the player to explore procedurally generated dimensions to collect valuable relics while confronting hostile creatures. Once in the village of Tresna, the gamer alternates forays into dungeons with commerce. Such trips present a balance of risk and reward: deep exploration of locations promises more treasures, but also carries the risk of losing all the collected goods. Survival requires overcoming these dangers to return with a backpack full of artifacts to sell.

item.title: Winter Survival Simulator
item.description: Game Description Winter Survival Simulator is a hardcore first-person survival game that offers you to experience the severity of the winter climate. Finding yourself in the snow-capped mountains, there is nowhere to wait for help. You need to rely only on your own strength. Try to survive. Find shelter and wait for rescuers. The action takes place in the mountains of Washington State. With only limited supplies on hand, battle the cold in the wild.

item.title: Fatal Claw
item.description: Game Description Fatal Claw is a dark 2D metroidvania that asks you to take control of a mysterious cat named Keesha, resurrected after death. The protagonist will have to master a combat system based on the use of mystical claws to confront the terrible creatures that have infested the underground world. As you progress, new mutant abilities are unlocked, allowing you to climb walls, make rapid dashes, and even soar in the air.

item.title: Morsels
item.description: Game Description Morsels is a roguelite action game with elements of creature collecting, offering dynamic battles from a top-down view. The basis of the gameplay is the use of mystical cards that allow you to take on the appearance of creatures of the same name. Players have access to a deck of 3 cards, which they can switch between at any time to tactically adapt to the situation. Each creature has a unique set of attacks, dodges, and special abilities, adding variety to the combat system.

item.title: SpaceBourne 2
item.description: Game Description The events of SpaceBourne 2 begin from the end of the first part, only now the player needs to build his own space empire and develop it in all directions. However, there is no need to rush with this global task. The game world is completely open to exploration of each solar system, where the user can first become famous or, on the contrary, become an enemy, and then make it easier for themselves to establish diplomatic relations.

item.title: Claire a la Mode
item.description: Game Description Claire a la Mode is a global pastry tournament where not only the prestigious title of best baker, but also the fate of an entire city is at stake. This grand competition is marred by the presence of dishonest participants who seek to falsify the final results. At the head of the conspiracy is the insidious Queen Bee, whose numerous henchmen are actively trying to interfere with honest confectioners.

item.title: Forestrike
item.description: Game Description Forestrike is a tactical kung fu fighting game with a supernatural element, built on the unique ability to predict the outcome of a battle. The project proposes to hone your skills in mental duels before entering into a real fight. Using the gift of Foresight, the hero can repeatedly play out various battle scenarios in his mind, finding the only correct sequence of movements for victory. However, in a real conflict, any mistake is fatal, because defeat means having to start the whole journey from the very beginning.

item.title: Have You Seen This Man?
item.description: Game Description Have You Seen This Man? is a first-person psychological horror, the plot of which takes you into the atmosphere of Texas in 1975. The gameplay is based on a methodical exploration of the streets of Emsdorf County, where you will have to knock on doors and communicate with local residents. Each encounter is unique: from conversations with eccentric conspiracy theorists to clashes with aggressive hermits with shotguns at the ready.

item.title: Sheepherds!
item.description: Game Description Sheepherds! is a cozy cooperative project that invites you to take on the role of adorable herding dogs. The main task is to manage herds of fluffy sheep, which must be led through picturesque flower fields. This process allows them to dye their fur in vibrant colors to create fun clothing and accessories for their four-legged friends. To achieve the goal, the shepherds will have to run a lot and bark in time, discovering magical corners of the local world.

item.title: Storebound
item.description: Game Description Storebound is a co-op survival horror game that turns a huge furniture store into a death trap for random visitors. With the onset of darkness, bright shop windows and cozy exhibition rooms give way to impenetrable darkness, and the bustle of the day gives way to ringing silence. Local employees begin to patrol the endless trading floors and warehouses - creepy entities obsessed with the idea of ​​​​providing their last service to lost souls.

item.title: Stuck Together
item.description: Game Description Stuck Together is a co-op challenge filled with 1990s nostalgia. The space is filled with recognizable items from the era, including videotapes and furniture with distinctive tacky patterns. However, this retro world is actually a house of horrors from which you have to make a daring escape. Five full-scale rooms, including the Kitchen and Bedroom, conceal numerous dangers, traps and mutilated toys, creating an oppressive and tense environment for a bold ascent to freedom.

item.title: Shelldiver
item.description: Game Description Shelldiver immerses you in exploring a vast ocean filled with unique biomes, from volcanic waters to crystalline caves. Instead of linear development, a branched skill tree is offered, which allows you to customize expeditions in detail to suit your own style of passage, focusing on the speed of collection or the depth of research. All these improvements serve one purpose - the development of an unusual business founded by an elderly turtle.

item.title: Village of the Curse
item.description: Game Description Village of the Curse is a depressing first-person horror game that puts you in the shoes of a journalist investigating the dark secrets of an isolated settlement. The hero will have to survive in an atmosphere of constant fear, because unpredictable and ruthless creatures are hiding in the shadows. Every meeting with these distorted entities becomes a test of strength. Exploring eerie locations, including an abandoned church, a witch’s house and a haunted cemetery, is fraught with mortal danger.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: Shatterland
item.description: Game Description Shatterland, the plot of which tells the story of a dramatic confrontation between two clones, invites you to immerse yourself in a world destroyed by the rage of one of them. The main character is one of the last survivors, pursued by his crazed brother, who destroyed the laboratory and all their creators. To survive, the protagonist will have to travel through the remains of civilization, restoring fragments of lost memory and discovering hidden abilities.

item.title: CLAWPUNK
item.description: Game Description CLAWPUNK, a 2D action-platformer with roglite elements, takes you to a dystopian city overrun by hostile factions and street gangs. The main goal is to recapture the metropolis from a tyrant named Mister Fluffy, a former ally who betrayed his relatives and expelled all the cats. The liberation mission falls on the shoulders of a squad of 9 unique cat heroes with a total of 9 lives per playthrough.

item.title: SCHROTT
item.description: Game Description SCHROTT is a roguelike racing game where performing crazy stunts and collecting valuable loot provide the basis for deep vehicle customization. Instead of ordinary machines, there are absurd designs that lend themselves to all sorts of improvements to wreak even more chaos. Each race turns into a hunt for resources that allow you to turn your car into a unique weapon of destruction on the road. Arcade controls make the gameplay accessible and intuitive from the first minutes, and high-speed action does not let you relax.

item.title: Fracturefront
item.description: Game Description Fracturefront is a third-person fantasy action roguelike in which players must stop the Dimensional Harvester Kaos, who is manipulating rifts to consume entire worlds. This powerful antagonist uses portals to instantly move and drain energy, and battles with him take place in several intense stages. Throughout the battle, he is able to call upon the echoes of fallen worlds, making the confrontation more difficult. The warrior’s ultimate mission is to prevent the collapse of the energy core, for which it is necessary to penetrate desecrated dimensions and destroy ominous altars that drain life forces.

item.title: GigaSword
item.description: Game Description The hero’s adventures in GigaSword allow you to visit many dark dungeons where you will have to face dangerous monsters and deadly traps. Users are forced to move the character through two-dimensional locations with a side view, jumping over platforms using special abilities. The protagonist named Ezr has an ancient and heavy sword, which weighs down the character and affects his movement. Users need to calculate the speed of swinging weapons when fighting with the enemy in order to catch the correct timing and not miss.

item.title: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road
item.description: Game Description INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road opens up the possibility of collecting over 5,400 characters from the history of the franchise under your command, which becomes a reality in Chronicles mode. Together with Victorio, a boy from the future, you can relive iconic matches of the past, forming a dream team of legendary football players capable of crushing any opponent. This mode takes a deep dive into the series' legacy, recreating iconic rivalries and opening up new tactical options using classic lineups.

item.title: Lia: Hacking Destiny
item.description: Game Description Lia: Hacking Destiny is a side-scrolling roguelite set in a world enslaved by hostile machines. In this setting, the remnants of humanity are waging a guerrilla war, becoming the last hope for freedom. Facing mechanized opponents requires sharp reflexes to dodge attacks and slide along walls. Each raid takes place in unique conditions thanks to the procedural generation of industrial complexes filled with traps and enemies. Successful survival directly depends on constantly improving your equipment and unlocking new abilities.

item.title: The Sushi House
item.description: Game Description The Sushi House is a first-person story-driven adventure where something unsettling and inexplicable lurks behind the façade of an ordinary sushi restaurant. A gradually growing sense of unease becomes the main driver of the narrative, involving us in unraveling the secrets of this place. The initially calm atmosphere gives way to a depressing foreboding, when routine duties begin to seem like part of an ominous mechanism. Every creaking floorboard and unusual shadow makes you doubt the reality of what is happening.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends and the Secret Fairy DX offers an expanded version of the adventure, allowing you to take control of Empel and Leela in their own storyline. The events of this expanded edition take place 3 years after the finale of the first part, when the matured Raizalin Shtout goes to the capital city of Ashra-am-Berd. At the request of a friend, she takes on the task of investigating a mysterious stone, which soon turns out to be an egg.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End and the Secret Key DX marks the end of the story of alchemist Raizalin Stout, who must unravel the mystery of the suddenly appeared Kark Islands. These mysterious lands threaten the stability of her home island of Kurken, forcing the girl to embark on one last great journey. A voice in her head guides Reiza to create mysterious keys that open up not only new possibilities in the synthesis of objects, but also access to previously unseen areas for exploration.

item.title: Duncrush
item.description: Game Description Duncrush is a role-playing clicker game where the depth of character development is achieved through a well-developed skill tree and unique equipment. Creating your own strategy becomes possible thanks to powerful blades, shields and accessories found in battle. All this equipment is necessary to strengthen the hero, preparing to meet stronger opponents. Exploring numerous dungeons, each with unique challenges and rewards, forms the core of the gameplay. In these dangerous journeys, the protagonist is helped by mercenaries who fight shoulder to shoulder.

item.title: Find The Key 2
item.description: Game Description Find The Key 2 is a surreal journey through abstract worlds, where conventional logic gives way to deep symbolism. The protagonist is surrounded by a minimalist but stylized three-dimensional space filled with bizarre metaphors and allegorical images. Each location is a cinematic scene that contains a hidden message that makes you think about what is happening. The main task is to find a way out of this labyrinth of meanings, where walls block the way, and the only door does not have a visible lock, but requires a special key to open.

item.title: Let Them Come: Onslaught
item.description: Game Description Let Them Come: Onslaught is the epitome of cinematic chaos as high-tech drones and deadly orbital lasers rain down on the enemy, accompanied by vibrant retro-pixelated visuals. The weapon fires automatically, allowing you to fully focus on tactical maneuvers and choosing upgrades in real time. Survival on a hostile planet infested with alien horrors becomes a real challenge. Endless waves of xenomorphs and giant bosses constantly test reflexes and the ability to adapt to the dangers of procedurally generated arenas inspired by 80s sci-fi action films.

item.title: Million Depth
item.description: Game Description Million Depth offers a unique tactical experience where survival is directly dependent on the ability to manage time. The main character, Moma, has a device known as a biotope jammer, which allows her to completely freeze a moment while she herself remains motionless. This mechanic becomes the basis of the combat system: dangerous creatures hiding in the shadows of dungeons make their move only after the actions of the protagonist.

item.title: Possessor(s)
item.description: Game Description Possessor(s) tells the grim story of a forced symbiosis that emerged amid the ruins of a flooded city. At the center of the story is Luka, a student who was mortally wounded as a result of an interdimensional cataclysm. To survive, she makes a deal with an otherworldly entity named Rem, who restores her body. Now this couple, who do not trust each other, must learn to coexist. Their joint survival becomes the only chance to escape from the destroyed metropolis, consumed by surreal horrors and anomalies that have distorted reality.

item.title: Sacred 2 Remaster
item.description: Game Description Sacred 2 Remaster is a comprehensive technical and visual transformation of the cult classic. Thanks to the efforts of the SparklingBit studio, the project received not just graphical improvements, but also a significant reworking of key mechanics, which made it possible to preserve the spirit of the original, making it accessible to modern audiences. An updated presentation and polished gameplay once again immerse you in Ancaria - a fantasy world that is on the verge of destruction due to the mysterious T-Energy.

item.title: The Single-Eye Nightmare
item.description: Game Description The Single-Eye Nightmare is a frightening dive into the depths of a long-abandoned underground temple, where the oppressive silence is broken only by the echo of your own footsteps. Instead of treasures and ancient artifacts, winding corridors and dark tunnels conceal a deadly threat, forcing you to constantly be on alert. A monstrous creature is constantly following on the heels - a cyclops, a meeting with which does not bode well, because his only eye sees in the darkness.

item.title: Wall World 2
item.description: Game Description Wall World 2 continues the exploration of the vertical world. Players will control a complex spider robot as they delve into procedurally generated mines to mine resources and search for lost artifacts. The machine and its pilot will have to fight hostile organisms inhabiting the dark depths of the structure. Each expedition aims to discover forgotten technologies and uncover the fundamental secrets hidden within this massive structure. The entire experience is focused on survival, managing supplies, and battling the horrors that lurk in the darkness.

item.title: Wartorn
item.description: Game Description Wartorn follows the journey of sisters Yara and Elani, who have been exiled from their home and must traverse a world riven by conflict. They lead a caravan through the Talaura Islands, seeking safety in their ancestral fortress, Beinun. The expedition involves controlling a squad of fantastic creatures in numerous battles in real time. Along the way, they must also find lost relatives to piece together their story. The player’s actions determine the survival of this group in a hostile environment.

item.title: Windswept
item.description: Game Description Windswept takes users on an adventure filled with nostalgia and excitement. It features a dynamic duo consisting of a duck and a turtle who find themselves torn from their home due to a severe storm. The main character will have to lead them back to a safe place. The platformer has a ’90s feel, with vibrant visuals, catchy tunes, and levels that will test your skills. Windswept features over 40 carefully designed stages spread across 5 authentic regions, each with its own unique atmosphere and hidden surprises, so there’s never a dull moment.

item.title: Ambrosia Sky
item.description: Game Description Ambrosia Sky plunges into the atmosphere of a deserted colony near the rings of Saturn, where an alien fungal infection has turned human habitation into a disaster zone. After 15 years of absence, Dalia returns here, a disaster response specialist and a member of the Scarab caste - space caretakers who see off the dead on their final journey. Her task is not only to clean up the area, but also to conduct a bioremediation ritual over the bodies of the dead, such as her old friend Gerald Parker.

item.title: Donna: The Canine Quest
item.description: Game Description Donna: The Canine Quest is a pixel action role-playing game in which the central place is given to the story of saving the magical world from the demonic threat hanging over it. Exploring the colorful world of Barkhaven, ranging from sun-drenched fields to ancient ruins and enemy-infested forests, is seamlessly combined with dynamic combat. Gameplay is built around a combination of fast-paced hack-and-slash combat, collecting valuable loot, and using a simple but functional crafting system.

item.title: King of Bones
item.description: Game Description In King of Bones, the main goal is to dominate prehistoric arenas in battles with realistic physics. The combat system conveys the weight and power of every encounter as all bites and strikes interact with physically simulated bodies in real time. Gamers dash, stomp and headbutt in fast-paced battles where creatures fight to the last. An attacking Triceratops can throw an enemy into the air, and small raptors can grab onto larger opponents right during a fight.

item.title: Lost Paws
item.description: Game Description Lost Paws is a survival simulator in which you take on the role of a stray dog ​​named Doggo and explore a large open world faced with the mysterious disappearance of all your pets. Personalization of the protagonist is implemented through an equipment system that allows you to find and try on a variety of accessories. There are dozens of items scattered throughout the world, including hats, glasses and even shoes, which are stored in separate inventory slots.

item.title: Nitroglycerine!
item.description: Game Description Nitroglycerine! is a test where the main task is to transport a deadly substance along difficult routes. The process of controlling a heavy tractor is subject to the laws of realistic physics, and the vehicle itself is completely unsuitable for overcoming obstacles along the way. Any mistake in piloting, sharp turn or collision can lead to the detonation of nitroglycerin and instant failure of the mission. Even climbing moderately steep slopes requires precise timing, and putting too much pressure on the engine via turbocharging risks stalling the engine.

item.title: VORON: Raven's Story
item.description: Game Description VORON: Raven’s Story tells an emotional story about life and death from an unusual perspective. The main character is a raven who is destined to become a guide to lost souls, helping them find their way to a new world. Starting his journey as a chick, he gradually turns into a mythical creature from ancient legends. However, his very first mission turns into disaster when an ancient evil awakens, disrupting the established order.

item.title: Dragon Blazers
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Dragon Blazers take players into a fantasy setting where they have to take control of a mighty warrior. The hero masters mysterious combat techniques that will be useful in clashes against cyber ninjas. The game is made in the form of a classic arcade adventure game, drawn in retro pixel graphics. Users will wander through two-dimensional locations with a side view, encountering problems such as landscape obstacles (pits, hills, traps) and opponents.

item.title: Drill Bird
item.description: Game Description Drill Bird invites you to immerse yourself in a world where every foray underground is critical. As darkness falls, the depths become filled with danger, forcing you to rush back to the safety of your nest. This story of survival and care is told without a single word, creating a special atmosphere in which comfort is mixed with constant tension. Every decision made directly affects the outcome, because time is running out inexorably, and the creatures waiting in the darkness do not forgive mistakes, turning each expedition into a risky undertaking.

item.title: THRASHER
item.description: Game Description THRASHER is a psychedelic arcade odyssey where music, visuals and the process itself are woven into a single transcendental stream that immerses you in a state of flow. The journey takes you from primeval darkness to the heights of celestial bliss, culminating in an intense showdown with a cosmic infant deity. Control the magnificent space eel to gracefully glide and dash across stunning alien worlds in a desperate race for survival.

item.title: Weed Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Weed Store Simulator is an economic strategy that asks you to build a criminal empire under the guise of a legal store. The entire gameplay is built on a risky balance between the world of law and underground activities. To survive and thrive, you must build complex relationships with various factions, including the police, mafia and street gangs. Any wrong step can lead to disaster: problems with law enforcement agencies threaten raids and business closures, and refusal to cooperate with the mafia will inevitably lead to supply disruptions.

item.title: Kentum
item.description: Game Description Kentum is a sci-fi adventure where the death of the protagonist is only a temporary setback thanks to cloning technology. The main task is to revive civilization, relying solely on automation and our own strength. The basis for survival is the creation of a self-regulating environment, where automated mechanisms and conveyor belts turn the shelter into a full-fledged production complex. Here, coal is produced from bones and wood, and ingots are smelted from scrap metal, gradually building a complex system to provide themselves with everything they need in a world devoid of people.

item.title: Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores
item.description: Game Description Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores tells the story of an ancient era when the mushroom tribes were on the verge of extinction. The cause of the disaster was a mythical creature known as the Spiritual Beast, tearing their civilization apart. At the center of events is the ancestor of Greencup, who is destined to fulfill an ancient prophecy. He will become Hiertan, a cultural leader capable of uniting disparate clans to jointly confront a common threat.

item.title: Mecha Blitz
item.description: Game Description Mecha Blitz is an anime-inspired, isometric top-down shooter where players build mechs and engage in chaotic arena battles. The process of creating your own mech, called an Arbiter, offers access to over 100 parts, internal components and weapons. In addition to extensive cosmetic options, there is an upgrade system to improve equipment, abilities and characteristics. The depth of tactical capabilities is revealed through the creation of unique builds. You can design both a mobile but vulnerable vehicle and a heavily armored fortress, which directly affects the style of combat.

item.title: Only Up: BRAINROT TOGETHER
item.description: Game Description Only Up: BRAINROT TOGETHER offers a surreal and chaotic adventure where the main goal is to climb to unimaginable heights. In this psychedelic world, the protagonist Tung Tung Sahur and his friends must reach the top, but their venture is constantly under threat. Every ledge and platform is haunted by bizarre creatures, including Bombardino Cocodrilo and Spijuniro Golubiro. These opponents turn every step into a test of strength, testing not only the coordination, but also the mental stability of the daredevils who decide to climb.

item.title: Paracom
item.description: Game Description Paracom is a tactical horror role-playing game in which managing a task force is complicated not only by encounters with monsters, but also by psychological tension within the squad. Each soldier has his own point of view and may question the commander’s orders if he considers them illogical or irrational. The anomalous zone itself is a living mind that changes its behavior in response to the actions of the players.

item.title: Restaurants
item.description: Game Description Restaurats is a medieval restaurant management simulator where the main characters are a team of resourceful rats. Gamers will have to take full control over all aspects of running a business in a fantasy world. The process includes not only preparing dishes according to a variety of recipes, but also submitting orders on time, as well as maintaining order on the tables. The development of the establishment occurs gradually, opening up access to new drawings to expand the tavern and improve its functionality.

item.title: Session Notes: Route 404
item.description: Game Description Session Notes: Route 404, a first-person psychological survival horror game, follows the story of a former bus steward. His attempt to return to normal life turns into a nightmare journey, where the line between reality and illusion is erased forever. The protagonist will have to fulfill his direct responsibilities: serve passengers, solve their problems and monitor the condition of transport. However, every action takes place under the yoke of the past, because the trauma experienced constantly distorts the perception of the world around us, turning an ordinary trip into a surreal thriller with several possible endings.

item.title: Skopje '83
item.description: Game Description Skopje ‘83 is a tactical shooter with a comic book visual style, immersing you in the dark atmosphere of an alternative history of the Balkans. The only island of relative safety in a city engulfed in chaos is the DOM bus. This mobile base not only serves as a means of navigating dangerous streets, but also as a workshop for upgrading your equipment. Inside it, you can modify your character and save valuable loot collected during forays.

item.title: Deep Space Exploitation
item.description: Game Description Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining simulator in which pilots have to work for a dubious corporation in the distant future. The storyline, spanning a prologue and several epilogues, challenges gamers to survive under harsh corporate oppression. The main gameplay comes down to the exploration of asteroid fields, where not only courage is required, but also extreme caution to successfully extract resources. Every decision made directly affects the further development of events and the ability to secure a decent future for oneself.

item.title: Egging On
item.description: Game Description Egging On is a brutal test where every wrong move sends the fragile egg-shaped protagonist back to where he started. There’s no save system, making vertical climbing a tense test of precision and patience. To achieve the cherished freedom, you have to perfectly master difficult physics, feeling every vibration and roll of your fragile shell. Success depends on the ability to synchronize the rotation with the jump to achieve maximum height, because any mistake threatens to fall and the need to start all over again.

item.title: Jitter
item.description: Game Description Jitter is a sci-fi simulator that immerses you in the dark atmosphere of the consequences of a catastrophe in the Main Asteroid Belt. A once-bustling mining colony lies in ruins after a mysterious incident, and the truth behind what happened must be uncovered in the rubble. The danger comes not only from the destroyed environment, but also from pirates or even unknown life forms lurking in the shadows. To survive and complete the mission, you must carefully explore abandoned mines, colossal cave systems and remote outposts scattered across the surface of a giant asteroid.

item.title: Majogami
item.description: Game Description Majogami is a fast-paced 2D adventure in which players hack their way through a nightmarish world using unique abilities for instant movement and attacks. The main character, armed with the Kamikiri katana, is able to quickly close the distance with enemies, cutting them into pieces thanks to the Setsuna mechanics. The same ability is used to overcome obstacles and evade enemy attacks, turning every collision into a swift dance of blades.

item.title: My Little Puppy
item.description: Game Description My Little Puppy is a touching tale of devotion set in an unusual afterlife. The protagonist will have to cross vast deserts, snow-capped mountain plateaus and deserted meadows, overcoming challenges that combine elements of adventure, racing and action. At the center of this emotional story is a Welsh Corgi named Bong-gu, who escaped from dog paradise for one single purpose - to find his owner. This journey will take him through worlds teetering on the brink of life and death, where every corner looks both familiar and alien, creating a unique atmosphere.

item.title: Service with a Shotgun
item.description: Game Description Service with a Shotgun plunges you into an absurd reality where retail rules apply even during a zombie apocalypse. The main task becomes not only survival among the hordes of the undead, but also high-quality service to the eccentric customers lining up at the half-empty shelves. While the living dead are wandering outside the window, a real drama is unfolding inside the store: you need to speak quickly, shoot accurately and build defensive structures in order to survive the next work shift.

item.title: The Last Caretaker
item.description: Game Description The Last Caretaker is a story of survival in a world where hostile mechanisms and a constant lack of resources force you to act methodically. The gameplay is based on the exploration of abandoned structures towering over the endless ocean. Each rusty tower or silent dock becomes a source of valuable materials obtained by dismantling the remains of a former civilization. Not only tools and weapons are created from the recovered scrap, but also complex energy networks.

item.title: Dead Static Drive
item.description: Game Description Dead Static Drive is a constantly collapsing apocalyptic world. Someone is always chasing the hero, and dangerous and creepy monsters begin to crawl out of the ground. You can continue to run from them, or turn around and fight back. A variety of weapons, from chainsaws to guns, and other survivors will help you with this. But you should be careful, because not all people you meet will be good.

item.title: Deadcam
item.description: Game Description Deadcam is a psychological horror game where the feeling of fear is fueled by the ability to see yourself through the eyes of a ruthless stalker. The main character finds himself locked within the walls of an abandoned rural house along with Margot, a former film crew colleague who has turned into a deadly threat. Her head-mounted camera continues to work, broadcasting in real time her distorted face and every step that brings her closer to her victim.

item.title: Eventide Matter
item.description: Game Description Eventide Matter is a 2D adventure where the survival of civilization depends on the construction of an interdimensional portal. The unknown continuum into which the protagonist finds himself turns out to be a hostile environment. Local crystalline life forms perceive the newcomer as an invader and attack without hesitation, trying to destroy any of his creations. As the pilot of the ship, Vanguard Unit 4 will have to operate under constant threat.

item.title: PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On
item.description: Game Description PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On is a dark world of a fallen kingdom, destroyed by a failed immortality vaccine and turned into an arena for survival. Instead of healing, civilization received an endless plague that gave birth to regenerating horrors. In this setting, a former doctor, now a monster in a mask, will have to fight back the endless hordes of the infected. His task is not just to survive, but also to uncover the dark secret behind the disaster that destroyed everything around him.

item.title: Second Sun
item.description: Game Description Second Sun is a journey through a picturesque world created in an impressionistic style. Here, vast open spaces juxtapose with procedurally generated dungeons to ensure that every encounter is unique. Enemy placements, loot caches, and important locations are also generated randomly, forcing constant adaptation. The main goal is to return the fading light of the Good Sun, because it is for the sake of saving these beautiful but devastated lands that the struggle is being waged.

item.title: Strange Seed
item.description: Game Description Strange Seed is a project where survival depends not so much on reflexes, but on thoughtful mutation. Fighting enemies, including ferocious Soulslike bosses, requires creating a creature with the optimal set of body parts for a given situation. Victory is achieved not by brute force, but by a competent selection of evolutionary improvements, turning each battle into a tactical puzzle. Sophisticated strategies allow you to find vulnerabilities in even the most formidable creatures, opening up opportunities for unconventional victories.

item.title: SPARTA 2035
item.description: Game Description SPARTA 2035 plunges you into a brutal conflict in East Africa, where a squad of mercenaries, consisting of ordinary people with their own weaknesses and dreams, will have to defend the civilian population. They will be opposed by the extremist group Damat, which has established a brutal order. The basis of tactical confrontation is a system with two action points, allowing fighters to move and attack within the same turn.

item.title: Vivid World
item.description: Game Description Vivid World is a role-playing adventure where the souls of heroes are trapped in gems for battle in the depths of the Underworld. This demonic kingdom is ruled by the protagonist Lemuria, who has mastered the new Gems Magic to conquer procedurally generated dungeons. The basis of the gameplay is the formation of a combat squad from these crystalline creatures. Characters can be bought and sold in the jewelry store, and collecting identical gems significantly enhances their characteristics, opening up powerful combinations for tactical automatic battles.

item.title: No Human Shall Pass
item.description: Game Description No Human Shall Pass is an intense rogue-like shooter about the last stronghold of humanity, plunging into a dark world overrun by deadly machines. As the only survivor, you have to complete a simple but brutal mission: fight your way through the ruins of a destroyed city, destroying countless hordes of hostile robots. Each combat mission takes place in randomly generated locations, which ensures the uniqueness of each passage.

item.title: Rubble Eats The World
item.description: Game Description Rubble Eats The World is a shooter with an advanced physics model, where almost any object on the level is subject to destruction and subsequent absorption. After completing the main story campaign, additional opportunities open up for gamers. The built-in sandbox editor allows you to design your own testing grounds and share them with other players. For those looking for a real challenge, there is a difficulty setting system.

item.title: Solomon's Boneyard: Hideous Retro Edition
item.description: Game Description Solomon’s Boneyard Hideous Retro Edition is an explosive mixture of several genres, dressed in stylish retro graphics. This project is an isometric action game that organically combines elements of a bagel, a role-playing system and a dynamic twin-stick shooter. The gameplay is based on exploring dungeons and clearing locations from countless enemies, which turns each session into a real hell of shells. The protagonist will have to use magical abilities to survive in this dark fantasy world, where the atmosphere of hopelessness is diluted with notes of black humor and comedic situations.

item.title: Solomon's Keep: Dreadful Retro Edition
item.description: Game Description Solomon’s Keep: Dreadful Retro Edition is a perilous climb to the top of a dark tower to destroy the most powerful necromancer these lands have ever known. The hero will have to make his way through a series of ominous floors, where every step threatens a collision with the minions of dark magic. The ultimate goal of this risky journey is to reach the abode of the main antagonist and put an end to his atrocities.

item.title: The Boss Gangsters: Nightlife
item.description: Game Description The Boss Gangsters Nightlife is a simulator where the path to power lies through managing shady deals and ruthlessly fighting for territory. Interaction with corrupt police officers and influential officials becomes a tool for achieving goals, and the elimination of competitors becomes a severe necessity. Every decision made shapes a reputation in the criminal world, opening up access to new opportunities or provoking brutal raids on a business. Risky black market activities, such as arms trafficking, promise quick profits, but can lead to the loss of everything.

item.title: 7th Floor
item.description: Game Description 7th Floor plunges you into an atmosphere of despair where survival requires constant adaptation. Confrontation with terrible monsters gives way to the need to hide from the inexorable doctor who is hot on the hero’s heels. The gameplay is divided into sections, combining horror and action elements. All events unfold from the first person, which enhances the effect of presence and forces you to carefully examine the environment in search of useful objects and clues.

item.title: Echoes of the Living
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the Living is a chilling classic survival horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Taking inspiration from the greatest hits of the 90s, this game takes horror to a whole new level. You will be completely immersed in a dark and frightening world, filled with unspeakable horrors and secrets that have yet to be revealed. As you explore a small town located in northern Europe, you quickly realize that something is wrong.

item.title: Jester: A Foolish Ritual
item.description: Game Description Jester A Foolish Ritual - a descent into despair, where the only way to salvation is the completion of an ancient sacred ritual. Within the walls of a gloomy medieval castle, fallen knights have awakened, resurrected for one last mission - to drive out the monstrous Jester that haunts them in the dark corridors. Freedom awaits only those who can find the hidden runes and open the treasured ritual chamber.

item.title: Ramona
item.description: Game Description Ramona takes a young journalist named Samuel on a frightening journey where reality and hallucination merge. The events take place in the 1970s inside an old house, the walls of which are saturated with old secrets and deep remorse. The hero will have to plunge into the claustrophobic atmosphere of psychological horror, making the transition between light and darkness in search of truth. Each room of this ominous place becomes an arena for exploration, forcing the protagonist to confront someone else’s disturbing memories that should have been buried long ago.

item.title: RazePact
item.description: Game Description A fast-paced action-platformer hybrid, RazePact takes gamers into a dark dungeon inspired by classics of the genre. A small wandering soul named Soul falls under control, seeking answers to questions about his past and origin. Her journey is not just an attempt to break free, but a way to discover herself and uncover the secrets of a mysterious place. On the path to the truth, the heroine will have to face numerous opponents, where each battle makes the spirit stronger, gradually bringing her closer to the solution.

item.title: Silly Survivors
item.description: Game Description Silly Survivors is a casual action game in which the protagonist will have to repel the attacks of hordes of funny ghosts. A brave fluffy fox falls under control, for which the only means of defense is an ordinary flashlight. Despite their comical appearance and ridiculous behavior, otherworldly entities pose a serious threat.
