item.title: Taiwan Coolfox
item.description: Game Description Taiwan Coolfox is a 3D action-adventure, where anthropomorphic animals are the main characters. This project unfolds in the formation of horizontal scrolling, organically combining the elements of the platformer and intense contractions. A solitary regime is concentrated on instant immersion in the combat system with a side of the side, requiring an accurate positioning and skillful execution of maneuvers against opponents. The main gameplay cycle includes the Taiwan Coolfox movement in various areas, each of which offers its tests, checking the reaction and command actions of the player.

item.title: Frog Jump
item.description: Game Description Frog Jump puts players under the control of amphibians with the aim of vertical climbing through the three -dimensional world. They have to move according to a complex design, using jumps and climbing to go from one site to another. The entire level is designed around this movement up, representing a continuous navigation task. The first princess’s kiss receives a victory that reached the top. This platformer can be held alone or in a multi -user competition for 8 competitors over the network.

item.title: Jaleco Sports: Goal!
item.description: Game Description Jaleco Sports: Goal! It contains versions of a football tit for NES and SNES, representing a collection of historical console projects. This simulator opens access to 24 international teams to participate in several disciplines, such as comradely meetings, cup tournaments and a penal series. The gamer has to resist the computer opponent in solitary mode, or a living opponent in the framework of a local multiplayer. The system of monthly tables of leaders to track achievements and comparing the results with other participants is also implemented.

item.title: Project Silverfish
item.description: Game Description Project Silverfish places the hero inside the hostile alienation zone in search of powerful artifacts and exotic weapons. This universe is fraught with forgotten nightmares, both man -made and supernatural. The character will go down to the lost dungeons of the Cold War in search of resources and the new arsenal. The gameplay is based on first -person mechanics and requires ingenuity, as well as the use of various survival tools.

item.title: Ruffy and the Riverside
item.description: Game Description Ruffy and the Riverside is a game where the player character uses an ability called SWAP to change the environment. This power allows you to directly copy and overlay textures, which changes the properties of objects and surfaces. The gamer can turn ice into lava, transform waterfalls into vines, or make wood from stone to build a boat. Raffi uses this skill to navigate locations, solve spatial puzzles and clear paths, turning solid walls into ruins.

item.title: Suit for Hire
item.description: Game Description Suit for Hire as if throwing users into a first -class action movie, where they have to go through a series of locations in the role of a killer, leaving a mountain of corpses. There is no deeply prescribed plot, serious development of characters or complex mechanics. There are only pure action and arsenal of techniques with which you can eliminate the next portion of goals. In addition, the scene is constantly changing, due to which you will have to get used to the new environment again.

item.title: Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors puts a player under the control of Pinocchio, a puppet who has trapped in a hostile and distorted space of nightmares. The character moves around this world by controlling one hand, while the system is automatically introduced to creatures from rethought fairy tales. The promotion depends on the collection and absorption of more than 100 different forbidden dreams of dreams, each of which modifies offensive and defensive capabilities.

item.title: Metro Gravity
item.description: Game Description Metro Gravity places the protagonist in the Halls, a location they are taken to after clicking on a hyperlink and filling out a survey. This world functions without the usual concepts of up or down, being the material embodiment of the collective subconscious. The other inhabitants of this place push the main character to face personal regrets, which is the only way to gain strength and find a way out.

item.title: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 is a continuation of a series of two-dimensional action games, the gameplay of which is based on clearing locations and strengthening the character. The visual style of the project is made in pixel graphics format. The basis for the heroine’s development is a resource called Tres, received for eliminating opponents at the level. Each location contains hidden special enemies known as Jammers.

item.title: Chinese Frontiers
item.description: Game Description Chinese Frontiers is an atmospheric immersion in the time of ancient China, where users will be able to feel the life of a simple resident of the village. The game is a simulator of life where you have to take under the management of the employee, which is working on the construction of a great Chinese wall. Gamers will be able to test various types of crafts of that time, and will also monitor the character indicators, giving him food, water and rest in time.

item.title: Len's Island
item.description: Game Description Len’s Island is an open world adventure, which is the construction of a base with the possibility of a pharmacy, craft, research and battles. Each player is able to build his own house of dreams, care for crops and simply explore the secrets of the island. If you manage to find a sword, then you can go to more dangerous adventures, fighting with numerous enemies guarding the treasures.

item.title: Rematch
item.description: Game Description Rematch is a competitive football, where, unlike traditional titles, he offers a unique interpretation of this sport, focusing on quick matches. Gamers control one character with a third person, focusing on individual skill and teamwork. The game is designed in such a way as to constantly keep users in suspense, focusing on speed and accuracy. Here each move matters, and the outcome is determined by how well users coordinate their actions and respond to pressure.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: Dragonloop
item.description: Game Description Dragonloop is a metro-vanning that combines manipulations over time with the design of the map, enclosing a player in a repeating 5-day cycle. The main character is a woman who has lost her memory and trapped this temporary loop. Together with a satellite named Ouro, she travels around a two -dimensional world, where strange temporal changes take place. The basis of the gameplay is the study and battles in order to break out of the closed circle, change fate and reveal the truth about the situation.

item.title: Netherworld Covenant
item.description: Game Description Netherworld Covenant puts the player in the abyss, where the world of mortals and the underworld are intertwined after the disaster. Being surviving, the character owns the lantern of the void - an artifact connecting two dimensions. This item lights up with azure flame, making it possible to cross the procedurally created labyrinths and destroy the damned barriers. The goal is to confront the fallen heroes and demonic overlords in order to reveal the truth woven from blood and soul.

item.title: Crime Simulator
item.description: Game Description Crime Simulator allows you to quit your nine-to-five job and dive into a virtual life of crime. In this open-world sandbox, you’ll dive headfirst into the dirty underbelly of illegal activities. From petty thefts to sophisticated heists, Crime Simulator offers a buffet of criminal adventures. Start your journey from the very bottom of the food chain, completing small assignments to climb the criminal ladder. As your reputation grows, new opportunities open up.

item.title: FBC: Firebreak
item.description: Game Description FBC: Firebreak gives gamers a co-op first-person shooter for 3 people, set in the headquarters of a federal agency under attack by forces from other dimensions. Acting as operatives of the Firebreak unit, the group must intervene in the most critical situations occurring within the besieged structure. This squad is required to penetrate crisis zones, restore order, contain chaos and fight to regain control over the facility. The prolonged siege had reached a critical point, requiring direct intervention in the most unstable sectors of the building.

item.title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die
item.description: Game Description Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is an exciting adventure in the Rogue -Lite genre, plunging users into a bizarre and unpredictable world of random. In the role of Queen Alexandra, you must go in search to return what was stolen by an ancient evil. With the help of fortune, a cube that serves both a companion and a conductor, users go on a trip to randomly generated kingdoms filled with unique tasks, dangers and capabilities.

item.title: Soulstone Survivors
item.description: Game Description Soulstone Survivors events take place in the gloomy fantasy universe, and the main characters will be the abyss hunters who strive to capture the unique stones of the soul. They have an incredible force capable of turning a carrier into a creature with which only a deity can compare by capabilities. However, it is extremely difficult to get them - for this it will be necessary to first defeat the master of the void.

item.title: ACTION GAME MAKER
item.description: Game Description ACTION GAME MAKER is a set of tools for developing 2D action games. As part of a software series, it is structured for use by professionals with varying levels of game design experience. The system provides access to functions without the need for programming knowledge. This toolkit is built on the Godot Engine and includes a collection of samples and assets to lay the foundation for future projects. This opens up opportunities for creating both small experimental titles and more developed gameplay mechanics.

item.title: Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil!
item.description: Game Description Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil! - This is an exciting strategy in real time, in which you will go to study the distant world called Grimstar, where you will find a new type of natural energy resources. But not everything is so rosy and sunny - because of your brother’s sudden death, you have to fulfill his contract with the corporation for which he worked, and you must take his place on an alien planet.

item.title: Peak
item.description: Game Description Peak puts players in the role of lost scouts on the lost island for the only purpose - salvation. Survival depends on the conquest of the mountain in the center of the island, this test can be passed alone or in the team up to 4 people. The landscape is changing with every new attempt, demanding adaptation from climos. Gamers can help each other climb to ledges or place ropes and rocky hooks to pave the way for the detachment.

item.title: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
item.description: Game Description Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game is not your average button-mashing parkour game. Forget about quick events and scripted sequences. Instead, the responsibility is placed on you, the gamer, to master the complex art of movement. Imagine navigating a sprawling cityscape, turning rooftops and alleys into your own personal parkour playground. Every jump, leap and wall climb requires precision and split-second decision making. Beauty lies in variety. This project offers you a variety of conditions, each of which poses unique challenges.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic plunges people into the structure of Murray Costume Manor, an abandoned workshop containing unresolved questions. The characters must explore its depths to uncover the secret left behind by Edwin Murray, the solitary creator of this place. This location offers a space where any dark area can hide information or a secret passage, directly affecting the gameplay and understanding of past events.

item.title: The Alters
item.description: Game Description The Alters is a science fiction adventure that immerses in the world of choice and consequences. Imagine yourself stuck on an unfriendly planet, where there is no one to rely on, except for your own ingenuity. This is the intriguing plan of this innovative game, which immerses in the world of parallel lives and alternative realities. Going on this journey, you take on the role of Jan Dolsky, a worker who made an emergency landing on a foreign world and is now facing the problem of survival and salvation.

item.title: MindsEye
item.description: Game Description MindsEye is a world where the boundaries between reality and illusion are blurred. You step into the role of Jacob Diaz, a man with a dark past that is slowly slipping away from his grasp. With a neural implant that should help him recall memories but instead leads to even more confusion, Jacob must navigate a landscape fraught with danger. The American landscape of the near future is riddled with stories of corporate deceit, political intrigue, and the ever-present shadow of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition puts the player in the center of large -scale conflict, where battles and constant pressure do not leave time for respite. Captain Titus from the Order of Ultramarinov heads a detachment of hardened fighters sent to restrain the invasion of the orcs on an industrial planet. These worlds produce equipment and weapons for the endless war of mankind, and the loss of one of them can lead to catastrophic consequences.

item.title: Berserk or die
item.description: Game Description Berserk or Die puts the player in the position of the only survivor on the contested battlefield. The protagonist, being surrounded, opposes the endless stream of opponents advancing on the left and right sides of the two -dimensional space. It is impossible to advance forward, and the only way to move by location is to take attacks. The combat system reads the number of simultaneous keystrokes, transforming more of them into a blow with a wide area of defeat.

item.title: Hopeless Sea
item.description: Game Description Hopeless Sea imagines a world submerged after climate catastrophe melts the polar ice caps. A sea level rise of more than 50 meters has rendered 90 of the planet’s coastal cities uninhabitable, forcing survivors to move inland to escape powerful storms. Soon, a new threat emerged from the ocean depths - mutated aggressive sea creatures that began to attack the last strongholds of people. To save civilization, a final mission is sent to the sea to find the source of the creatures and eliminate the root cause of the disaster.

item.title: Scope X
item.description: Game Description Scope X provides the ability to zoom in real time to any selected area of ​​the computer screen, serving as a tool for improving visual access. This lightweight software is designed to improve image clarity for PC gamers and other users across the entire display area. Its central goal is to instantly zoom into specific areas, revealing important details in any active game, without interrupting the process. The utility operates through an overlay, allowing it to work independently of the running software and enlarging the image directly from the monitor.

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description: Game Description Dragon Is Dead throws you headlong into a world remade by a fallen dragon. Gone are the days of majestic flight and fire, replaced by a shadowy kingdom infested with vile creatures. This is not your grandfather’s platformer - here you need not just jump and press buttons, but build a strategy for passing. Each enemy you encounter is a puzzle to solve, a challenge that requires you to adapt your tactics on the fly.

item.title: Hardaf
item.description: Game Description Hardaf offers to move along invisible locations, where each death illuminates a section of a dangerous landscape. The player performs accurate jerks, jumps and jogging at manually created stages, filled with hidden obstacles. The level scheme opens gradually, because traces from each death highlight the further path. This ruthless cycle of deaths and repetitions is the key to promotion in sideling tests. The main plot mode in Hardaf is a campaign of 5 separate chapters containing more than 60 harsh levels.

item.title: Tiny Racing
item.description: Game Description Tiny Racing is an arcade competition that immerses pixel graphics and high speeds in the nostalgic atmosphere of racing with a view of the world. Gamers have to take a variety of vehicles under the control, from trucks to car car, each of which has unique characteristics. Finding 18 unique tracks scattered along three different settings, participants compete both day and night. The development of intuitive management becomes the key to victory, allowing you to make spectacular drifts and overtake rivals on the way to the championship title.

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Zombie Graveyard Simulator features a dual operation cycle: during the day, players handle burials and cremations, tend to graves, satisfy visitor requests, and tend to crops. As night falls, attention turns entirely to defense against the attacks of the walking dead, which requires the erection of barriers to preserve the results of the day’s work and one’s own salvation. This change of activity forms the core of the process.

item.title: DecayZ Origin
item.description: Game Description Decayz Origin is the story of a desperate struggle for life in a world that was destroyed by a viral disaster. In the center of the story is a man whose only goal is to save his loved one from a deadly infection, which makes him go to the very heart of the epidemic. The journey of the protagonist runs through the ruins of civilization, where terrifying mutations and traces of the former tragedy await at every step.

item.title: Galactic Glitch
item.description: Game Description Galactic Glitch is a Roguelike shutter based on physics, in which manipulations with objects play a decisive role in achieving success. The main attention is paid to the use of the environment and weaknesses of the enemy by creative use of the gravitational gun. Instead of relying only on traditional firepower, users need to think using stones, mines and even enemies as a weapon. Acute sensations when you throw an asteroid in the face of the enemy or launch rockets into it, are the main part of the gameplay.

item.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
item.description: Game Description Cyber Knights: Flashpoint is an anti -utopic world in which a modern cyberpunk and a gloomy atmosphere of despair and disobey have intertwined. Since the colonization of the solar system on Earth and in other places, complete anarchy began with illegal trade and hired killers. The player will be in the very center of this new world, exploring his shadow side. Actions take place in 2223 as a result of the environmental disaster and negligence of mankind, the ozone ball was completely destroyed and people were forced to create colonies on more distant planets, the benefit of technology allow.

item.title: Popucom
item.description: Game Description Popucom opens a joint journey for researchers on an unknown planet. Adventurers reach this celestial body to study its territory with his comrades. The process of passage is built on a change of flowers, the use of shells in the type of three in a row and relics of artifacts for overcoming difficulties, maintaining the movement forward and assistance in the revival of the world. This sortie contains various circumstances and a lot of aspects for detecting involved players.

item.title: Paranormal Cleanup
item.description: Game Description Paranormal Cleanup is a cooperative horror with a first -person view. You can play it together, three or four via the Internet. There is also a single mode. The characters are controlled through the mouse and the keyboard. In addition, there is support for gamepads, but only partial. This project is distinguished by its concept, gameplay and atmosphere from other indie chorrorists. The players are assigned to the roles of employees of the cleaning company.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring Nightreign is a separate part of the Universe, where the action takes place in Limgrava, the very first district with the open world, presented in the original series. However, this is not the usual version of Limgrave. The world here is procedurally generated, which means that each passage offers unique experience. Users fall into the game with their team of two people, each of whom has their own abilities.

item.title: Missing Banban
item.description: Game Description Missing Banban begins with the fact that the sheriff of Toadster, the main character, is faced with the mysterious disappearance of his friend. At the same time, in his world, experiencing shock, dark power begins to act. The players are assigned the role of this sheriff-jibs, the only one who is able to withstand the threat and understand what is happening over the course of many stages. The central task is the search for a missing comrade - a mission pushing the protagonist to adventures.

item.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
item.description: Game Description Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo is a 2D top-down action adventure focused on urban exploration. Gamers navigate vast environments, mastering yo-yo maneuvers for movement and direct confrontation. The task is to counter rival criminal leaders and their henchmen in different areas of the metropolis in order to regain the influence of the Pipistrello family. This project combines combat, movement and puzzles, all presented in a plot that reveals corporate intrigue.

item.title: Project Warlock 2
item.description: Game Description Among the fiery battles of Project Warlock 2, there is a rational grain - the confrontation between the forces of light and darkness. In a world full of vile creatures, the main character learned the art of magic from his mentor. But waking up in an abandoned castle, the protagonist discovers that his teacher has disappeared without a trace, and the area is literally infested with monsters. Pulling himself together, Palmer reloads his staff and goes in search of his comrade, simultaneously crushing herds of brainless demonic henchmen.

item.title: Shape Shifter: Formations
item.description: Game Description Shape Shifter: Formations - This is an exciting two -osti shooter with Rogue -Lite mechanics, which brings a fresh stream in the genre. In this game, gamers have to fight with the waves of geometric enemies, passing through tense scenarios of bullet adhesive hell. Whether it is a single flight or a local cooperative with a friend, Adventure offers a number of tests that will check reflexes and strategic thinking.

item.title: Alien Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Alien Market Simulator begins with the player tasked with running a market on a space station in a remote location, as a direct result of a connection with the Intergalactic Police. Restoring freedom depends on the success of the enterprise, requiring daily reports to authorities through the complex’s system. The main task is to develop the facility, which requires modernization, into a point with a large volume of trading operations for alien buyers.

item.title: Garden of Witches
item.description: Game Description Garden of Witches will tell about the strength - a girl who makes his way through a dangerous magical world to return order. Its goal is to find the escaped witches who violated agreements and abandoned the garden. The place is rapidly destroyed, but the strength is not going to allow Leni to destroy everything that she built. Each promotion requires actions, choice and readiness for a fight.

item.title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
item.description: Game Description The player in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon will have to unravel the secrets of the guards of menhirs, threatening the main character of the main character. The role -playing adventure will occur in an open world based on rethought classical legends about King Arthur. The user will be able to design his own deck of various cards with unique features and use. The plot begins with the death of Avalon.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Two Strikes
item.description: Game Description Battles in Two Strikes take users into casual duels set in the bloody period of ancient Japan. The game is made in the genre of a two-dimensional fighting game, where you have to face opponents and fight to the death, using edged weapons and martial arts skills that allow you to push your opponent away or jump over him in the arena. In battle you have to use strikes, blocks and special techniques that help open up the enemy’s vulnerabilities.

item.title: Deliver At All Costs
item.description: Game Description Deliver At All Costs is a courier simulator that allows you to experience the real madness and bustle of this profession. Trying to deliver a package, you will end up in constant traffic jams, ridiculous situations, etc. You need to move around the city in your used pickup truck. However, it has one feature: the ability to accelerate using nitro. Deliver At All Costs is a project that places a huge emphasis on humor and madness.

item.title: Loss
item.description: Game Description Loss represents a narrative concentrated on a teenager who is faced with family tragedies. He wakes up one night and discovers the disappearance of his family members from their house, which encourages him to begin the trial. The gameplay includes the movement of housing, collecting objects and keys to open new areas, as well as a solution to riddles to understand what is happening. The study of the situation becomes important for restoring the chain of events that led to its isolation.

item.title: Mindkatt: first stud
item.description: Game Description mindkatt: first strike represents a setting in which cats with developed intelligence use mechanical structures to interact in human society. This project puts players in a futuristic environment, where despotistical orders reign. These cats, having passed serious mental evolution, are in contact with the world through robotic devices. Their life in this difficult era, subject to people, forms the core of history. In the general world, Mindkatt: First Strike, human groups are kept under the control of Mindkatt - a developed type of cats facing slavery.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: Windward Horizon
item.description: Game Description Windward Horizon immerses you in a vast open world with a focus on exploration and naval combat. As a captain, not tied to any faction, the player begins a journey through a unique map, randomly generated in each new playthrough. The project offers freedom of choice: you can trade, complete quests, look for treasures, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of a relaxing sea voyage. Windward Horizon can be played either solo or in co-op.

item.title: Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time
item.description: Game Description In Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time, immersion in the atmosphere of leisurely existence within the boundaries of the fantasy world is available. This title includes the possibility of changing roles among 14 different professions called lives. Participants can collect resources by fishing or wood harvesting, cooking, form an island space, or unite with other gamers to confront creatures in extensive areas. The narrative begins with the adventurer’s accession to the team of the archaeologist Edward on a sea journey.

item.title: Regulators
item.description: Game Description Regulators sets before a detachment of mercenaries the task of stripping the city from mutating villains with weapons, gadgets and special abilities. The team penetrates into buildings from streets, roofs or sewers to fulfill the goals leading to the scientist, commander of the antagonists. The situation began after the fall of an asteroid that released the alien substance of the UZ. It was soon found that this material has narcotic potential and causes mutations in all its exposure, including the detachment fighters themselves.

item.title: Wool at the Gates
item.description: Game Description Wool at the Gates presents a tactical defense experience. This project combines base defense mechanics, auto-battler-style synergy elements, and hero character control. User takes on the role of commander, leading the allied forces and building defenses for the city. This structure creates a cycle involving strategic preparation and subsequent combat engagements against advancing swarms of sheep. The gameplay unfolds in stages, the complexity of which increases. Each stage in Wool at the Gates consists of a construction phase and a subsequent battle against enemy formations.

item.title: Desktop Survivors 98
item.description: Game Description Desktop Survivors 98 Places the gaming cursor directly into the operational environment of the computer. This pointer acts as a central element, moving through the generated areas and entering into battle with the emerging groups of enemies. Players find and collect various objects and weapons designed to facilitate their further advancement and survival through subsequent threats. The cyclic structure directs through stages that require constant confrontation between the advancing waves of opponents, organized maneuvering in the determined zones and the necessary repetition of these actions for further penetration.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation. In Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition, each action has consequences.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: The Last Visit: 98th
item.description: Game Description The Last Visit: 98th is a first-person psychological horror game set in a post-Soviet winter setting. The gameplay immerses you in adventure and exploration, increasing the sense of fear through the developing story. This path passes through familiar places, involving you in the gloomy reality of the late 1990s. The project imagines a world where tension is formed from personal memories and environmental details. In 1998, the central character returns to the places of his childhood.

item.title: The Siege and the Sandfox
item.description: Game Description The Siege and the Sandfox - this is exciting fantasy steam -metrousing, in which you will find a dangerous adventure in the besieged kingdom. You will become a legendary sandy fox, master of parkour and secrecy, and go in search of evil hiding in the sands. It is necessary to explore the palace and ancient dungeons, using all your skills to find out where the source is located. Run, jump, slide, balance and swing to go through a complex world filled with useful objects, new equipment and skills.

item.title: Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos
item.description: Game Description Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos puts a gamer in the face of endless streams of hostile creatures. Subjects develop new skills and strengthen their capabilities. The main task is to climb inside the tower, striving for its top to find the fulfillment of personal, most secret desires. This desire requires a clash with continuous opposition, sometimes at a very expensive price, and adaptation of its state to battle.

item.title: Galaxy HighWays
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Highways puts a player at the head of a star pilot after the discovery of alien gate to mankind led to the destruction of the Earth. The surviving representatives of civilization founded the colony of the last hope - a settlement, which is constantly threatened by the same alien force, striving to detect it. As a pilot of the special forces, the main function is to protect the colony by completing tasks, including attacks on enemy attitudes, the defense of friendly caravans and the seizure of aliens for research.

item.title: Abyss Chaser
item.description: Game Description Abyss Chaser invites you to immerse yourself in a dark world where special keys are required to descend into the depths of Hell. The only way to obtain them is to defeat the powerful demonic bosses that desecrate the Forsaken Lands. That’s exactly what Abaddon does, the unjustly maligned rebel angel who travels the scorched wastes on his motorcycle. Driven by a thirst for revenge, he seeks not only to restore his reputation and regain what was lost, but also to cleanse this region of the monsters that have infested it, breaking through hordes of enemies to his final goal.

item.title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
item.description: Game Description Capcom Fighting Collection 2 brings together eight fighting games from the company’s archives. This set contains projects such as Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice. In addition, the selection includes 3D action games such as Power Stone and Power Stone 2, representing a range of titles covering different time periods. Players have access to this set of experiences in one single edition.

item.title: Manifest Destiny
item.description: Game Description Manifest Destiny is a meta-pixel adventure in which the protagonist, as the creator of the virtual world, gains almost unlimited power over it. Instead of the usual weapons for battles and solving puzzles, he uses fundamental development tools. The process of overcoming obstacles is tied to creativity and imagination, allowing you to change the very logic of the environment. The opponents here are not just enemies, but elements of code that can be reprogrammed.

item.title: Cubic Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Cubic Odyssey is a large -scale project with an open setting that combines the elements of research, survival and creativity. Users move according to procedured planets, interact with a variety of ecosystems and fight with the upcoming force known as red darkness. In the universe there are planets with a changing environment, ancient ruins and settlements inhabited by NPC fraction. Each place is complex tasks and opportunities that require strategic resource management and adaptation.

item.title: Labyrinth Of The Demon King
item.description: Game Description Labyrinth Of The Demon King places the gamer in a first-person perspective in a monster-infested environment inspired by feudal Japan. You will take on the role of Ashigaru, a foot soldier whose master was deceived and killed by a powerful demonic entity. The main objective involves navigating a complex maze, encountering hostile creatures, and finding the specific demon responsible for the master’s death in order to take revenge.

item.title: The Precint
item.description: Game Description The Precint is a police officer single -user simulator that immerses gamers into the lively urban environment of the 1980s. Having entered the place of Officer Nick Cordell Jr., users are traveling as a beginner who recently graduated from the police academy. Against the background of Averno City, an active life is in full swing, a wide range of procedured crimes is presented in it, from minor violations of the rules of the road to large robberies of banks.

item.title: Chambers
item.description: Game Description Chambers Simits a gamer in a role -playing shooter with a wild West setting with its own features. The plot puts the protagonist in the world, split by the war for a drink, where the antagonists, known as the Reds, seized power. These enemies divided the territory into separate zones - cameras. The main character moves around this world in search of a specific coffin. An unusual environment combines the elements of the western with gloomy humor and horror.

item.title: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
item.description: Game Description KETZ: Galactic Overlords is a game in a science fiction setting, where gamers participate in the Rowli-hord survival with RPG elements. Each gamer chooses a character and collects items to create unique assemblies using the possibilities received from galactic leaders. These gamers overcome tireless clashes, trying to survive and understand why these powerful figures provide assistance. In Ketz: Galactic Overlords, users improve their combat capabilities through specialized systems. Progresses implies an improvement in the resulting equipment.

item.title: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2 - fishing simulator, offering to participate in a huge number of tests and demonstrate many different techniques. Use a wide set of tools and gear: feeder, overlap, spinning, classic float and much more. Continuation of the game significantly improves the graphic component, adds many mechanics, tools and improves all aspects of the gameplay. More and better - the basic principle of Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2.

item.title: Dino Path Trail
item.description: Game Description Dino Path Trail shows the world where dinosaurs survived to the era, similar to the wild West, setting a person to survive in this altered land. The main goal includes the search and salvation of a stolen sister through the intersection of various lands full of dangers. The chances of surviving are strongly dependent on the solutions and actions of the player as part of the structure of this action-rowlaine, where it is necessary to repulse predators, hostile people and elements.

item.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet
item.description: Game Description Revenge of the Savage Planet throws the player into alien locations. The character turns out to be thrown on the edge of the space by the former corporate employer. The central task is to move around alien territories, collecting resources and finding improvements to organize home and revenge the corporation, guilty of its position. The study of the area includes the detection of hidden objects and the interaction with the environment.

item.title: Rift Riff
item.description: Game Description Rift Riff throws gamers into the cracks between worlds to battle monsters and collect valuables. Gameplay is built around tower defense, requiring careful placement and control of structures. Before the start of the mission, you will have to determine a set of defense structures and then build them on the map at the designated points. A key aspect of Rift Riff is selecting defensive structures to counter enemy types and their attacks.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description Tank Squad transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: Hordes of Hunger
item.description: Game Description Hordes of Hunger offers a script where a gamer has to control a world, a heroine whose task is to protect his native lands. A certain essence, known as a beast, came out of the sea with her hordes, starting an invasion, comparable to a living starvation, devouring everything around. The world becomes the main obstacle to this unstoppable invasion of monsters in the conditions of dark fantasy. The project immerses in three -dimensional battles, where the main goal is to survive under the onslaught of the ongoing waves of opponents.

item.title: Trench Tales
item.description: Game Description Trench Tales is a game project that introduces gamers to a dark alternative reality, the events of which take place between the First and Second World Wars. You take control of a lone fighter, transported to the strange dimension of Verdun by the actions of unknown forces. The story is told in third person, focusing on the action in this dysfunctional environment with elements of horror and dark fantasy.

item.title: Drop Duchy
item.description: Game Description Drop Duchy combines the mechanics of geometric puzzles with the construction of the territory and the management of resources. Gamers use falling figures not only to clean the lines, but also for the phased construction of possessions. The task is to collect materials and the formation of troops to confront enemy armies, while each installed block contributes to the development of the kingdom on the path to the triumph.

item.title: Knights of the Crusades
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Crusades sends a player during the first crusades, where a lone knight will come to begin. It is ahead to go to the foundation and management of the holy order, choosing the Templars or creating their own fraction. The process combines real -time elements with the construction of settlements and management within the sandbox. You have to solve problems related to war, religious influence, diplomacy and strategic planning.

item.title: Codename: Ocean Keeper
item.description: Game Description Codename: Ocean Keeper - this survival role-playing adventure game plunges users into the mysterious depths of an underwater planet, where space pirates explore the secrets hidden under the waves. The mechanics take inspiration from games like Dome Keeper and Vampire Survivors, while the atmospheric elements echo StarCraft, Stormgate and Project Entropy. In Codename: Ocean Keeper, gamers control a crab-like robot tasked with exploration, mining, and combat. The game takes place in three separate cycles.

item.title: Maze Mice
item.description: Game Description MAZE MICE is an action rogal, where the current playing time depends on the input of the gamer; Time goes forward only when the character moves. It is necessary to control the avatar inside the labyrinths, collecting a point for advancement in the locations. The accumulation of points brings experience points, allowing you to increase the hero level and open access to the choice of upgrades that change its characteristics.

item.title: Sipssassin
item.description: Game Description Sipssassin offers a gamer to devastate glasses of unsuspecting personalities, using secrecy tactics, special gadgets and near -battle weapons. A long -standing confrontation unfolds between the Sipssassins and the villains of the villains, because the latter strive for world domination through control of drinks. Your task is to methodically drain every affordable container for detecting secret opponents and disrupting their operations. This project provides 5 unique missions for execution in an arbitrary sequence, offering a nonlinear advancement in the plot.

item.title: Vellum
item.description: Game Description Vellum throws gamers into a world filled with strategic combat and decision-making. Go it alone or team up with others to overcome challenges and gain control of your journey. The main highlight of Vellum is the innovative mechanics of influencing the enemy’s development. This gives the strategy an extra layer that goes beyond simply winning the next fight. The heart beats with collaboration. Team up with friends to overcome obstacles together.

item.title: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
item.description: Game Description Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World immerses gamer into a fantasy environment after turning into a steakman with a dragon flame. This universe accepts unusual inhabitants, allowing the style of the stickman to fit into local life. The player will have to achieve goals like capturing castles, the acquisition of land or command of a detachment in this world. The activity is not limited to battles and covers the study of the dungeons, the search for values, trade, farming and the creation of things.

item.title: Conquest Dark
item.description: Game Description Conquest Dark is an action-RPG, whose action takes place 237 years after the arrival of a black planet, the events that led humanity to the threshold of destruction. In this alternative medieval history, the legions of non -life control the fallen kingdoms, the cosmic gods are overthrown, and the ancient original people woke up from sleep. Participants in the events choose dark rituals for interacting with the forces responsible for the collapse of civilization in the setting of fantasy-united with an isometric camera and aspects of mythology.

item.title: Deadzone: Rogue
item.description: Game Description Deadzone: rogue immerses the gamer into events on board the ISS-X vessel, located in deep space, where the protagonist recovers without memories. Faced with the upcoming legions of hostile vehicles, the character is forced to enter into battles from the first person in the compartments of the ship, from machine departments to the Kardzer. Survival depends on the movement of these locations and collisions with numerous mechanical opponents.

item.title: G-MODE ARMORED CORE MOBILE MISSION
item.description: Game Description G-MODE ARMORED CORE MOBILE MISSION is a top-down tactical action game that immerses you in the world of combat robot battles. The basis of the gameplay is a cycle of completing tasks, for which the pilot receives a reward in the form of currency and new components. These resources are directed towards the deep modernization of our own fur, allowing us to constantly strengthen it to withstand growing threats.

item.title: Galactic Plague 2000
item.description: Game Description Galactic Plague 2000 is a large-scale space war against ruthless Martian invaders who have threatened the existence of the entire galaxy. Survival in this chaos directly depends on the constant improvement of the manned starship and unlocking legendary weapons. Each encounter with enemy squadrons becomes a real test of strength, forcing you to adapt tactics and make the most efficient use of the ship’s resources to repel the alien plague.

item.title: gogh: Focus with Your Avatar
item.description: Game Description Gogh: Focus with Your Avatar combines focus tools and simulation gameplay mechanics, allowing you to create a character and design a location. Gamers interact with a virtual hero and a companion creature in a variable room. This project includes time management tools in addition to customization capabilities. The main task is to help with work sessions through a combination of these elements of the simulation game. In gogh: Focus with Your Avatar, a person arranges his own room by arranging furniture, choosing decor and choosing a palette.

item.title: Kiborg
item.description: Game Description Kiborg provides a script where it is necessary to take control of the personality imprisoned in the prison of the future. Sentenced to 1300 for other people’s crimes, the main character falls into a system where death means only restoration of the body and further serving of the deadline. The only chance of freedom is to participate in the brutal event of The Last Ticket, where you need to break into the shuttle on the roof of the building, fighting with crowds of other convicts.

item.title: Path of Kung Fu
item.description: Game Description Path of Kung Fu throws you headlong into the world, filled with intrigues of martial arts. You start like no one, a nameless face in a huge crowd of supper Kung fu. But this is not some pre -destined path - you yourself determine your fate. Forget about hard classes and linear plot lines. Path of Kung Fu allows you to go to the sandbox overflowing with capabilities. Hundreds of martial arts techniques are waiting for them to master.

item.title: Wizordum
item.description: Game Description Wizordum is a first -person retro -player in which gamers assign the role of a magician going to search for a chaos source. The Title combines the elements of the classic shooters of the 90s and modern gameplay mechanics. Users move around the world of terrabrum using various spells and magic objects to combat enemies and overcoming obstacles. The gameplay focuses on research and battles. Users should strategically use their arsenal of spells to defeat a number of enemies, each of which has unique habits and methods of attack.

item.title: Badlands Crew
item.description: Game Description Badlands Crew transfers to the gamer control over a combat vehicle in the world of lawlessness that arose after a global catastrophe. Key tasks include the construction of transport, its modification and use against hostile groups for the search and salvation of the survivors. You collect your mobile fortress from individual components, selecting elements such as flamethrowers, sniper turrets, rate of fire machine guns, observation tower and medical points.

item.title: Necrophosis
item.description: Game Description Necrophosis is not a typical horror with jumping. This first -person puzzle throws you headlong into a nightmare, blurring the boundaries between reality and the world created on the basis of our gloomy fears. The alarming atmosphere hangs with a heavy load, being a permanent companion when you move through landscapes, smelling of decay. Do not expect the story to be given from the spoon. Here, the narrative unfolds like mysterious poetry, and each puzzle - as a verse, whispering secrets.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: Vietnam War
item.description: Game Description Vietnam War offers a single-player, open-world, first-person immersion experience set against the backdrop of a historical conflict. Gamers choose sides: the forces of the United States or the Viet Cong fighters of the North Vietnamese Army, operating in a variety of landscapes. This project includes squad management mechanics that allow you to lead soldiers in combat situations. In addition, there are other units on the battlefield, autonomously participating in clashes, which adds dynamics to the environment.

item.title: Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy
item.description: Game Description Amerzone - The Explorer’s Legacy takes you on a journey to the Great White Birds, who live in a secluded land full of many secrets. The player takes on the role of a young journalist fulfilling the last wishes of a deceased researcher and embarking on a mission across the globe. The destination is the forgotten Latin American country of Amerzon, a place where outsiders rarely set foot.

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
item.description: Game Description Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 throws you headlong into a world where fashionable French hats meet fire-breathing monsters. This turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics turns combat into a frantic dance between strategic thinking and burning reflexes. You lead Expedition 33, a group set out not on a treasure hunt, but on a life-or-death mission. What is your goal? An artist whose artistic talents are too… lethal. Every brushstroke brings destruction, and you must stop her creativity forever.

item.title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
item.description: Game Description FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves is released as a new chapter in the fighting game series, 26 years after the release of the previous main part. This project includes mechanics that provide special offensive capabilities from the very beginning of the fight. It covers the moves REV Arts, REV Accel and REV Blows (with S.P.G. active), and its use is limited by the REV Meter, which overheats from intensive use.

item.title: Tempest Rising
item.description: Game Description Tempest Rising is designed for fans of real-time strategy games. This title emulates the classic representatives of the RTS genre from the late 90s and early 2000s. The video game uses an isometric view, but has fully 3D graphics. There are 3 factions to choose from. The gameplay for each of them is noticeably different. The project is made in a science fiction setting. The events shown in it take place in an alternative world.

item.title: Oppidum
item.description: Game Description Oppidum takes the player to the island of Insul, where they will have to master the mechanics of survival alone or in a team of up to four people. The characters find themselves in a land of widespread decline due to a deep-rooted corruption that has fractured the local society. Key gameplay elements include setting up a central camp, systematically gathering supplies scattered throughout Insul, and navigating its varied zones.

item.title: CyberCorp
item.description: Game Description CyberCorp is a top-down shooter made in a cyberpunk setting. The gameplay is aimed at dynamic shooting and looting. As the main character, you will have to fight for the future of humanity. Both single player campaign and co-op play are available. Events take place in the 25th century. CyberCorp Corporation has learned to create robotic human bodies by transferring the consciousness of living people into them. The first subjects were the military.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered is a large-scale processing on the Unreal Engine 5 engine, completely transforming the appearance of an open world of a cult action-RPG. Title takes 25 times more disk space thanks to comprehensively processed and improved landscape textures. Also, the mechanisms of lighting and background shading were seriously revised with the addition of volumetric effects that change the type of premises and night locations.

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description: Game Description Tower Unite is a very unusual MMO. Here, users walk and get acquainted on a large central hub called Plaza and Island. In fact, this is such a large amusement park. At the same time, one can play here alone. The project was first made on the basis of Garry’s Mod. Over time, it turned into a full -fledged separate product. The game allows gamers to create their own creativity inside it and share with others.

item.title: BodyRecords
item.description: Game Description BodyRecords presents gameplay primarily through a body camera view. Microphones directly impact the digital environment; Sounds made by players, including speech, may attract the attention of entities. Participants move through specific locations in search of specific data. This information is necessary to determine and provide an exit route. Successful progression relies heavily on group coordination, especially when solving integrated puzzles encountered during exploration. This element of cooperation is a necessity for players seeking to overcome the challenges presented together.

item.title: Echoes of yi: samsara
item.description: Game Description Echoes of yi: samsara - an action that includes elements of Chinese culture. Gamers will take on the role of a student of the master of the sword. He was instructed to confront enemies and investigate the circumstances associated with the Jiangu tree. The narrative puts a situation where the player must decide whether to face the opening truth or go in a different way. This adventure includes a study of the world of spirits in an attempt to prevent global cataclysms.

item.title: Sunset Motel
item.description: Game Description Sunset Motel invites you to take on the challenge of running a small but busy hotel business. This is not just a game about cleaning rooms, it is about creating an atmosphere where guests can feel at home. In this world, you are responsible for transforming outdated spaces into a welcoming space. Each renovation choice is a step toward creating a unique motel that your guests will return to again and again.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description IT’s on the Mouse combines a cafe management with a 3D platformer, providing players with control over the main characters of Holly. Being a tiny maid, she is forced to use a special navigation method in the working environment due to her growth. The gamer has to jump and run around the tables and racks to get to customers and submit orders to them. This movement system is central mechanics for receiving applications and delivery of the desired dishes.

item.title: Polterguys: Possession Party
item.description: Game Description Polterguys: Possession Party throws eight ghostly players in a competition with an indirect confrontation. The main task is to lure opponents on the path of a stray monster. Gamers control spirits capable of instilling in ordinary objects and turning them into tools of deception. Each of 10 unique levels is filled with physical traps and the dangers of the environment. Success depends on the ability to use these elements for strategic elimination of rivals, while avoiding the creature pursuing all.

item.title: White Knuckle
item.description: Game Description In White Knuckle, gamers will have to overcome the destructive structure of the Sub-STRUCTURA 17. It is based on a mechanic based on a pulse that requires accuracy and quick reflexes. Each step matters, because one wrong movement can send a gamer to a dark abyss below. The essence is to manage resources and inventory, which is becoming more and more important as users lift their limits higher and higher.

item.title: Bionic Bay
item.description: Game Description Bionic Bay is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. The plot tells about the adventures of an ordinary person in an unusual world. The story is told without words or full cut scenes. The game has a dark and mysterious atmosphere. The project is divided into levels. Already completed maps can be replayed. Their selection is available through the main menu. The gameplay is built around unique physics and the hero’s ability to change places with certain objects.

item.title: Drive Rally
item.description: Game Description Drive Rally is an arcade game about rally races that transfers gamers during the glory of the 1990s. Having focused on speeds, skill and exciting sensations of an open road, Advencura offers nostalgic experience for fans of classic rally races. Users take on the role of a rally racer, competing in various iconic places around the world. From the dusty deserts of Africa to the snowy peaks of Scandinavia - each area offers unique trials and opportunities.

item.title: Laser Tag Massacre
item.description: Game Description Laser Tag Massacre puts the player in the script in the spirit of slasers of the 1980s. Events unfold on the night of Halloween, when a group of 5 friends is going to celebrate a holiday in a large abandoned gym. This dilapidated structure is located in the remote part of the Campinas, Brazil, which isolates the characters from any external assistance. Their plan for the usual match in the laser tag is sharply interrupted by the appearance of a hostile presence, shifting the focus from resting for self -preservation.

item.title: Chains of Freedom
item.description: Game Description Chains of Freedom puts the gamer under control of an elite military unit in a fictional dystopian Eastern European country. This title falls into the turn-based tactics genre, focusing on strategic combat scenarios from an isometric perspective. Users complete tasks aimed at uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the state. Achieving goals depends on the correct use of team members and adaptation of formations during clashes. The core gameplay in Chains of Freedom involves turn-based combat, where players plan every move for their squad members.

item.title: D.O.T. Defense
item.description: Game Description D.O.T. Defense involves building towers, gathering forces and seizing control of the map for the sake of victory - you need to save your headquarters last. Gamers fight in local sessions that support one-on-one, two-on-two, or all-versus-all formats against live or AI opponents. The player’s task is to systematically destroy enemy headquarters while simultaneously protecting his own base. This real-time strategy title combines tower defense mechanics and automated squad battles.

item.title: Forever skies
item.description: Game Description Forever skies is an atypical survival in the world of post -apocalypse, where the player will become the captain of the airship. Unfortunately, the protagonist is the only crew member, but even this does not reduce the number of his problems. After all, he still needs food, which is practically no in the air with the exception of rare birds. And the technique tends to break, and it requires constantly replacing old details.

item.title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
item.description: Game Description RuneScape: Dragonwilds introduces gamers to Ashenfall, the forgotten continent of the RuneScape universe where dragons have awakened. This open world experience challenges 1-4 players to survive together or alone. The gameplay is based on collecting resources, constructing buildings, developing skills and creating things. The main task is to hunt down the dragons and fight their Queen. Survival in RuneScape: Dragonwilds is constantly complicated by the threat of dragons that roam the lands.

item.title: Viscerafest
item.description: Game Description Viscerafest is a dynamic shooter made in retro style. The game takes you into a sci-fi world where you have to fight alien invaders and various creepy monsters. The arsenal of weapons consists of various futuristic guns. Allows you to take the barrel in your hand to destroy enemies, shooting Macedonian style. Events take place in 3796. The main character of Viscerafest is named Caroline. She is a mercenary and a psychopath rolled into one.

item.title: Bureau of Contacts
item.description: Game Description Bureau of Contacts throws you into the digital kingdom, which is simultaneously strategic and adventurous. This is not just pressing the buttons - here you need the ability to think. An intricate story unfolds in different areas, each of which is filled with puzzles and interesting characters encountered on the way. Be prepared to reveal secrets, gaining unexpected allies and a complex choice that can decide or break your progress.

item.title: Monaco 2
item.description: Game Description Monaco 2 invites the player to assemble a specialized squad to carry out cunning heist operations. The main setting is the city of Monaco, presented as a location with many valuable targets due to the wealth concentrated there. Gamers embody members of an international group of criminal specialists seeking to exploit these conditions for material gain. Success requires careful movement through locations, bypassing security and retrieving intended valuables in a tense environment.

item.title: Traveler's refrain
item.description: Game Description Traveler’s Refrain talks about the wanderings of a protagonist with the name traveler in a forbidden forest who seeks to find his lost lover. It carries a special tool, Buzuki, which begins to vibrate and make sounds when approaching a certain mechanism in this closed area. The tool pronounces the words with a voice devoid of reason, indicating the traveler to find 3 destinies and thereby setting the direction to his subsequent steps.

item.title: Crashlands 2
item.description: Game Description Crashlands 2 Returns you to the crazy world of Wuanop. Flux Deibs, all the beloved intergalactic trucker, was again in a difficult position. This time forget about the transportation of goods. It is about reunite with old friends and getting new, eccentric. But these are not only calls to the old cosmic friends. We are talking about the connections that you create. Friendship with Voanop’s colorful character opens the door, and literally.

item.title: Hollow Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hollow Survivors is Rogue -Like Dungeon Crawler, in which gamers take on the role of one of the last rational Hollow in the world captured by terrible monsters. Then the users have to fight with the endless waves of enemies, rising to the tower, which is under the control of the ominous cult. Along the way, you will find a variety of weapons, improvements and synergistic effects that will help you survive and survive.

item.title: Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days
item.description: Game Description Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days transfer the player to Walton City, Texas, 1980 sample, covered by a zombie epidemic. The gamer has to lead a detachment of surviving through the dying metropolis. The key task of the gameplay is to move the wards between temporary shelters, taking care of their condition. It is necessary to find provisions, make objects and repulse constant danger from the dead who filled the streets.

item.title: Asgard's Fall - Viking Survivors
item.description: Game Description Asgard’s Fall - Viking Survivors offers a Scandinavian roguelike that focuses on fighting against multiple opponents. The characters will have to make their way through crowds of creatures in the Nine Realms, seeking to challenge the gods of Asgard. The choice of protagonists, such as Warrior or Huntress, offers different starting options, each with unique skill trees to level up; these decisions influence the gamer’s approach to upcoming battles.

item.title: Driveloop: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Driveloop: Survivors puts the player behind the wheel of a rigged car as it navigates a dangerous urban landscape following an unspecified disaster. Gamers will use driving techniques, including skidding and ramming, along with shooting to destroy opponents in a steampunk style. You need to withstand the onslaught of enemy waves in destroyed cities. Success depends on maneuvering the vehicle, choosing an attack position and avoiding threats on the battlefield.

item.title: Slime Squisher
item.description: Game Description Slime Squisher is an arcade project that combines roguelike and clicker mechanics, where the main task is to protect a defenseless berry. The basis for successful completion is the creation of unique assemblies from many improvements, which are unlocked after repelling each enemy wave. The gamer has an extensive arsenal at his disposal, allowing him to customize tactics to suit his style of combat. Progression is implemented through a system of permanent upgrades acquired between runs, which adds strategic depth to the process.

item.title: Used Cars Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Used Cars Simulator you will plunge headlong into the world of buying, selling and everything in between. You’ll search for cars, from shiny, barely used to salvaged, salvaged ones, trying to estimate their value before they land on your lot. Every decision you make matters - will you sell this car to make a quick buck, or restore it to its former glory to make a bigger profit?

item.title: South of Midnight
item.description: Game Description South of Midnight is not a typical adventure action. Of course, there is a study and battles here, but this game plunges into the southern folklore, erasing the boundaries between real and mythical. This is an experience that breaks out of the usual genre mold. You play for Heisel, moving along the shadow underground of the deep south. This is a beautiful but disturbing place where the destroying landscapes whisper the secrets of the past.

item.title: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Babushka’s Glitch Dungeon offers the player to do methodical cleaning of a huge magical basement. Armed with a broom, the heroine sweeps dust, confronts the monsters and destroys insects surrounded. The protagonist also masters bright witch’s magic, fundamentally changing established rules. The study of the world involves the solution of puzzles and the detection of hiding places, while each creature has a unique mechanics that requires a special approach to overcome it.

item.title: Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye-
item.description: Game Description Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye - marks the continuation of the TGM series, originating in the arcade halls. This fourth part goes after a 20-year break between the main parts of the series, representing new elements in the established formula. The project contains content designed both for beginners unfamiliar with the specific style of the series, and for gamers with extensive experience. Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye offers several passage options, including recently introduced ASUKA and Shiranui options.

item.title: Vaporwave Pinball
item.description: Game Description Vaporwave Pinball is about immersing yourself in the relaxing atmosphere of liminal spaces, presented in the form of a tiny fantasy operating system. The process unfolds on several tables, each of which immerses you in a unique environment. The locations include both indoor pools and outdoor areas with black and white checkered floors. As you progress, new, more complex arenas open up, requiring honing your skills. Some of them are made in an unexpected horror style, adding a touch of tension to the gameplay.

item.title: Sephiria
item.description: Game Description Sephiria is a combination of equipment management, battle and research. Users manage a rabbit who is instructed to change the fate of the mystical tower standing on the verge of destruction. As they pass the procedured levels, gamers face creatures with unpredictable motives. These animals can offer help, look for it or pose a threat. The decision about who to trust and how to interact with these characters will be able to significantly affect the course of the game.

item.title: The Last of US Part 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Last of US Part II Remastered goes to the PC and transfers the narrative experience of the Naughty Dog to a new platform. Players fall into a world where survival intersects with personal revenge, following the main characters of Ellie and Abby along the interconnected plot lines. The game takes place in the post -pandemic landscape and transfers participants in territories, transformed infection and human conflicts. Jackson, Wyming, serves as an initial background on which the characters are in the framework of the survivor community.

item.title: cheapskate
item.description: Game Description cheapskate is an arcade skateboarding simulator where the gameplay philosophy is based on complete freedom of action and self-expression. The mechanics are based on predictable and responsive arcade physics, completely eliminating any elements of uncontrolled realism. Precise digital controls provide complete control over every movement, allowing you to perform tricks with great stability. The project is aimed at both veterans of the genre and newcomers, offering a low barrier to entry, but at the same time motivating them to hone their skills.

item.title: Lurking Danger
item.description: Game Description Lurking Danger is a survival horror gaming experience where two waitresses, Elena and Regina, become embroiled in the mystery of a regular customer’s disappearance. Their investigation quickly moves into an altered reality, where familiar places are distorted and familiar logic ceases to work. Gamers will have to face a hostile environment alone or using local co-op in split screen. The key goal is to locate the missing person while simultaneously dealing with threats to the transformed reality.

item.title: Veil of Sanity
item.description: Game Description Veil of Sanity is an intense psychological horror game where survival depends on your ability to remain lucid under constant threat. The basis of the whole action is the relentless pursuit by a creepy clown in the territory of an abandoned carnival. Every creak and rustle can give away your location, turning any mistake into a fatal one. Resisting mental pressure and controlling your own fear become key to maintaining your sanity.

item.title: STORROR Parkour Pro
item.description: Game Description STORROR Parkour Pro is a parkour simulator set in the Isle of Dogs, London. Users navigate these urban environments using a set of motor abilities derived from the discipline of parkour. Available actions include jumping, climbing, overcoming obstacles, somersaulting, sliding, swinging and running across rooftops and streets. The character’s movement is provided by an animation system that combines motion capture data from parkour athletes with physics calculations to depict dynamics.

item.title: Godstone
item.description: Game Description Godstone users will make their way through dark dungeons filled with monsters. 5 different sorcerers are available for a choice, for which you can go to study the ruins of Wiritian. The main task for the protagonist will be the search for a valuable divine stone, which is lost in the depths of gloomy catacombs. The game is an atmospheric dungeon-crawler with elements of the Rowl, where you need to wander the character through two-dimensional locations with the side of the side.

item.title: Within the Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Within the Cosmos is a first -person science fiction role -playing advent of which takes place in 2278. Gamers wake up in a secluded star system, where they face a split human society. This society fights with a growing threat from androids, which leads to serious stress. The background is the star system of Adallio, where users were once part of a mission launched by the united space agency of the Earth.

item.title: Ambidextro
item.description: Game Description Ambidextro puts the user in the place of a royal wizard, tasked with rescuing the prince and princess from the clutches of the witch. However, the challenge goes beyond simple navigation. The Wizard has been split into two parts, forcing the gamer to control both halves independently of each other. Each hand controls a different character, requiring precise coordination to overcome obstacles and reunite the two parts before time runs out.

item.title: Emissary Zero
item.description: Game Description Emissary Zero is a title in which a group of people under cover of darkness enters an unfamiliar building. With minimal tips from a remote manager, they are looking for something called the moon, hoping to leave him intact. The structure is unpredictable, it shifts as they move, forcing them to navigate in space, which refuses to be understandable. Each sound alone becomes a potential threat; Together, coordination becomes both a tool and a risk.

item.title: Break The Empire
item.description: Game Description Break The Empire is an action rogal, where the goal is to get to the capital and eliminate the emperor. Gamers have to choose one of the 6 heroes, each has six unique spells and six passive castomization skills. Additionally, 12 common abilities are available for any build, which allows you to try different approaches to the main task - the destruction of the imperial system.
