The battles include the irreversible death of the hero, which increases the rates of each solution and forces to start again after failure, and the environment is interactive: the fire spreads along the grass, the water surfaces can be frozen, and it is easy to fall into the abyss.

item.title: Inayh - Life after Gods
item.description: Game Description Inayh - Life after Gods describes the journey of a lone warrior on split setting. The remnants of the once prosperous civilization now serve as a battlefield for warring groups, each of which fights for dominance over the ruins. Inaya, an orphaned exile, is looking for her lost tribe, faced with inexorable opponents and revealing forgotten truths. Its path runs through hostile landscapes, abandoned buildings and hidden shelters, where dangers and opportunities exist nearby.

item.title: Rus vs lizards 2
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards 2 is a continuation of its predecessor, a cooperative action game in an alternative historical setting, where warriors confront reptilian invaders. The title is a medieval world, permeated with a conspiracy plot and elements of martial arts. Users participate in large-scale battles using a combination of traditional sword fighting and unconventional tactics. The world features villages, fortresses and industrial zones repurposed by the enemy. LIZARDS MUST DIE 2’s narrative revolves around renewed conflict as the heroes of Rus once again rise to fight the lizard invasion.

item.title: Grit and Valor - 1949
item.description: Game Description In Grit and Valor - 1949, gamers will take control of an elite squad of mechs during an alternate history of World War II. It is 1949 and Europe is deeply scarred by the ongoing war. The Axis forces, using terrifying ‘Mechs, virtually crushed the resistance. Users lead their squad into this dangerous world to turn the tide by deploying destructive EMP weapons deep in enemy territory. Every mission in Grit and Valor - 1949 forces gamers to think on their feet as they control their swords in dynamic, real-time combat.

item.title: Mother Machine
item.description: Game Description Mother Machine is a co-op action platformer that invites gamers to explore alien caves with friends. Up to four gamers will be able to team up to complete tasks set by the mechanical Mother, revealing the secrets of a colorful alien setting. The title combines traditional platforming elements with a role-playing structure where exploration and discovery play a key role. Users can climb, jump and dynamically interact with the environment, overcoming increasingly difficult obstacles.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beyond Horizons abandons the linear path and throws gamers into a vast, ever-changing world. Buckle up and get ready to explore - procedurally generated landscapes make every game unique. Leave your comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel across vast deserts, lush forests, and any kind of road (or lack thereof). But this is not just a sightseeing trip. Drive Beyond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that remain to be unraveled.

item.title: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
item.description: Game Description Device Doctor Simulator 2024 puts the gamer in the role of a repair expert. The meaning of the title is to diagnose and repair various digital gadgets. As a user, you find yourself in a workshop filled with broken devices that require attention. In the gameplay you will have to understand how the devices function and apply solutions to restore their functionality. Each scenario represents a different task, ranging from simple tasks such as replacing a screen to more complex problems involving hardware or software failures.

item.title: SONOKUNI
item.description: Game Description SONOKUNI is a high-intensity combat experience in a world shaped by cybernetic augmentation and ancient legends. The title follows Takeru, an assassin who navigates a war-torn landscape where technology and mythology intertwine. One mistake means death, but mastery of time manipulation gives a chance to turn the tide of events. Users engage in precise battles with enemies that force them to strain their reflexes and tactical thinking. Every fight in SONOKUNI requires a balance of aggression and restraint, rewarding those who learn from past failures.

item.title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls
item.description: Game Description BLEACH Rebirth of Souls invites users into a world where fate can be rewritten with one blow of the blade. This game brings to life the characters from the popular anime series, each armed with unique sword abilities that offer different styles. Whether you’re new to the franchise or are diving into the world of Soul Reapers for the first time, the title offers a dynamic combat system that lets you control the flow of battle.

item.title: Metal Garden
item.description: Game Description Metal Garden is a first-person shooter game set in a vast megastructure overgrown with vegetation. The title follows a lone traveler navigating a setting abandoned to its original purpose. The remains of past civilizations are scattered throughout the vast and multi-layered industrial ruins. The main character will have to go through this environment, facing unknown threats and obstacles. Progress depends on exploring the terrain, discovering lost knowledge, and adapting to the dangers present in the changing landscape.

item.title: Sapo 3D
item.description: Game Description In Sapo 3D, the player takes control of a frog who must collect golden flies to unlock portals. These transitions lead to new, linearly constructed levels. The gameplay offers a journey through four unique worlds, where the main goal is to collect enough insects. This is necessary to open the huge gate in the central hub and get to the ending of this platformer. Representatives of aggressive flora and fauna will stand in the way of the protagonist of Sapo 3D: from plants that shoot seeds to chickens with explosive eggs and ladybugs with axes.

item.title: Party Club
item.description: Game Description Party Club is a chaotic, fast-paced game that puts gamers in control of a busy venue. Whether you play alone or team up with four friends, your goal is to make customers happy while dealing with all the challenges. There’s always something to juggle, from greeting guests to arranging seating arrangements. But it’s not just about serving drinks - you also have to take into account the individual characteristics of your customers.

item.title: Astroloot
item.description: Game Description Astroloot combines top-down combat with RPG systems in a sci-fi universe. Players travel through the Astroloot sector, a region of space full of enemies and valuable items. The main gameplay is to eliminate enemy units, collect the resources they leave behind and gain experience points. This sequence of actions forms the basis for leveling up the character, combining the dynamics of an arena shooter with the mechanics of hack and slash.

item.title: Fate: Reawakened
item.description: Game Description Fate: Reawakened returns the classic experience of passing dungeons with a modern bias. This collection included all four games of the cult series of FATE, offering to visit the old Growl city again and go through the constantly changing gates of the dungeons. Yuzers will have to fight as a procedurally generated dungeons, each of which offers new trials and awards. There are several games in one release, so you will have something to do, and not one of the two adventures will be the same.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
item.description: Game Description Scholar of the Arcane Arts is devoted to the use of spells interacting with each other to confront the invasion. The universe flooded five plans of magic, forcing the player to look for new forces. Knowledge is gained through the collection of magic scrolls hidden in different parts of the world. For survival, it is necessary to solve puzzles, explore the secret dungeons and destroy monsters, stereing of powerful artifacts.

item.title: ORDER 13
item.description: Game Description ORDER 13 immerses you in a stressful, lonely work environment where packing orders becomes a race against time and an invisible threat. The title begins with you in a dark, remote warehouse, surrounded by high shelves of goods waiting to be packed and shipped. Your only companion is a cat, a small consolation in the oppressive and creepy atmosphere. Orders are piling up quickly, and the warehouse is not empty - something lurks in the shadows, adding danger to every shift.

item.title: Voids Vigil
item.description: Game Description Voids Vigil is an arena with an Autoboy in the Rogue -Lite style, where the action never stops. Gamers will have to clean the one who flooded the arena of the hordes of robots armed only with automatic weapons, drones and many special abilities. Title maintains interest, offering a variety of modes and complexity settings, which allows you to always find new tests. As you advanced, users should competently dispose of their koga - the key resource, which is used in stores that appear throughout the game.

item.title: Warm Monkey
item.description: Game Description Warm Monkey is about a desperate struggle for survival in the heart of a concrete jungle, where a troop of small monkeys multiplies under the scorching sun. Instead of the traditional health scale, there is an inexorably decreasing thirst indicator, forcing you to constantly look for saving moisture. The behavior of their relatives, appearing every 10 seconds, is unpredictable: they can fall from a height or run out onto the roadway under the wheels of scooters.

item.title: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
item.description: Game Description Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone takes you into the shadowy reality of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, where radioactive material has transformed the landscape into something both familiar and alien. Players navigate a post-apocalyptic landscape as planet walkers in search of an energy-rich substance called Chernobyl, while battling nightmarish creatures for survival. The project offers switching first- and third-person perspectives, allowing you to fully appreciate the carefully recreated environment based on the real exclusion zone.

item.title: Dragonkin: The Banished
item.description: Game Description Dragonkin: The Banished throws you into the world, devastated by dragon blood. Evil creatures that have become a result of dragon blood lurk in the shade. Four heroes rise to challenge this spoiled world. Each of them has unique skills and a chance to rewrite the future. The ice warrior in Dragonkin: The Banished, a barbarian, feeding on the blood of a white dragon, embodies gross power. He wields an ax and hammer, becoming more and more when he cuts and breaks enemies due to his resistance.

item.title: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
item.description: Game Description I Am Legion: Stand Survivors combines combat and strategy, offering gamers a wide variety of choices. The central mechanic involves summoning powerful fighters, each with their own abilities, to fight waves of enemies. As users progress, they encounter various difficulties, including unlocking new characters and equipment. This allows for continuous development and adaptation of the game, adding an extra layer of complexity to the gameplay. The core loop of I Am Legion: Stand Survivors revolves around synthesizing and upgrading your warriors.

item.title: Immortal Hunters
item.description: Game Description The Immortal Hunters action begins in a world that has forever changed as a result of one fateful act. The church, which once served as a lighthouse of light and leadership, went to a radical step, killing God. That is how - God is dead, and behind this is the church. This is not an ordinary story about faith and devotion; This is a story about power, manipulations and survival.

item.title: Gruel
item.description: Game Description Gruel - this is an exciting first -person shooter in which chaos reigns in the endless arena. Users move around the unpredictable temple, faced with a series of constantly changing rooms filled with bizarre enemies. Each step forward is a new challenge that makes reflexes and adapt to the limit. Traditional shooting mechanics fades into the background, and improvisation becomes a key point. Movement is constantly, fluctuations lead to disaster, and the only way out is a passage.

item.title: Everhood 2
item.description: Game Description Everhood 2 is an unconventional role-playing game (ARPG) that throws traditional combat out the window. Instead of standard battles, users encounter enemies accompanied by music. You are guided by the celestial Raven, who promises to help you regain your voice if you can defeat the fearsome Dragon of the Mind. This quest will take you through a surreal world where the line between life and death is blurred, and every victory seems like a step deeper into the unknown.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced
item.description: Game Description Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced is a significant update for players looking for a new experience from the already classic gameplay. Rockstar Games has turned the popular GTA 5 into a more powerful version aimed at new generation platforms. Gamers will experience improved performance across several technical parameters and significant updates to the core environment. Los Santos in GTA 5 continues to serve as the backdrop for the narrative, with the three main characters navigating complex crime landscapes.

item.title: Knights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Knights in Tight Spaces takes place in a medieval fantasy setting. Your main task is to control the environment and assemble a squad to face various bandits and supernatural threats. The mechanic is based on deck building, where strategic choice and card synergy play a crucial role in defeating your enemies. You will need to carefully plan each move, taking into account the environment, team composition and available resources.

item.title: Speedboat Simulator
item.description: Game Description Speedboat Simulator is a realistic racing simulator where gamers will take control of powerful high-speed boats to participate in water competitions. The main arena for the competition is the picturesque Hawaiian waters, offering many challenging routes. Each available vessel has individual handling and speed parameters, which requires the pilot to constantly adapt his driving style to the specific conditions of the race. Success in racing directly depends on the ability to feel the technique and effectively use its strengths on various sections of the route.

item.title: Democrators
item.description: Game Description Desecrators offers Gamer the role of the cosmic marauder, operating in the Galaxy Milky Way in 4096. Humanity has erected numerous large structures in mastered star systems, from deep processing stations to orbital complexes, often containing valuable technologies, weapons and resources. On board the Nightingale FTL Cracer, the character acts as a well-known defiler, making raids on the selected objects. The task is to accumulate a destructive arsenal and sufficient technologies to try to storm the legendary storage facilities of the Galactic Treasury, but this path runs through the galaxy full of dangers for all prey hunters.

item.title: FACEMINER
item.description: Game Description FaceMiner offers a deep immersion in the world of collecting biometric data. Here gamers fall into the chaotic world before the beginning of the new millennium, where the main task is to collect and classifying data on faces on a mass scale. As a user, you start small, gradually building an empire from biometric data. On this path, you have to expand the scale: to update software, develop infrastructure and maximize profits, overcoming the sea of ​​corporate problems.

item.title: R.E.P.O.
item.description: Game Description **R.E.P.O. **- this is a online cooperative in the genre of Horror, in which gamers are united to collect valuable objects surrounded by terrible dangers. In this intense adventure, up to six gamers can immerse it, each of which is equipped with a tool based on physics, designed to capture and transport objects. What is the difficulty? Take care of the cargo, moving through the enchanted spaces, and not allow something to break along the way.

item.title: Blood Typers
item.description: Game Description Blood Typers offers a unique twist on survival horror gameplay, combining traditional horror elements with unusual control mechanics. Users find themselves in a cursed film studio, where the line between fiction and reality is blurred, and monsters from horror films invade the real world. Whether you play alone or in a group of up to four gamers, the challenge remains the same: survive the chaos and escape. The title takes place on procedurally generated levels, making each session different from the previous one.

item.title: X-Out: Resurfaced
item.description: Game Description X-Out: Resurfaced brings the legendary underwater shooter to modern platforms, inviting users to build their fleet and fight the alien forces hiding in the ocean depths. The title resurrects the challenging Rainbow Arts game, created back in the era of home computers, and now remade from the ground up thanks to the collaboration of ININ and Ziggurat. Users are immersed in eight diverse stages filled with enemies, bosses, and custom ships that create unique gameplay with each session.

item.title: AVOWED
item.description: Game Description AVOWED is an adventure role -playing role -playing game, the actions of which unfold on a magic continent called Eora. The developers are people who gave the world such hits as Fallout: New Vegas and The Outer Worlds. The game makes the main emphasis on a journey through the bright world, battles with monsters and skeletons, pumping a hero, etc. It is also necessary to take part in the real war.

item.title: Sodaman
item.description: Game Description Sodaman is a fast-paced roguelike that puts you in the shoes of a super soldier tasked with saving the universe from alien invaders. After the Sodacalypse caused by Entity-X, most sodas have turned into flat, lifeless drinks, and Sodaman must find the last remaining fizzy powers and fight them back. Gamers choose their soda powers, which come in seven colors, each with unique abilities to shake things up.

item.title: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered combines three cult parts from the series, representing them in an updated format for both veterans and beginners. Each offers a unique look at Lara Croft’s further path. Having entered its place, gamers fall into a world filled with ancient prophecies lost by tombs and shadow conspiracies. From the battle with the Egyptian god Seth to the investigation of mysterious murders - the bets cannot be higher.

item.title: DarkBlade ascent
item.description: Game Description In DarkBlade Ascent, the action and strategy are combined into intense gameplay. Gamers can expect random loss of weapons and upgrades during each passage, which makes the game fresh and unpredictable. The Title offers a strategic combat system in which gamers should think in advance, studying enemy schemes and choosing the right moment for impact, evasion or parrying. Choosing the elements or focusing on physical damage, you can choose your style in accordance with the task.

item.title: SteamDolls - Order of Chaos
item.description: Game Description SteamDolls - Order of Chaos - Metro -Aviation in steampunk stylistics, characterized by a rich gameplay and incredible cruelty. There is a huge amount of blood and dismemberment. There is a time to play for a thief and anarchist named a whisper. Its task is to penetrate the well -protected territory. You need to act as quieter as possible and try not to enter into a direct confrontation with protection.

item.title: Astronomics
item.description: Game Description In Astronomics, gamers are sent to study the space and the production of asteroids. You have to move through randomly generated asteroids, extract resources and manage a developing enterprise. At first, the whole thing is assembling materials on asteroids flying past, but as it moves forward, automation becomes a key factor. With workers and command bots, at your disposal, the tasks for which the clock used to go, can be completed much faster.

item.title: Reality Break
item.description: Game Description Reality Break takes a unique approach to the ARPG genre, combining fast-paced action with roguelite elements for fresh and unpredictable gameplay. At its core, this is a management game. You play as a mercenary who suddenly gains the ability to distort reality, throwing you into a whirlwind of constant change and danger. As you progress, you will face challenges that require more than just combat skills - it is your mastery of reality control that will determine the outcome.

item.title: Rift of the Necrodancer
item.description: Game Description Rift of the Necrodancer immerses the world of musical battles. Title talks about Kadens, which turned out to be locked in a strange dimension filled with monsters. To survive, she must fight with these creatures, using a mechanics based on the rhythm. Each enemy has its own unique behavior, which makes players adapt their approach to each meeting. As the players move, they will face more and more complex opponents, to win over several strikes, so the accuracy and time become critically important.

item.title: Sworn
item.description: Game Description Sworn immerses the players into a gloomy rethinking of the Arturian legend. This cooperative action in the Rogue-Like genre allows gamers to pass the test alone or with three friends. Once the noble Camelot was under the corrupt rule of the perverted Arthur and his knights. In the role of a knight with a hardened soul, you must explore the depths of the fallen kingdom and find a source of impending darkness.

item.title: Underward
item.description: Game Description Underward is a cooperative horror in which gamers will work together in a deadly underground hospital. Here, up to four users take on the roles of investigators who are instructed to extract the monsters of Test-Subject from the depths of this abandoned object. The task is clear: to convey dangerous capsules to the elevator and escape, but the path is far from simple. Users will encounter unpredictable enemies, traps and dangerous environmental factors, making their way through labyrinths.

item.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 is a continuation of the most realistic medieval simulator, developed by Daniel Vavra, the creator of the first Mafia. The gameplay places great emphasis solely on realism, offering to live the life of an ordinary person who lived during the time of the Holy Roman Empire. The gameplay provides you with a large open world to explore. Your hero has human needs for food, sleep and food.

item.title: FlyKnight
item.description: Game Description FlyKnight is an old-school first-person Dungeon Crawler that places you in a world twisted by the curse of a powerful witch named Lunamotha. Your task as the squire of Flyknights is to break the witch’s spell, because of which the inhabitants of this world cannot grow wings. Early on, you find yourself separated from your comrades after being ambushed, but the mission remains clear: stop Lunamoth. Whether you choose to travel alone or team up with others, the journey will be filled with danger and potential.

item.title: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap
item.description: Game Description Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is a third -person action player and trap protection, which used the main elements of its predecessors and added several new opportunities designed to diversify the gameplay. The action takes place in the same universe as in the previous parts of Orcs Must Die!, And gamers will have to join chaotic battles with the waves of orcs and other monstrous creatures, using all kinds of weapons, traps and strategic solutions.

item.title: Space Engineers 2
item.description: Game Description Space Engineers 2 returns to the world of space development with updated experience. In this continuation, you will have a new adventure in the Almagest system, where engineering tasks and spaces of space are combined in the most unexpected way. This is a sandbox with an open world in which you can build from scratch - or, rather, from stars - from starships to entire space stations. The goal is simple: to raise your creative potential to a new height, while managing the difficulties of survival in the cold, inexorable spaces of space.

item.title: Jaded
item.description: Game Description Jaded is a 2D platformer where any mistake, be it colliding with an enemy or falling on spikes, immediately returns the hero to the beginning of the room, providing an infinite number of attempts to overcome the challenges. The main tool for survival is the ability to slow down time using a 360-degree dash. This mechanic allows you not only to maneuver in the air, but also to lock on to targets to deliver precise strikes.

item.title: Turbo Dismount 2
item.description: Game Description Turbo Dismount 2 brings a fresh twist to the world of physics-based gaming, offering players a playground of chaos and humor. The game features a wide variety of levels where you can launch your character, Mr. Dismount, and his companions into increasingly wild scenarios. These levels are not limited to traditional racing, but also include stunt tracks and physics puzzles that add unexpected challenges. It’s a kind of freedom of action, but that’s the beauty of it.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
item.description: Game Description Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel invites users to the world immersed in Norwegian mythology, where survival depends on skill and strategy. Moving along the inexorable landscape, gamers are faced with an inexorable stream of enemies. In the center of the game is the idea of confrontation with insurmountable forces, and the waves of enemies experience even the most experienced gamers for strength. Fighting off the hordes, moving through the dark kingdoms, teeming with dangers, is a real challenge.

item.title: Somber Echoes
item.description: Game Description Somber Echoes is a single -user gloomy scientific and fantastic Metroidvania, immersing gamers into the terrible and mysterious depths of the abandoned spaceship atromytos. From the very beginning, users take on the role of addressing, which should withstand their twin sister, harmony before it can untie the space catastrophe. Title weaves elements of Greek mythology into a futuristic setting, mixing two different worlds to create an atmosphere that seems at the same time ancient and alien.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Arken Age
item.description: Game Description Arken Age is a virtual reality adventure that immerses gamers in Bio-Chasm, a world shaped by the mysterious Grand Arborist. Stepping into the shoes of a member of the Nara race, users must navigate this bizarre, terraformed environment that has been corrupted by an all-consuming force known as Hyperion’s neural corruption. Physics-based combat mechanics include both sword and gun combat, influenced by the unique properties of Arkenite, the world’s main resource.

item.title: Tyrant's Realm
item.description: Game Description Tyrant’s Realm offers a cruel, but fascinating experience for those who crave trials in their adventures. The Title is a role -playing -adventure game that draws gamers into a world where every step is an adventure, and each death brings new lessons. The design is based on the idea of ​​unpredictability: no passage is the same. Every time you plunge into the game, you are faced with a constantly changing world full of dangers that make you be on the alert.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description endless alice - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch 2
item.description: Game Description Heroes of Hammerwatch 2 expands the hack-and-slash experience by transporting users into a vast world filled with danger, quests and loot. The action takes place on Hammer Island, and users find themselves in the heart of a kingdom in turmoil, where an evil army has seized power and forced the kingdom’s allies into hiding. The gamer’s task is simple: gather resistance, challenge the forces of oppression and restore the land to its former glory.

item.title: Hyper Light Breaker
item.description: Game Description Hyper Light Breaker is a three -dimensional cooperative adventure, the action of which takes place in an expanding universe. In this new part, gamers are sent to Overtergrowth - a new land that is full of opportunities for studying huge dynamic environment. There are both single and multi-user online solutions that allow users to test the new world alone or with friends. The main attention is paid to the disclosure of hidden secrets, the fight against evil monsters and survival in the dangers that lurks around every angle.

item.title: Airborne Empire
item.description: Game Description Airborne Empire. Want a city-building adventure with a twist? This game throws you straight into the clouds, tasking you with building and managing a city that floats among them. Think SimCity and sky pirates and exploration. The basis is strategic planning and resource management. You will have to keep your city afloat, in the literal sense of the word. Every decision you make affects how well your air metropolis functions.

item.title: Super Puzzle Cat
item.description: Game Description Super Puzzled Cat is a 2D puzzle platformer where the user has to guide a cat through various challenging stages. The title features time manipulation mechanics built into the game, offering a unique twist on traditional platforming. Users use tools such as jetpacks, portals, bombs and bubble gum to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. The title has over 150 levels, featuring a variety of environments and scenarios that require strategies to complete.

item.title: FREEDOM WARS Remastered
item.description: Game Description FREEDOM WARS Remastered offers an updated take on a dystopian world where society has collapsed and survivors are trapped in vast prison cities called Panopticons. These prisons are not just physical structures, they symbolize the fall of humanity. The title puts you in the shoes of the Sinner - a man sentenced to an unimaginable punishment of a million years for simply existing. The only way to shorten this period is to participate in dangerous missions, often involving rescuing civilians from terrifying bio-weapons known as Reavers.

item.title: Sea Fantasy
item.description: Game Description Sea Fantasy Transes users to the water world, where the war changed the landscape. Seventy percent of the continent is under water, and two young islanders named Rod and Axel find themselves in the center of the crisis. Their mission is to catch the mysterious Seaaz, which is an important part of the plan to prevent the return of a nightmare of biological weapons - a black dragon. Forget about idyllic fishing.

item.title: Tactics of World War I
item.description: Game Description Tactics of World War I, as the name suggests, uses the setting of the First World War. The game covers the entire period of the large-scale conflict (from 1914 to 1918). It is a real-time tactical strategy game. The video game is dedicated to the Western Front. It has 2 campaigns. They allow you to fight on the side of Great Britain and Germany, respectively. This video game features historical battles that actually took place.

item.title: Lands of Mine
item.description: Game Description Lands of Mine is a story about survival after an unforeseen disaster that occurs as a result of a collision between a spaceship and an asteroid. The cause of the crash was a momentary inattention of the pilot, who was carried away by the passage of another entertainment project. Waking up in an unfamiliar place, the hero is forced to adapt to the harsh conditions of an alien planet.

item.title: Dreamcore Retro
item.description: Game Description Dreamcore Retro is a mental challenge set in psychedelic worlds inspired by the concepts of lucid dreaming and liminal spaces. The project immerses you in a state where the line between sleep and reality is blurred, forcing you to doubt the reality of what is happening. The visual design, in a low-poly style with obvious references to the PSX era, enhances the feeling of an interactive fever dream. This unusual journey through the recesses of the subconscious is accompanied by an intense soundtrack that perfectly complements the overall picture of disturbing unpredictability and surrealism.

item.title: Talented
item.description: Game Description Talented is an arcade roguelite shoot ‘em up that throws gamers into a chaotic world where survival is key. The project revolves around the character Ed, who will spend 20 nights on the infamous Demon Conveyor Belt (D.C.B). Each night presents him with new challenges as waves of enemies come inexorably, and Ed can only adapt and use a combination of abilities and upgrades to stay alive. The randomness-focused structure makes each session feel different, as no two playthroughs are the same.

item.title: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero
item.description: Game Description Leif’s Adventure: Netherworld Hero is a co-op adventure about constant combat, friendship and teamwork. The boy never wanted to be a hero, but one day he learns that responding with force to rudeness is not always right. Users take control of two different characters, like yin and yang. They have to go through hundreds of dangers that have appeared in their lives and join forces. The main characters find themselves in the Underworld, where evil sources will stand in their way.

item.title: Winter Games Collection
item.description: Game Description Winter Games Collection brings together a variety of winter-themed titles that will provide exciting entertainment for gamers of all ages. The project offers a variety of entertainment, from exciting snowball fights to exciting ice races, all in a festive winter setting. The combination of arcade style and family fun ensures that the game will be fun, whether you want to enjoy a solo adventure or gather a group of friends for competitive fun.

item.title: KLETKA
item.description: Game Description KLETKA is a co-op horror adventure where gamers must work together to navigate the dangerous depths of the seemingly endless Gigastructure. It’s based on a unique and disturbing idea: users must feed an ever-hungry elevator to keep it well-fed, while battling the various deadly anomalies inhabiting the building. These anomalies are far from ordinary, with each floor of the Gigastructure offering its own set of challenges, traps and dangers.

item.title: Heat Death: Survival Train
item.description: Game Description Heat Death: Survival Train drops you into a frozen wasteland where surviving is like winning the lottery. You will travel on your trusty train - a rickety metal beast that is your only hope against the piercing winds and all the nastiness that roams this desolate world. Every decision you make could be the difference between seeing another sunrise or turning into ice cream. A train is not just transport, it is your home on the rails.

item.title: The Spirit of the Samurai
item.description: Game Description The Spirit of the Samurai is an adventure game that takes users into the world of feudal Japan, where ancient traditions and supernatural forces collide. The title follows the journey of Takeshi, a samurai bound by honor, and his unlikely ally, Chisai, a warrior cat with his own mysterious powers. Together they must navigate a world overrun by the undead and confront the dark forces that threaten their homeland.

item.title: VOIN
item.description: Game Description Voin transfers gamers to the world, immersed in darkness, where the danger lurks behind every angle, and each solution can mean the difference between survival and defeat. This adventure is a mixture of elements, which makes user be alert, combining fast -person battles with a strategic study. The world is huge and full of secrets that reward those who are ready to plunge into it deeper. However, this is not a walk in the park.

item.title: Puropu Defense Squad
item.description: Game Description Puropu Defense Squad is a strategy action game where animate inanimate objects are forced to defend their existence from ruthless invaders from Earth. The central task for the fighters of the elite squad is the defense of the Extractor, which is the source of life for the entire Puropu civilization. Confronting aggressors requires not only direct participation in battles, but also the construction of complex defensive structures. Defenders have at their disposal an extensive arsenal of hundreds of defense mechanisms, including 15 types of traps and turrets.

item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
item.description: Game Description Indiana Jones and the Great Circle in 1937 entails you into the felt hat of the famous archaeologist, which is located between these two films that you probably watched earlier. Capture your booat because this adventure around the world promises research, action and many puzzles. This time, Jones will not travel alone. Gina, a journalist with a scent, joins him for trouble. Together they confront the emergency of the USU, a villain with plans that can ruin your vacation in the museum.

item.title: Undead West
item.description: Game Description Undead West immerses players in a role-playing rheal adventure in the Bullet-Shell style, the action of which unfolds in the harsh wild West. You take on the role of an arrow, eager for revenge after a defeat in a duel with a mysterious person in red. Revived by death, you fulfill a double mission: take scores with life and repay the debt for revival, collecting souls. Each defeated enemy brings you closer to both goals, giving the resources necessary for unlocking weapons and improving the battle of the tinctures of whiskey.

item.title: Zort
item.description: Game Description Zort is an adventure game that combines action, adventure and horror, offering gamers a challenging and exciting experience. In a world filled with lurking creatures and ominous environments, up to four users can join forces as they explore various maps. As users delve deeper into the maps, they must work together to avoid the dangers that await them and survive long enough to escape. Communication plays a key role in this process, and in-game voice chat allows you to coordinate actions in real time.

item.title: Tower of Mask
item.description: Game Description Tower of Mask is a kraler that scoops up inspiration in the classic role adventure of the 1980s about dungeons and offering a modern approach to old -school mechanics. Title puts gamers in a huge mystical tower, where they have to fight enemies, solve complex puzzles and overcome various tests. The goal is simple, but ambitious: climb the tower and get to the top. However, this journey is not at all simple.

item.title: Magenta Horizon
item.description: Game Description Magenta Horizon is a two-dimensional platformer that includes hack-n-slash elements. The game is inspired by such cult projects as Devil May Cry and Hollow Knight. The main character is a reaper named Gretel. Events develop in the afterlife, reminiscent of purgatory. The story begins when Archibald’s soul awakens after 200 years of exile. The protagonist will have to send the villain back to the sarcophagus so that he will not emerge from his afterlife for several more centuries.

item.title: Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon's Fist
item.description: Game Description In the center of Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon’s Fist is the story of Xiao May, a martial artist who is looking for his older sister of Xiao In. The narrative was built in the conflict of two schools: the heroine owns a fist of the dragon fiery, while her sister suffered the dark art of a fist of the murderer of a dark dragon. Xiao in disappeared, succumbing to the temptation of forbidden power, which made her sister go on a dangerous journey for her salvation.

item.title: Ion Shift
item.description: Game Description Ion Shift will force gamers to be on the edge of his chair from beginning to end. Being in the very heart of a huge and hostile spacecraft, this 2D platformer does not accept prisoners. In the role of an alien creature, you have to navigate in an insidious environment, full of dangers that can break your run in the blink of an eye. Enemy soldiers, laser drones and deadly turrets, creating an atmosphere of tension and excitement.

item.title: The Thing: Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Thing: Remastered returns to Antarctica, continuing the story of the 1982 film. Nightdive Studios resurrects the 2002 horror third-person shooter with a sequel to Outpost 31. Players play as Captain J.F. Blake, commander of a US Special Forces rescue team sent to investigate the aftermath of a scientific expedition. Gameplay centers on facing off against shape-shifting alien creatures in a challenging environment. Team management becomes one of the core mechanics in which players must navigate complex interpersonal dynamics and potential contagion among team members.

item.title: Unknown Tapes
item.description: Game Description Unknown Tapes immerses you in a primitive nightmare. Developed by Traviteam Games, this horror game uses found personnel to place you in the very center of the modern world in which dinosaurs occurred. Remember the “Jurassic Park”, where all safety measures were torn and replaced by rusty nails, and the heart freezes in tension. Here you are not a hero with a flamethrower, but prey. Each rustle of foliage, every creak of floorboards is a potential death.

item.title: Battle Shapers
item.description: Game Description Battle Shapers is a thrilling sci-fi roguelite first-person shooter that puts you in the shoes of Ada, a determined warrior who must reclaim the future of New Elysium from the treacherous Overlords and their corrupt robot armies. From the start of Battle Shapers, you’ll find yourself armed with a formidable array of futuristic weapons, special abilities, and even abilities stolen from the unforgiving Overlords themselves. Your task is to go through their treacherous towers, which are fraught with traps and dangers at every step.

item.title: Black Dragon Mage
item.description: Game Description Black Dragon Mage is an action adventure game set in a dark and dark fantasy universe. Gamers step into the shoes of a powerful magician, making their way through procedurally generated landscapes filled with all sorts of creatures from the depths of hell. From the very beginning, the user finds himself in a world where danger lurks around every corner. There is no shortage of challenges here, and each encounter requires quick thinking and reflexes.

item.title: Entropy Survivors
item.description: Game Description Entropy Survivors is a fast-paced bullet hell roguelike that combines frantic action with unique mechanics. Here, gamers control both a massive mech and a pointy-eared space frog, creating an unusual pair of characters with different abilities. In single or co-op play, gamers must control both units as they fight their way through waves of enemies, each offering their own set of challenges. Gameplay is designed to test reflexes, strategy and timing, requiring quick decision making as users dodge bullets and land their own blows.

item.title: Get to work
item.description: Game Description Get To Work is a rapid satirical game in which players take on the role of a young man who decided to achieve success in the corporate world, overcoming obstacles on roller skates. The main character is not just an ordinary character, he is equipped with roller skates on his arms and legs, which makes him rush through the streets at great speed. This is a chaotic journey when you are trying to jump over the abysses, evade ramps and avoid other dangers.

item.title: Necromorphosis
item.description: Game Description Necromorphosis is a merciless world where survival requires becoming the embodiment of death to your enemies. The main goal is to ascend to the throne of skulls and proclaim yourself the King of the Undead, but the path to it lies through fierce battles with countless monsters. The pretender to the throne will have to challenge powerful rulers who jealously guard their possessions. Only by defeating these formidable opponents and taking their power can you prove your right to dominance in this inanimate hell.

item.title: Enigma of Fear
item.description: Game Description Enigma of Fear is a title that puts gamers in the shoes of Mia, a paranormal investigator on a personal mission: to find her missing father. Finding themselves in the Perimeter, a place that exists outside of reality, Mia and her dog Loopy are plunged into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems. The Perimeter is shrouded in mystery, filled with strange happenings, sinister creatures and a web of secrets that Mia must unravel.

item.title: W.A.N.D. Project
item.description: Game Description W.A.N.D. Project is a fast-paced roguelike set in a futuristic Tokyo, where gamers take on the role of a young sorceress tasked with protecting the city from waves of alien creatures. The title combines bullet hell and spell mechanics, giving users the opportunity to experiment with magical elements and combine them to create powerful spells. The goal is simple: survive and become stronger by coming up with the best spell combinations and strategies to take down increasingly difficult enemies.

item.title: Yet Another Climbing Game
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Climbing Game is a tough climb, the main goal of which is to reach a mysterious peak, accessible only to the most persistent and courageous. Every wrong move threatens to fall and completely lose all the progress made, which turns the journey into a real test for the nervous system. The reward for those who dare to challenge the heights will be a secret hidden from the majority.

item.title: One Boss One Fight
item.description: Game Description InOne Boss One Fight players face one unforgiving enemy - Death. From the moment you enter the arena, every decision, every dodge and every blow becomes a matter of survival. This roguelike is built around one intense fight where the stakes couldn’t be higher. Death is not just an adversary, it is a force of nature, adapting and evolving with each stage. Combat unfolds in multiple layers, each more complex than the last, requiring precision and adaptation from even the most experienced players.

item.title: Relic Dudes
item.description: Game Description Relic Dudes is an online multiplayer game that can be played alone or with up to four friends. It’s a survivor-style action RPG where you work together or fight against each other to defeat hordes of different types of enemies. Gamers can collect relics, become stronger, and create unique kits that can change the fate of their team. Both single-player and multiplayer online modes are implemented, which makes it possible to choose a specific gaming style.

item.title: Void Crew
item.description: Game Description Void Crew invites you to go on an exciting journey through space with your crew members. In this high-stakes interstellar odyssey, teamwork is paramount as you and your friends face the challenges of deep space together. You will find yourself at the helm of a modern spaceship, which will rush through outer space, performing the most ordinary tasks. Asteroid storms, solar flares and random mistakes by crew members - there is never a dull moment in the game.

item.title: Atlyss
item.description: Game Description Atlyss is a role -playing advent with an open world, which represents to gamers a vast and surreal universe. It is filled with various creatures and mysterious locations, inviting users to explore each of its corners. Users themselves can choose how to interact with the world: to cooperate with others or to cope with difficulties alone. Dynamic nature allows them to adapt their style, raising a sense of responsibility for their experience.

item.title: Dungeon Clawler
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Clawler is a deep dive into the dark and unpredictable world of dungeons, where every step could be the beginning of a new legend. The interweaving of mysterious corridors leading to halls shrouded in twilight creates a feeling of continuous discovery of secrets. There are no easy solutions here—treacherous traps, ancient puzzles, and creatures whose origins are shrouded in speculation and fear await the player. Each encounter is a test of character: you can rush into a frontal attack, try to hide in the shadows, or try to find a workaround so as not to get involved in an unnecessary conflict.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of the game will develop in the exclusion zone formed as a result of the disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. In 2006, a new catastrophe occurred, which led to various physical, chemical and biological processes, creating many anomalies, artifacts and generating a large number of mutants. The gameplay is a classic FPS with elements of a role-playing game, immersive sim and horror.

item.title: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
item.description: Game Description RAM: Random Access Mayhem is a roguelike shooter that takes a familiar concept and turns it into something chaotic and strategic. In a world filled with bizarre robots, gamers take on the role of a disembodied AI programmed to wreak havoc. Unlike typical shooters, the adventure game features new mechanics: you control and switch between eight different types of enemies, each with their own unique abilities. This twist not only keeps the action fresh, but also requires quick thinking and strategy as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

item.title: Incantation
item.description: Game Description Incantation is a first-person horror game that immerses gamers in the eerie world of Chen Village, where danger and mystery are never left behind. As the main character, a mother desperately searching for her missing daughter, users will have to navigate the web of secrets, rituals and cults that seem to seep from every crack in the village walls. The plot unfolds gradually, and with each step more and more information is revealed about the strange forces operating in the village.

item.title: Rogue Command
item.description: Game Description Rogue Command is a strategy with elements of a bagel and a card game. You need to collect resources, form a unique deck of cards and fight against robots. When gathering an army, you need to study the enemy’s tactics in order to deal a crushing blow to him. While exploring locations, you need to obtain resources to build buildings and hire units. There are factories, auxiliary buildings, turrets and special weapons of mass destruction.

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes
item.description: Game Description 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes is a first-person shooter that stands out for its wild premise and unpredictable gameplay. The story follows a former Secret Service agent who leaves behind a life of danger and intrigue to pursue a quieter existence as an artist. However, peace does not last long. The agent is soon forced back into action to save memes from the clutches of the Illuminati, a shadowy organization that seems intent on controlling the internet’s most valuable content.

item.title: Gravity Castle
item.description: Game Description Gravity Castle invites the player to move according to the colossal structure descending into the core of the world, controlling the gravity forces. The path through the mysterious underground ruins will make you face a series of incredible tests and pass by the remains of fallen researchers. The protagonist comes to his senses in the bowels of this mysterious building of unknown origin. The gates are already closed, and the only way leads down to the center of the world - a place where no one has yet returned.

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description: Game Description Space Trash Scavenger takes place in a future where humanity has reached for the stars and survival means using what others have left behind. Here, gamers take on the role of scavengers operating in a galaxy littered with the rubble of an ancient conflict. The journey begins with a space drill - a multi-purpose node floating among the remains of abandoned ships, forgotten outposts and asteroid fields. This is not just a shelter, but a factory, equipped with critical systems for agriculture, defense and waste processing - all necessary to turn interstellar waste into something valuable.

item.title: TIME SOUL
item.description: Game Description TIME SOUL is an action-platformer with a unique approach to the usual souls-like genre. In a universe where time is both weapon and enemy, gamers will battle through procedurally generated worlds filled with treacherous platforms, unexpected obstacles and formidable enemies. Moving forward, users will fight with the guardians of time, collect fragments and clocks, trying to prevent the complete collapse of time. It’s a race against time, literally, as the ultimate goal is to defeat the Time Lord within a limited time of 60 minutes.

item.title: Beyond The Darkness
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Darkness is an adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of ghostly memories and disturbing experiences. The game follows the story of Millie, a young girl whose family mysteriously disappeared. Her journey takes her through several eerie, memory-based worlds, each more complex and disturbing than the last. The narrative revolves around Millie’s quest to discover the truth about her family’s fate while at the same time confronting the nightmares that seem to manifest themselves in the very fabric of her memories.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts inBullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents. The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Codex Lost
item.description: Game Description Codex Lost is an open-world role-playing adventure game that immerses gamers in a realm where magic, mystery and danger intertwine. Against the backdrop of a fractured world, users take on the role of the Guardian, a figure tasked with finding stolen grimoires and saving a reality on the brink of collapse. The stakes are high and the journey is filled with challenges, but what really sets the title apart is its focus on freedom, discovery and strategic combat.

item.title: LEGO Horizon Adventures
item.description: Game Description LEGO Horizon Adventures takes gamers on a whimsical journey through a future made entirely of LEGO bricks. Forget lush greenery and jagged rocks - even the colossal dinosaur-like machines that roam the earth are carefully sculpted from colorful bricks. Developed by Guerrilla Games and Studio Gobo, this action-adventure game takes inspiration from the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn. Take the place of Aloy, a curious girl raised by the stern but kind huntsman Rost.

item.title: Little Big Adventure – Twinsen's Quest
item.description: Game Description Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest, a reimagining of the classic adventure game, opens up new horizons of exciting virtual travel. This is a unique opportunity to plunge into a completely new world, full of exciting effects, rich musical compositions and deep gameplay mechanics. According to the plot, you have to go on a journey with Twinsen, an ordinary inhabitant of the Citadel Island. His calm life changes after a disturbing dream about the end of his planet and a meeting with the forbidden goddess Sendell, after which our hero finds himself imprisoned in a psychiatric clinic.

item.title: PARKOUR CIVILIZATION
item.description: Game Description Parkour Civilization invites players into a high-stakes world where every jump or wall run tests their accuracy and timing. At its core, the game challenges you to master increasingly difficult parkour tracks. Every successful jump propels you forward, and every fall serves as a reminder of the unforgiving nature of this fast-paced environment. The path from beginner to expert comes through practice, persistence, and the willingness to accept failure as part of the process.

item.title: Shave and Stuff
item.description: Game Description InShave and Stuff, gamers find themselves in a lively and practical simulator, where two roles come to the fore - a hairdresser and a tattoo artist. The title combines hairdressing and paint work, which promotes creativity and experimentation. Whether performing precision cutting tasks or plunging into the complex world of body art, users are immersed in a world of tools, techniques and client preferences. A constant flow of tasks and light humor provide the basis for an original approach to customization and self-expression.

item.title: XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION
item.description: Game Description XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION transports gamers to a high-octane world where the classic game of pinball meets hostile forces for an intense blend of arcade action. The adventure follows the path of its predecessor, Demon’s Tilt, and brings familiar gameplay mechanics while adding many new challenges. Each new table offers a new set of obstacles, targets and bonuses that force users to be on their guard. Pinball here is not just about throwing a ball, it is a battle against time, enemies and your own reflexes.

item.title: Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age
item.description: Game Description Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is a naval combat game in which you control two warring factions: NATO forces and representatives of the Warsaw Pact. Take part in the naval conflicts of the 80s. Control a huge number of different ships, use all modern types of weapons and technologies. Your main task in Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is to defeat the enemy army.

item.title: Void Sols
item.description: Game Description Void Sols places gamers in a minimalistic, top-down world that redefines the essence of soulslike gaming. The world is a huge, abstract labyrinth in which users will have to explore its depths and survive in harsh conditions. From the very beginning, you find yourself in a dark and confusing maze, where there is no map, no directions - only an inexorable desire to move forward. All you control is a triangle-shaped character, and there are no words to explain why you are here and what your goal is.

item.title: HeistGeist
item.description: Game Description HeistGeist immerses gamers in the cyberpunk universe, putting them in the shoes of Alexandra, a cunning thief who overcomes the consequences of a failed mission. The title revolves around the challenge of assembling a diverse team of specialists to carry out complex heists. Each heist presents tactical obstacles and opportunities, turning each mission into a unique puzzle. Users take part in battles based on a card-based battle system that brings an innovative twist to the traditional strategy genre.

item.title: Locuras en el Banverso
item.description: Game Description Locuras en el Banaverso is a single-player platformer that takes gamers on a chaotic adventure through a bizarre multiverse. The game follows the eccentric YouTuber El Bananero, who not only plays the role of the main character, but also voices him. From the very beginning, El Bananero finds himself in an unexpected situation - he is kidnapped by none other than Santa Claus and his gang of henchmen. As fate would have it, the kidnapping turns into an escape through a portal that leads him into the depths of the multiverse.

item.title: Slitterhead
item.description: Game Description Slitterhead throws you headlong into the shadow world filled with Sassens. Forget about sunlight and rainbow, the Kowlun area in this game is inspired by the gloomy approaching Hong Kong of the 80s and 90s. Close lanes and huge neon signs create a dense labyrinth, which you have to navigate. But you are not just a tourist here. You take control of Hyki, a complete riddle. No memories, no body, only a burning goal.

item.title: Odd Remedy
item.description: Game Description Odd Remedy invites users into an action-packed multiplayer adventure where teamwork and survival go hand in hand. The story takes place on an isolated island overrun by mutated spider monsters, and your mission? Escape with your fellow prisoners. Although you start out as prisoners, the island’s wild dangers offer a strange freedom as you scavenge for supplies, pillage towns, and destroy enemy-infested caves. The island itself becomes your playground, filled with challenges, obstacles, and the constant threat of the Black Fang Corps lurking around every corner.

item.title: Bunker Invaders
item.description: Game Description Bunker Invaders throws you into the middle of a post-apocalyptic scenario. The surface world has been destroyed, and your only hope is a rickety bunker. This is not a luxurious fallout shelter, but a situation where leaving the lights on is already a victory. Welcome to the new life of a bunker manager, where creepy creatures from the outside world are constantly trying to destroy your shelter. Here you have to solve two problems: patch up the crumbling infrastructure and at the same time repel the attacks of the inexorable invaders.

item.title: Terror of the Seven Seas
item.description: Game Description Terror of the Seven Seas is a game that immerses gamers in the complex maritime life of an era of exploration and piracy. The game takes place in a vast open world and offers a wide range of entertainment - from participating in large-scale naval battles to treasure hunting. Users take on the roles of various characters, each with their own unique responsibilities and abilities. Whether it’s a captain leading a ship through stormy seas, an officer commanding a crew, a merchant transporting goods across vast oceans, or an explorer reaching into the unknown, there is something for every type of adventurer.

item.title: Gods Wars: Infinity Epic
item.description: Game Description Gods Wars: Infinity Epic is a pixelated roguelike that invites gamers into a world filled with relentless combat, strategic decision-making and rich customization. From the very beginning, the adventure game offers significant flexibility, allowing gamers to create their characters according to their playstyle and preferences. The plot is simple and at the same time fascinating: users will have to overcome waves of monsters, defeat powerful bosses and ultimately challenge the formidable evil gods.

item.title: Metal Slug Tactics
item.description: Game Description TheMetal Slug Tactics player chooses his warriors to create a suitable powerful team capable of stopping the hostilities. Run n' Gun has roguelike elements as well as intense combat. The continuation of the series of the same name allows you to look at the war from a new angle with a greater share of adrenaline, gaining experience after each fight, which helps to unlock additional skills or weapons. The game was the first tactical RPG, unlike its predecessors, and features replayability, pixel graphics and complex replay mechanics.

item.title: Warlords Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Warlords Battle Simulator is a game that places gamers in the role of generals who must lead armies in strategic and often unpredictable battles. In this tactical roguelike auto-action game, success largely depends on how well users manage resources, select units and place them on the battlefield. Each faction - be it the Kingdom, Greenskins, Undead or Barbarians - offers a unique set of units and commanders, each with special abilities that can change the tide of battle.

item.title: One Socket
item.description: Game Description One Socket puts the player before the need to charge the generator to power vital devices, which is complicated by the presence of only one working outlet. This critical restriction makes us make constant strategic decisions about which equipment to use, while the monster is hiding in the surrounding darkness. To get out of imprisonment, you need to dispose of meager resources, solve the secrets of the location and survive a constant threat.

item.title: Emberdrift
item.description: Game Description Emberdrift is a fast-paced roguelike platformer that focuses on movement and upgrades. From the very beginning, gamers find themselves in an ever-changing world that requires quick reflexes and the ability to find new opportunities. The gameplay is built around speed, requiring users to navigate through a variety of levels with a range of mechanics designed to keep them on their toes. As players move through a randomly generated world, they can slide, wall jump, move diagonally, and even grab onto surfaces.

item.title: Metal Thunder
item.description: Game Description Metal Thunder is a roguelite title where gamers take control of a powerful warship as they navigate a world filled with hostile forces. At the center is an intense air battle in which users will have to overcome waves of enemies and complete risky missions. Each mission offers a new set of challenges, requiring both tactical precision and quick reflexes to succeed. There is no room for complacency in the title, as gamers must adapt their approach on the fly to cope with ever-changing threats.

item.title: Ratshaker
item.description: Game Description Ratshaker stands out with its non -standard approach to the genre of pest combat. Unlike typical games, in which strategies or battle are given the main attention, this one goes along a rather unusual path: the gamer has to subjugate a virtual rat. The process is simple, but strangely exciting: shake the rat, watch how the submission counter is growing, and continue to shake until you finish the work.

item.title: Raiden Nova
item.description: Game Description Raiden NOVA is the latest evolution of the iconic series, offering a fresh experience for fans and newcomers alike. The title immerses users in an intense 2D twin-stick shooter where dodging enemy fire becomes a priority and aiming is as important as survival. As the gameplay progresses, the task becomes clear: control the ship, dodge incoming enemies and shoot back accurately. The mechanics are based on the use of two sticks - one to move the ship and the other to aim, giving gamers complete control over movement and attack.

item.title: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty offers an original take on the first-person shooter (FPS) genre. The gamer will have to step into the shoes of Rusty, a janitor who is tasked with sorting out a situation at a workplace where a malfunction has occurred due to rogue robots. It’s not just running and gunning, there’s more to it than that. You’ll have to solve puzzles, interact with strange gadgets, and figure out how to stay alive while coping with mechanical chaos.

item.title: Sofie: The Echoes
item.description: Game Description Sofie: The Echoes is an adventure game that immerses gamers in an exciting storyline. The main character, Sophie, goes on a quest, guided by personal interests. In search of her husband and son, she goes through a world full of difficulties and trials. In this world, the boundaries between reality and echoes of the past are blurred. Every moment in the adventure feels weighty as users follow Sophie’s path through treacherous landscapes and emotional turmoil.

item.title: Abnormality
item.description: Game Description Abnormality immerses users in a world where urban exploration meets paranormal phenomena. In this multiplayer ghost hunting horror game, people form teams to explore abandoned places, armed with a variety of ghost hunting tools. The core experience revolves around collecting evidence of supernatural activity, creating a sense of urgency and curiosity. Gamers often find themselves in places with a rich history, and each location poses its own unique challenges.

item.title: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
item.description: Game Description Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse is an open-world role-playing game that immerses gamers in a post-apocalyptic environment. The story centers on Delta Team, led by Major Pan, as they navigate a world devastated by a virus. Users are faced with a vast landscape where exploration becomes necessary. They will collect resources, fish and create equipment necessary for survival. The environment presents gamers with numerous challenges and pits them against various enemy forces.

item.title: Devilated
item.description: Game Description Devilated - brutal and cruel shooter in the first person with elements of role -playing game. You have to survive among mystical creatures and fry your asses to all enemies in your path! As you pass, get access to new types of weapons and open additional abilities. Use auxiliary objects and overcome obstacles. After the end of the storyline, a new game will open+, which will allow you to start a new trip, having in your hands all previously open skills and trunks.

item.title: Life is Strange: Double Exposure
item.description: Game Description Life Is Strange: Double Exposure starts with a tragic event - a student at the Kalidon University and a talented photographer Max Collfield finds her close friend Safi Killed. In a desperate attempt to change everything, Max turns to long -forgotten supernatural forces. But instead of the usual movement in time of its ability, they open the portal into an alternative reality, where the Safi is still alive. However, joy is overshadowed: an unknown threat hangs over this world.

item.title: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets
item.description: Game Description Monster High Skulltimate Secrets invites users to go on an exciting adventure with the iconic characters of the franchise. The story centers on Draculaura, Frankie Stein and Clawed Wolf, who go on a search and try to eliminate the evil spirits that are haunting their school. This dynamic trio act as guides and companions, guiding gamers through various challenges and puzzles. Gameplay involves collecting keys from monsters hidden throughout the campus, each of which is needed to open an ancient door.

item.title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
item.description: Game Description Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split takes users into the disturbing environment of Cypress Ridge, where chaos reigns amid a zombie outbreak. Set in the early moments of this disaster, gamers are given the choice of one of two different characters: Lydia, a seasoned police officer, or Hank, a figure shrouded in mystery whose goals differ sharply from Lydia’s. These choices affect how users interact with the narrative, resulting in different experiences as they navigate a city filled with danger.

item.title: Quadrober Simulator
item.description: Game Description Quadrober Simulator invites users to test themselves as a four-legged creature in a diverse environment. There is a lot of choice in this game. Users can choose from a variety of animals, each with specific traits and skills. These choices set the stage for a unique journey through different ecosystems. As gamers navigate these landscapes, they are faced with opportunities to explore, survive, and interact with the environment. Gameplay revolves around several key activities, including hunting, foraging, and building shelters.

item.title: Quarterstaff
item.description: Game Description Quarterstaff is a turn-based action strategy game that invites gamers into a fantasy realm full of intrigue and conflict. Set against the backdrop of a land under siege by a ruthless sorcerous conqueror, the adventure revolves around the character of Kalresh, a wizard skilled in the arts of magic and acrobatics. Having taken control of Kalresh, users are tasked with liberating the kingdom through a series of strategic battles.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Game Description The beginning of the 20th century was not easy in the Wild West inRed Dead Redemption. John Marston was previously a member of a gang of thugs, but decided to end his bloody occupation. The guy did not manage to start a quiet life - the hero was taken under the “guardianship” of government services, whose agents forced him to work for them. The character’s family was under their guns, and if they refused, John’s relatives would be killed.

item.title: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
item.description: Game Description Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner is a first-person horror game that draws users into the disturbing world of a roadside diner at night. The plot centers on a young man who takes up the night shift at this creepy diner, coincidentally ending up on the night of a blood moon. But this isn’t just any ordinary night shift - soon after the diner’s doors close, the usual routine begins to turn into something much darker.

item.title: NIMRODS: GUNCRAFT Survivor
item.description: Game Description In Nimrods: Guncraft Survivor, gamers have to take on the role of consumable clones, which are entrusted with testing an outlandish weapon in the galaxy, teeming with chaos. The plot creates the basis for a unique combination of action and creativity. As part of the test detachment of the manufacturer of weapons, participants are sent in search of new technologies and resources for alien landscapes. Each entry is a combination of survival tasks and craft opportunities, emphasizing the importance of experiments.

item.title: Sulfur
item.description: Game Description Sulfur is an adventure adventure, in which the elements of the first -person shooter are combined with traditional role -playing games and mob. Gamers take on the role of a character, moving around a complex world, filled with problems and capabilities. The gameplay is focused on battles and research, forcing users to think strategically, faced with various enemies. Each collision requires a different approach, which makes the adaptation key.

item.title: Vengeance Hunters
item.description: Game Description Vengeance Hunters is a side-scrolling beat-‘em-up that captures the essence of classic arcade action. Here users can choose one of several characters, each of which has different abilities and fighting styles. These choices play an important role in how gamers approach gaming challenges. Going through various stages, users encounter many enemies, each of which has unique behavior and attack style. With a variety of characters, gamers will be able to find the fighting style that suits their preferences.

item.title: YS X: Nordics
item.description: Game Description YS X: Nordics invites gamers to a bright world filled with adventures and research. The action is unfolding in the northern seas of the Opel Gulf, and the main character, Adol Christin, acts as a young adventurer. The narrative unfolds on a variety of archipelago, where normann norman normann inhabit various islands. Each island offers a unique environment that captivates gamers and makes them explore every corner. Thanks to the rich historical background, Advencura creates the basis for exciting quests and interaction with the characters.

item.title: Orebound
item.description: Game Description Orebound invites users to a world where they take on the role of a gnome, which goes in search of an ancient artifact, known as amber stone. The Title puts the participants in a huge, station environment, where the study and collection of resources form the basis of experience. Users begin with the construction of their base, laying the foundation of their gnome civilization. This journey begins with mineral extraction, where every wave of picks allows you to detect valuable resources.

item.title: PSYCHOPOPP GOLD
item.description: Game Description Psychopomp Gold - This is a remasted version of the popular horror game that sends gamers on a trip along terrible catacombs filled with strange creatures and hidden secrets. In the remaster there are new levels and modes that expand the concept of the original. Adding a third-person species changes the perspective, allowing users to navigate the environment differently. Each corner is fraught with a new test, because gamers must maintain vigilance, making their way through the dark depths.

item.title: Dark Hours
item.description: Game Description Dark Hours is a cooperative horror game for survival created by Piece of Cake. Here users are sent to a robbery, which sharply turns into the unknown. Locked in an auction house, they face a demonic being, which violates their plans. What began as a mission to theft of valuable things quickly turns into a battle for survival.
