To combat this madness, an arsenal is available, including a rotating potato cannon with basketball bombs and a hammer that invariably returns to the hands after a throw.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: El Paso, Elsewhere
item.description: Game Description El Paso, Elsewhere immerses players in dynamic shootings with werewolves, vampires and other evil spirits that make his way to the surface of the planet. Events transfer to the territory of a small Texas settlement under the name El Passes, where he will have to fight terrible opponents. The main character finds himself in a small three -story hotel hiding the secret deep underground. Players will have to go down to dark basements to go through 46 combat missions and destroy hellish creatures.

item.title: Railgunners
item.description: Game Description Railgunners puts players in the script of a rail shooter, where humanity is fighting an alien invasion. This title represents battles through customizable complexity parameters, allowing gamers to regulate the intensity of contractions. Gamers move in a two -dimensional perspective with lateral scrolling, faced with hundreds of enemy units in numerous conflict zones. The main task includes a breakthrough through the vast lines of the enemy in order to get to the mother vessel of the aliens and begin its destruction.

item.title: Ray'z Arcade Chronology
item.description: Game Description Rayz Arcade Chronology is a collection that invites you to immerse yourself in the digital space, where the Waverider manned fighter is presented as a virus, whose main task is to penetrate deep into the system. The mission, known as Operation RayCrisis, is to fight against the self-aware neurocomputer Con-Human who has rebelled against humanity. Advancement through levels is associated with a unique Encroachment mechanic: if you do not destroy enemies quickly enough, a special meter is filled, and when 100% is reached, you are forced to move to the final clash, which directly affects the outcome of the entire operation.

item.title: Evolutions
item.description: Game Description Evolings, a turn-based role-playing game, takes you on an exciting journey through a setting teeming with fearsome monsters and cute creatures. Your main task is to assemble a formidable team of Evolings, each with their own abilities and personalities, to face the dangers that lurk on each level. What distinguishes the project from standard RPGs is the ability to gain new, unique impressions from each level completed. New tasks, objects and plots are constantly appearing in the title.

item.title: Payday 3
item.description: Game Description Payday 3 - The second continuation of the original multiplayer game dedicated to the life of robbers and their sorties to dangerous crimes for making money and respect in gang circles, an analogue of levels from other projects. By increasing authority, new types of weapons and customization items will be unlocked, allowing you to create a unique appearance of the protagonist. This part of the franchise uses the Unreal Engine 4 engine.

item.title: Lies of p
item.description: Game Description Lies of P was inspired by the famous story about Pinocchio, but demonstrates a more cruel and gloomy version of the fairy tale. To become a person, kindness and love are not enough, because the human essence also has bloodthirsty features, where everyone is ready to fight for power or place under the sun by any means. Much has to be built on lies, the main thing is not to get confused in it so that the protagonist is not declassified.

item.title: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
item.description: Game Description The BackRooms: Last Expedition is a cooperative in the horror genre, in which from 1 to 4 gamers are united in teams to survive in an alarming world. The main attention is paid to the passage of a series of dangerous, constantly changing levels, each of which is filled with mysterious creatures. Together, players should try to escape from the horror surrounding them, using their collective forces to resist the unknown.

item.title: Eternnights
item.description: Game Description Eternnights, a unique action dating game set in an apocalyptic world, offers an exciting blend of romance, survival and adventure. In this gripping story, participants encounter a world upended by an unknown force that turns people into menacing monsters driven by violence and power. Not only is your own survival at stake, but also the future of those you care about. The project’s structure is a well-thought-out routine that keeps gamers on their toes throughout the week.

item.title: Enchanted Portals
item.description: Game Description Enchanted Portals invites you to take part in the adventures of Bobby and Penny, two aspiring magicians trapped in different dimensions. The game is inspired by the popular game Cuphead and has a similar gameplay style, featuring challenging platforming stages and exciting boss battles. The game features both single-player and co-op modes in which players can use various spells and techniques to overcome obstacles and enemies. The game has a humorous tone, witty dialogues and funny situations.

item.title: Starfield
item.description: Game Description Starfield opens a new chapter in the gaming universe after a quarter-century hiatus. Bethesda, known for such outstanding projects as The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4, offers an expansive next-generation role-playing game set in outer space. In 2330, humanity expands far beyond the boundaries of our solar system: pioneers colonize distant planets, turning into a space-faring civilization. Join the ranks of Constellation, a group of intrepid space explorers on a quest to find elusive artifacts scattered across the galaxy in Bethesda’s most ambitious endeavor to date.

item.title: Girl Genius: Adventures In Castle Heterodyne
item.description: Game Description Based on the beloved graphic novel series of the same name by the talented duo Phil and Kaya Foglio, Girl Genius: Adventures In Castle Heterodyne invites you into the luminous fantasy world of Girl Genius™, plunging into the turbulent journey of Agatha Heterodyne as she makes her way through the treacherous corridors, catacombs and kitchens of her ancestral fortress - Castle Heterodyne. As the lost heiress of a crazy and mysterious family, Agatha strives to restore the ancient fortress to its former glory and take its rightful place as a “true heterodyne.

item.title: Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder
item.description: Game Description Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder tells about the journey of a young orc named Madren after his ship crashes off the coast of the Thunder Island. There he finds an artifact, melting in himself significant power, which forces him to go through a series of trials to disclose all the capabilities of the find. The island is the main game location for a study filled with its population and secrets.

item.title: Dogu the Adventurer
item.description: Game Description Dogu the Adventurer tells the story of a protracted confrontation in worlds filled with ancient technology. The main character, Dogu, finds himself embroiled in a conflict with ruthless bandits who pursue him at every turn. The deceptively cute style of the locations hides serious threats: from traitorous pigs to ancient demons and powerful bosses guarding secrets. The survival of the protagonist directly depends on improving his equipment and timely repair of equipment.

item.title: Pocket Bravey
item.description: Game Description Pocket Bravey is a dynamic fighting game that acquaints charismatic characters with a unique battle style and abilities. The gameplay is inspired by the classic fatings of the 90s, but containing a number of modern mechanics and functions. The visual style is represented by retro design. The environment is made in bright colors that refer to various Japanese projects. The heroes of Pocket Bravey are represented by several types of shocks, combinations, block and supervision.

item.title: Bee Island
item.description: Game Description In Bee Island, you will become the head of a prosperous hive, taking on the role of a defender from impending threats. The main attention in the game is paid to defense and strategic construction. Enemies make sporadic attacks, and your task is to protect the hive. They are armed with bombs, poisonous aerosols and missiles, their strength is constantly growing. To reflect their attack, you have to build a whole complex of protective structures - ballists, machine guns, anti -aircraft missile systems and much more.

item.title: Sunkenland
item.description: Game Description Sunkenland is a fun adventure game that offers a unique take on the survival genre. The game immerses us in the world of the water element, which is both beautiful and dangerous. It involves mining resources, crafting items, building bases, trading and fighting pirates to survive in an aquatic environment plagued by hunger and violence. The game features a variety of locations such as sunken cities, atolls, floating bases and abandoned structures.

item.title: Blasphemous 2
item.description: Game Description Blasphemous 2 returns players to the dark and scary world of The Penitent One, the protagonist of the first part. This highly anticipated sequel to the critically acclaimed action-platformer once again delves into a nightmarish realm of brutal combat, twisted religious themes and terrifying visuals. Continuing the events of the Wounds of Eventide DLC, the plot delves into the story of the Penitent One who confronts the Miracle, a mysterious force that has tormented him throughout his journey.

item.title: Orbo's Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Orbo’s Odyssey offers to become in place of the eccentric Orbo of Stetson, an ordinary personal assistant with unusual abilities. This 3D platformer will send you on a surreal journey through the office of your boss, where running, jumping and drilling is just an iceberg top. A project with notes of comedy and oddities promises a unique experience. Adventures begin with the fact that Orbo and his colleague Pibe are locked in the office of his boss due to a malfunction of the door to open the door.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: Labyrinthine
item.description: Game Description Labyrinthine is a first-person horror game that you can play alone or with friends. You find yourself in the mysterious labyrinths of a mysterious mansion on the outskirts of the forest. Try to find a way to escape from these cursed lands. Collect useful items, solve puzzles and run away from bloodthirsty monsters that are always on your heels. The main goal is to survive! Team up in co-op and play with up to three players as you try to unravel the mysteries of this cursed forest and find a way out of the mystical Heppiesburgh Hedge.

item.title: Mist Slayer
item.description: Game Description Mist Slayer, an action roguelike game, puts you in the shoes of a time-traveling hero in a mystical war. Armed with unique weapons and skills, gamers find themselves in parallel universes, fight amazing opponents, collect bonuses and go on quests. You can play alone or in co-op with friends. Mist Slayer features: 4 different characters, and even more hidden. 13 levels, including at least 36 randomly generated maps. A collection of over 10 bosses and a variety of enemies.

item.title: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
item.description: Game Description Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew is a unique stealth strategy game about cursed pirates in the Dark Caribbean! In this alternate version of the Golden Age of Piracy, the curse of lost souls hangs over a chain of islands ruled by evil inquisitors who try to burn all unusual pirates. You must assemble a crew of 8 cursed pirates, each with their own personality and supernatural powers, to recover Captain Mordecai’s mysterious treasure and defeat the army of the Inquisition.

item.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 is a fascinating and realistic first -person construction simulator. If you are ready to pick up a cutter and a hammer again, then it’s time to go to the new coast with the largest cemetery of ships in the world and start dismantling huge details of ships. In this continuation, you will find new, even larger vessels, new gaming mechanics, functions and improvements, as well as improved mechanics that you loved in the first part.

item.title: Eon Fighter
item.description: Game Description Eon Fighter is an action game with a top view with Roguelite systems where the player pilots the fighter through the hostile sectors of the cosmos. The gameplay is focused on a collision with continuous waves of opponents and collecting resources for promotion. In the role of the last representative of mankind, it is necessary to carry out tasks, confronts the constant enemy. The structure of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre requires continuous movement and tactical ingenuity to survive in the conditions of the onslaught.

item.title: Standbox
item.description: Game Description Standbox, a bizarre single -user physical sandbox, invites players to indulge their children’s impulses to expand borders and experiments. Imagine a virtual world in which the central place is occupied by an elastic doll, which, on your order, passes all kinds of tests and hardships. In this interactive digital site, you can interact with ragongollah in a variety of ways. It doesn’t matter what you choose - to lightly push it or throw out your most daring whims on it - you can observe the reaction and stability of Ragdollah.

item.title: DriveCrazy
item.description: Game Description DriveCrazy is an arcade madness that asks you to get behind the wheel of a miniature truck amid the total destruction of the apocalyptic landscapes of Japan. The main task is to survive in the face of constant pursuit by mysterious creatures. To avoid missiles and falling buildings, it is possible to move along vertical surfaces. The process of destroying environmental objects, such as pillars, trees and fences, is directly related to replenishing the supply of nitro acceleration.

item.title: Super Raft Boat Together
item.description: Game Description Super Raft Boat Together is an adventure for those who love danger and teamwork! In a world inundated by a mysterious flood, you and your trusty boat are all that’s left. But don’t be afraid! Along with three friends, you’ll battle ruthless sea creatures as you build and expand your raft to reach the final island, where the truth about the flood will finally be revealed. This multiplayer roguelike shooter offers endless excitement as you navigate a variety of breathtaking biomes, strategically choosing trinkets to create the ultimate, super-powered structure.

item.title: Gorebox
item.description: Game Description Gorebox is an exciting sandbox that allows you to reveal its creative potential and create a world full of tense moments on the basis of physics. Various types of weapons and explosives are offered a choice, as well as a special device called Reality Crusher, which makes it possible to interact with surrounding objects. In addition, you can configure your character using skins and accessories, as well as create or explore user cards through the built -in editor and workshop.

item.title: Δv: rings of saturn
item.description: Game Description Rings of Saturn is a two -dimensional cosmoster, whose events are transferred to the distant future of 2273. Humanity began to extract important resources on the rings of Saturn. This event began to be called the golden fever of the new century. You control the ship that is engaged in the prey of fossils in the open spaces of the open space. Your main goal was only one - to get rich.

item.title: Ember Knights
item.description: Game Description Ember Knights is a multiplayer roguelite with dynamic gameplay. Each run allows participants to create new synergistic attacks, customizing their character’s equipment and leveling up their abilities. As you progress, you gain access to new skills, relics, and spells that can impact every match. There is a network cooperative for up to 4 participants and the creation of a room online. The combat system focuses on slashing attacks, dynamic techniques and fast movements.

item.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
item.description: Game Description My Friendly Neighborhood immerses users for the role of a simple repairman Gordon, which is forced to cope with gloomy and revived puppets attacking the hero during the play “Our friendly neighborhood.” The protagonist is forced to survive and cope with various puzzles to find a way out of the trap. The MFN game is an action horror where you have to cope with dynamic levels, using a variety of weapons for self -defense.

item.title: Brick Rigs
item.description: Game Description Brick Rigs is a sandbox that allows you to create a variety of vehicles, and then enjoy realistic driving and destruction physics. You need to build cars using various blocks. The Brick Rings toolkit allows you to create a dragster, a fire truck, a forklift, a helicopter, an airplane or even a tank - it all depends on your imagination and skill. Gameplay Brick Rigs is a full-fledged construction set with which you can create any type of transport.

item.title: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Zombie Survivors is an action roginal for those who are ready to fight with the horde of undead! Humanity can be on the verge of extinction, but this does not mean that you will fall without a fight. This is not a typical game with long scenes and complex management - here you need to immediately join the battle and see how sparks fly! Regardless of what your level of game experience you have, you will enjoy this game.

item.title: Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners 1
item.description: Game Description Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners #1 occurs in the Nazi concentration camp, where the main characters are prisoners who are going to execute for participation in the conspiracy of the rebels. However, they soon find out that death is not the worst thing that can happen to them, because they will find an even more terrible fate. They must find a way to escape from the nightmare that awaits them in the camp.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Choo Choo Survivor
item.description: Game Description Choo Choo Survivor is an exciting adventure in the world, teeming with a zombie, where you have to take the train and break through the endless waves of undead. Chu Chu Survaivor is a unique mixture of Bullet Hell and Horde Survival genres, where you can configure your weapons and abilities in accordance with your game style. You can choose one of different trains, each with their own characteristics and weapons, and improve them as they move.

item.title: Brotato
item.description: Game Description In the shooterBratato you have to take control of a potato using a variety of guns while fighting alien creatures. The gameplay includes roguelite genre elements. Locations are procedurally generated, and each run can take up to 30 minutes of real time. There are dozens of types of weapons and additional items of equipment to choose from, allowing you to progress at your own pace and combine the effects of items.

item.title: Nimbus INFINITY
item.description: Game Description Nimbus INFINITY depicts an alternate future where humanity lives on a war-torn Earth. There is a struggle in the world between space factions that use flying robots in battles. Events take place in 2100, where some people moved to other planets, and the central government of the CFN created an association of warring factions. Battle Frame technology is falling into disuse as elite fighters begin to create neural links with powerful ‘Mechs, enhancing their abilities during battle.

item.title: It's Only Money
item.description: Game Description It’s Only Money will immerse gamers in the realistic story of a resident of the underworld, who, by order of the mayor of Rockhaven, was thrown into a huge pit. But don’t despair! Together with other inhabitants of the underground, you can return to the surface and begin your path to wealth and power. You must steal from the rich, fight tycoons, and regain control of the city block by block.

item.title: Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure
item.description: Game Description Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure is a virtual adventure, the plot of which is built around the confrontation between two heroines and the villain Cyblin Lord. The narrative is split between two realities. In one of them, the protagonist is Dot, a character in the in-game world, and in the other, her creator named Bug, an Atari employee. The antagonist interferes with Bug’s past, trying to change her creative plans and prevent the creation of a happy universe for Dot.

item.title: Space Reign
item.description: Game Description Space Reign is an exciting project that combines several colorful formats. In addition to the main storyline, there is a sandbox mode in which you can freely explore the universe and engage in open-ended gameplay. Here you need to try different strategies, experiment with the configuration of ships, discover hidden secrets and rare resources. One of the product’s strengths is its attention to detail and immersion. The universe feels alive - bustling space stations, bustling trade routes, clashes with friendly and hostile factions.

item.title: Army of ruin
item.description: Game Description Army of Ruin is a hybrid of a shooter, a horned, action and an auto -waist. It has a meta-progression. For the collected coins, you can forever pump the stats in the breaks between the races. According to the plot, legendary heroes fight the Evil Army. Before starting the game, you can choose a character and a card. Some fighters and locations are originally blocked. They become accessible in the fulfillment of certain conditions.

item.title: Nocturnal
item.description: Game Description Nocturnal is an exciting action platformer in which you will plunge into a world of mysterious mysteries and dangers. You play as Ardeshir, a warrior of the Unquenchable Fire, who has returned to his home island of Nakhran, only to find his land engulfed in a dark haze. Your task is to uncover the secrets of this mysterious darkness, defeat it and return your people to the light. Caution is your main ally in this campaign.

item.title: Driftwood
item.description: Game Description Driftwood is a fascinating journey into the world of high -speed descent on Longboard. The main character is Eddie, a cool sliven who loves to ride in beautiful landscapes. This game provides an ideal balance of speed and control, bringing a feeling of relaxation and calm, despite a high -speed action. The project offers minimalistic experience, focusing on skating on magnificent landscapes, and not on building a story campaign.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Elypse
item.description: Game Description Elypse is an atmospheric metroidvania, which is a mixture of classic platformer and 2D action. The action takes place in the very depths of hell. The plot tells how every 10 years it is necessary to sacrifice people to the Abyss in order to protect oneself from the mystical Abyss - an otherworldly force with destructive power. Unfortunately, the main character was chosen to become a victim. There is always a chance of salvation: if you manage to pass all the tests that the Abyss has prepared, then you can continue your life.

item.title: Occupy Mars: The Game
item.description: Game Description Colonizing a planet in Occupy Mars is a challenging but fun task. Here the player will have to build his own base, explore the expanses of the red desert, extract water, grow food and find new ways to obtain oxygen. An open world with great sandbox potential will allow you to seriously immerse yourself in the role of a pioneer on Mars. Using advanced technologies, Occupy Mars will create a developed network of buildings.

item.title: Voidtrain
item.description: Game Description In the fairy-tale world of Voidtrain, you need to survive by train. Here the player awaits a journey between unique worlds filled with dangers and adventures. The main characters were mechanics who were sorting out the rubble of a war-torn laboratory in Koenigsberg. Here they find secret Nazi documents pointing to strange research. They lead the mechanics to a portal to the Interworld - a parallel reality filled with wonders.

item.title: Death, Soul and Robots
item.description: Game Description Death, Soul and Robots is a new exciting game in the Metroidvania genre, which immerses users on an unusual trip on the planet, which is on the verge of disappearance. In the role of the main character - a charming cat - you have to find the soul of planet 42, which is the only chance to save the Earth from imminent destruction. However, you can’t cope with this task alone, because you will meet many companions and opponents on the way.

item.title: KILLBUG
item.description: Game Description KILLBUG offers a unique and intense gaming experience that sets it apart from typical shooters. You take on the role of the fearsome Killbug, an insectoid creature that has faced exile and relentless persecution from its former kin. Armed with a deadly blade and an SMG pistol, you must fight your way through a series of unforgiving hordes of insects, from beetles to spiders and even a colossal maggot monster.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Silica
item.description: Game Description Silica is a dynamic alloy of action and a science fiction strategy that revolves around a fierce struggle for power over a Baltarus, a planet who is replete with quartz crystals, desired for all fractions. Players can manage their armies as commanders from orbit or plunge into battle with their heads as an infantry, vehicles or various insect -like aliens. Silica allows gamers to choose their game style without limiting them to specific rules.

item.title: Tape to Tape
item.description: Game Description Tape to Tape is a sports simulation that offers gamers an original roguelite approach. Every decision you make has a huge impact on your journey to creating the best hockey team. Choose your path, recruit unique players, find synergies between them, choose special abilities, bribe the judges or visit the Blademaster to restore the former glory of hockey. Explore the beautiful world of hockey in a roguelike style, where every decision you make matters as you rebuild hockey in all its glory.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail
item.description: Game Description Honkai: Star Rail is a role -playing adventure in which you can play for one of the four characters. Heroes travel around the world with a team. Each member of the detachment is represented by a unique class and fights using individual abilities. An open world and various dungeons with strong bosses and valuable loot are available for research. The fighting is represented by a step -by -step system in the spirit of classic Japanese role -playing games.

item.title: Magical Drop 6
item.description: Game Description Magical Drop VI, the next installment in the popular Japanese arcade game series, combines a captivating storyline, colorful characters, various modes and difficulty levels, and the ability to play with other people online or offline. In this game, you can choose your favorite character from 15, each with their own personality, backstory, and soundtrack. You can then choose from a variety of available modes, depending on your mood and preferences.

item.title: Total Conflict: Resistance
item.description: Game Description Total Conflict: Resistance is an incredible mixture of global strategy, tactics and an action in the first person that provides incredible battles, many types of armored vehicles, weapons and armor, as well as unique mechanics to immerse you in exciting gameplay. You have to take part in events, manage units, create your army and produce or purchase armored vehicles and weapons. You can also build fortifications, outposts and settlements, manage military operations in the first person, as well as in tactical mode.

item.title: Teslagrad Remastered
item.description: Game Description Teslagrad Remastered invites you to embark on an epic adventure through a unique universe full of dangers and mysteries, where you will have to uncover the secrets of the ancient technology of Teslamancy and save the kingdom of Electropia from a cruel tyrant. In this thrilling remake of the 2D action platformer, you’ll use electromagnetism to jump over chasms, solve challenging puzzles, and take on multiple enemies. Moving through hand-drawn locations, you will explore the mysterious Tesla Tower and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of steampunk - a dark and inhospitable Europe, where the spirit of industrial progress and technological development collided with a dystopian future.

item.title: Swirl Watch
item.description: Game Description Swirl Watch is a stealth scene of a horn, unfolding on a gas giant undergoing excessive operation. Players have to penetrate industrial complexes, bypass or neutralize protection vessels, committing corporate sabotage to create a resistance movement. In the dense atmosphere of the planet Cloud 2, ships find each other only in laser light, noise of engines and echolocation. This situation creates specific conditions for bypassing patrols and dismantling cloud processing stations.

item.title: Bosorka
item.description: Game Description Bosorka offers to take on the role of a young witch named Horpina, who must muster all her courage and cunning to defeat the evil demons that threaten to plunge the world into darkness. With the help of an ancient Grimoire, Horpina summons an acquaintance, but cannot control his power. The spell is broken, and the Grimoire finds itself at the mercy of evil forces that summon unspeakable monsters.

item.title: DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters
item.description: Game Description DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters is an adventure in which you explore the other world, trying to uncover the secrets of a lost memory. The game is filled with humor and mysticism. The graphic style is represented by an unusual voxel design. You will need to control the protagonist from a third party. Sometimes a game can change perspective, turning the gameplay on its head. Together with the hero you will have to save the world from the impending threat.

item.title: Rusted Moss
item.description: Game Description Rusted Moss is a dynamic platformer that stands out with swiftness and hardcore complexity. Actions are developing in the world of post -apocalypse. Life has long died, and everything was rusting around. Fight with rebellious machines covered with rust. The heroine Rusted Moss can jump, shoot and cling to the protrusions hook-cat. The visual side is made in a stylish pixel art with a retro-atmosphere. Game mechanics relieve on the old-school platformers of the 90s, but at the same time introducing many modern elements.

item.title: First Racer
item.description: Game Description First Racer is an arcade race where victory is achieved not only through quick reactions, but also through proper preparation of the car. The project offers a wide range of competitive disciplines, covering both city streets and specialized tracks. For fans of extreme driving, there are cross-country races that require a special approach to control. Drifting competitions, in turn, test your car control in a controlled drift, where points are awarded based on angle, speed and style of execution.

item.title: Meet Your Maker
item.description: Game Description Meet Your Maker invites you to plunge into a post-apocalyptic world, where each level is created by gamers themselves. You have to fight both alone and in pairs with a friend, building cunning labyrinths of terrible traps and guards at your bases in order to protect the most valuable thing - genetic material. As Guardian of the Chimera, a living experiment created to save life on Earth, you must capture other players' bases and extract even more material from them.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: Saga of Sins
item.description: Game Description Saga of Sins is an atmospheric action role-playing game in a dark setting in which you take on the role of demonic creatures to fight the deadly sins and free the village of Sinwell from the infection. In this action-packed adventure, you play as Cecil the priest, who can enter people’s minds and transform into unique demons, each with their own individual skills and abilities. Fight enemies, collect gold and upgrade your demons to become even stronger and face new challenges.

item.title: RAIDBORN
item.description: Game Description RAIDBORN is a first-person fantasy action RPG that will satisfy your thirst for adventure and immerse you in a highly detailed and atmospheric world. Featuring dynamically generated dungeons and quests that will keep you on your toes as you plunder a world strewn with treasure. Explore challenging quests and quirky characters, all accompanied by epic fantasy music and voiceovers for key dialogue. The combat is intense and satisfying, offering a variety of exciting combat techniques and a varied arsenal of melee and ranged weapons to choose from.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 4 Remake is a full-fledged remake of the cult fourth part, which is rightfully considered one of the best in the series. The developers took into account the criticism of fans after the release of the remake of the third game and did not stray far from their roots, adhering to the course taken with Resident Evil 2. The plot has not undergone drastic changes, however, some storylines have been added that were not in the original, the arcs of minor characters have expanded and, Of course, the controls have been improved and the graphics have been significantly updated.

item.title: Mortal Sin
item.description: Game Description Mortal Sin stands out for its visual style. The graphics in this indie project combines 2D and 3D, and resembles an experimental animation. And the title itself is a first -person action hybrid of the action hybrid in the setting of dark fantasy. In the game made by just one developer there is blood and meat. It will be a person who fell into a certain semblance of purgatory or hell to manage it.

item.title: Nucleares
item.description: Game Description Nucleares may be of interest to lovers of original projects and unusual indie-symptures. This is a simulator of an employee of a nuclear power plant with a first -person view. The character has arms, legs and torso. They can be seen if you lower the camera. The hero turns out to be the only employee at an experimental nuclear power plant for which large staff does not need. This object requires only one person, because artificial intelligence is responsible for everything else.

item.title: Barotrauma
item.description: Game Description Barotrauma is a two -dimensional simulator decorated in the style of the platformer. According to the plot, your courageous shoulders are entrusted to enter the captain of the real submarine, but you will not control it on the ground, but on one of the satellites of Jupiter called Europe, in the bowels of which the underground ocean spreads. The surface of the satellite is shrouded in an impassable radiation layer, due to which the colony of people are forced to hide under the thickness of the ice that protect the local waters.

item.title: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
item.description: Game Description The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker is an immersive, atmospheric role-playing adventure that takes you into the fictional world of Imbertal. The game focuses on classic old-school mechanics, allowing you to venture into a dark and dangerous dark fantasy setting. The main character is a cursed lord named Rothar Aekrest, who must deal with problems on his land, facing various obstacles and participating in difficult combat encounters with monsters. When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Boneraiser Minions
item.description: Game Description Boneraiser Minions plunges you into a very dark fantasy universe, where powerful creatures once lived, whom people called boneraisers. They were none other than necromancers - wizards who delved into the study of the dark arts and, with their help, learned to raise the dead from their graves, then making their slaves out of them. The main character is one of these magicians, who was caught red-handed and decided to resort to the only method practiced in those days - burning at the stake and then burial in a sacred temple.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2019
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2019 - Restation of the first part of the Modern Warfare series released in 2007. The plot tells about the war in Syria and Iraq. The cooperative game tells about the conflict in the east of Ukraine. The gameplay includes 5 groups: SAS, al-Katala, CIA, Urzikstan militia and the RF Armed Forces. Actions will take place in two fictional powers: Castovia and Urzyikostan. The main character is a familiar character of the original Call of Duty character - Captain John Price.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description Contraband Police - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. The inspection tasks include: checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak immerses players in the bustling world of the Kalvard Republic. Van Arkrid, a spriggan ready to take on any job, finds himself embroiled in a story that will shake the entire country to its core. This latest installment in the Trails series goes beyond expectations with an updated AT combat system that seamlessly blends field skirmishes and turn-based combat. Xipha, the sixth generation tactical orbital pistol, revolutionizes gameplay, offering a new twist on the franchise’s signature style.

item.title: DREADFUL River
item.description: Game Description DREADFUL River is an arcade rafting simulator on the river on a raft with elements of role -playing play, action and tactics. The project was carried out in medieval setting. The plot tie begins with the attack of enemies on the kingdom. While the enemies are storming the castle, the king with a small group of the most faithful guards goes in search of an eternal crown, about which different legends go.

item.title: We are screen!
item.description: Game Description We are screen! - This is a scientific and fantastic action with elements of a cirow, in which you will find yourself in the pilot’s chair in order to save multi-sized from death. Are you ready for an exciting joint game, like which has not yet been? But beware, chaos reigns in here, and it is your team from 4 space cadets to restore balance. After the theft of great forks, the fabric itself is put on the map.

item.title: Phantom Brigade
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brigade is a turn-based science fiction strategy game. The action takes place in a country that has become the victim of a large-scale invasion by a foreign power. Enemy forces defeated the army and began the occupation. You will have to act as a resistance commander trying to reclaim his homeland from the invaders. The player spends most of his time commanding units of small mechs and completing dangerous missions in a turn-based system.

item.title: Company of Heroes 3
item.description: Game Description Company of Heroes 3 continues the turn-based strategy series, which unfolds in real time. The theater of military operations is the Mediterranean, where it is also important to make strategically correct decisions, planning every step. It features thoughtful gameplay, a new battle front, many units and factions, and the opportunity to take part in cinematically evolving battles. In TBS, the user fights with different factions using battle groups and units, controlling air, sea and ground types of troops, operating in a realistically destructible environment, taking part in a military conflict during the Second World War.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy
item.description: Game Description Hogwarts Legacy is a role-playing game based on the famous books about the boy wizard “Harry Potter”. The events of Hogwarts: Legacy take place long before the birth of the main character of the books and films. The story dates back to the 19th century, specifically in the 1800s. The game takes place in the same universe and in the same school, so fans of the original saga will find many references and meet some familiar characters.

item.title: Violet Wisteria
item.description: Game Description Violet Wisteria is a 90’s style platform action game that will amaze gamers with its unique attack system. Swinging your sword will take you through 8 stages of skill- and reaction-based platforming. The game takes us back to the Japanese fantasy platformers of the 80s and 90s. Your task is to save the Earth, the Overworld and the Underworld by controlling Wisteria Asagiri. Mastering the three-color attack system will help you overcome many obstacles and enemies, and moving through many dimensions will help you thwart the insidious villain Maskandes.

item.title: Spectator
item.description: Game Description Spectator can please fans of Internet folklore. This game is inspired by popular urban legends. Here you can go Backstage, visit Slenderman’s habitat and visit other locations. It’s full of all kinds of references. The video game is a representative of the point-and-click survival horror genre. The indie title uses a first-person perspective. Before you start, you can choose one of 3 difficulty types: normal, hard and nightmare. There are 6 levels (days) in total.

item.title: Risky Woods
item.description: Game Description Risky Woods invites gamers to a breathtaking, adrenaline-filled arcade adventure! Are you ready to take on the biggest test yet? As the fearless warrior Rohan, you must fight your way through treacherous forests and dark caves. But beware - the path is full of dangers, from stomping Skeletons to insidious traps and face-snatching flying devils! Arms in hand, you must navigate treacherous terrain, free petrified monks, and defeat the evil Draxos once and for all.

item.title: Dread Templar
item.description: Game Description Dread Templar may be suitable for those who are nostalgic for the old first-person shooters from the late nineties and early two thousand. There is blood and meat in the game. In this retro FPS, the player controls the Dread Templar. He fights demons and undead. The hero can carry with him an entire arsenal of weapons and a large supply of ammunition for them. There is a bow, a double-barreled sawn-off shotgun, a shotgun, a rocket launcher, a grenade launcher, and a revolver.

item.title: Pizza Tower
item.description: Game Description Pizza Tower stands out with its pixel graphics and animation. The art imitates old cartoon series from the end of the last century. The project also boasts an energetic soundtrack. It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This title is the spiritual successor to the video games from the Wario Land series. In it you can walk left and right, run, accelerate, jump, make dashes, break some obstacles, ride mounts, and turn into monsters.

item.title: Hi-Fi RUSH
item.description: Game Description Hi-Fi RUSH tells the story of the adventures of a guy named Chai. This music lover without one arm decided to take part in the Armstrong project. Vandeley Technologies provides implants to people with physical disabilities, but in return requires them to work for themselves. The hero was supposed to become a scavenger after receiving a mechanical prosthesis. However, during the operation, a music player is accidentally implanted into his chest and gives him new powers.

item.title: Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game
item.description: Game Description Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game lives up to its name. This is an indie survival horror. The project was made in the setting of the First World War. It uses the first-person view familiar to the genre. If you turn the camera down, the protagonist’s legs and arms will be displayed on the screen. The events take place in 1917. In Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game you will play as soldier James.

item.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game – Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game - Complete Edition is a whirlwind arcade action-adventure game based on the plot of the famous series of graphic novels and the movie of the same name. In addition to the original game, equally exciting add-ons Knives Chau and Wallace are also available. Players can choose to play through many of their favorite characters, such as Scott Pilgrim himself, Ramona, Knives, Stephen Stills and others.

item.title: Fargone
item.description: Game Description Fargone is a role shooter with survival elements in which gamers fall into the world after a mysterious nuclear disaster, known as the Wasteland. Here you will have to survive by any means, whether it is alone or entering into alliances with various fractions. Explore the gloomy and atmospheric lands of the wasteland, where life continues, despite the terrible catastrophe. Here you will find not only other surviving, but also stray corpses affected by infection caused by disaster.

item.title: Psychosis
item.description: Game Description psychosis is a retro-game in the Survival-Horror style, in which the gamer has to fight with demons and his own reason in the endless hell. In this psychological horror, you will have to fight with a breathtaking gameplay for an hour to survive in the surrounding perverted world. The plot begins with the fact that after midnight the protagonist arrives a mysterious phone call. The voice on the other end of the line urgently asks the hero to come as soon as possible, because they all left.

item.title: EXOME
item.description: Game Description EXOME may be of interest to lovers of playing games with friends. The multiplayer is designed for 2-4 users. For those who like single more, there is an opportunity to play alone. This is a cooperative shooter with a third person with elements of survival and horror. When using optical sights, the camera angle during firing for a short time changes from the eyes. The project is made on the Unreal Engine 5 engine.

item.title: Military Conflict: Vietnam
item.description: Game Description Military Conflict: Vietnam is a fast-paced multiplayer first-person shooter that combines fast-paced arcade action with the realism of intense battles. The game invites you to plunge into the fierce confrontation between the American army and the Viet Cong guerrillas, concentrating on close combat. The gameplay mechanics and controls are familiar to fans of the genre, which allows you to quickly immerse yourself in the process, and for beginners there is a training ground where you can hone your skills.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: High on Life
item.description: Game Description High On Life is a humorous first -person shooter with metroid elements. It is made in a science fiction setting. Moments with the action alternate with more calm episodes, where you need to chat with hasty characters, fulfill their instructions and solve puzzles. The rich arsenal includes unusual and diverse weapons with two types of shooting - the main and alternative. There are analogues of pistols, shotgun, machine guns and so on.

item.title: Voor De Kroon
item.description: Game Description Historical battles in Voor De Kroon take place during the Dark Middle Ages, where knights with bladed weapons ruled. The game is a tactical slasher game where users will be able to engage in large-scale battles and at the same time control the coordination and movement of troops by giving orders. The main task is to seize the throne in order to conquer the Dutch kingdom in the 13th century.

item.title: Portal with RTX
item.description: Game Description Portal with RTX completely rethifies the visual side of the classic portal by tracing rays, completely updated high -resolution textures, drawn surroundings, etc. Light is reflected from the surface and the shadows from all physical objects are realistically discarded. Rays dissipate fog or smoke. The updated visual significantly rethinks the original game, thereby offering to experience a new experience from passing. The actions of Portal with RTX are developing in the Half Life universe.

item.title: Spire of Glory
item.description: Game Description Spire of Glory is a pixelated action roguelike that will take you on a climb to the top of this majestic mountain to prove your worth. Start your journey from scratch and make the right choices to become strong enough to overcome all the challenges of the Spire. To survive, you will have to fight enemies and collect crystals to purchase and upgrade items, as well as expand your team.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere inHELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: Valkie 64
item.description: Game Description In Valkie 64, users get to enjoy the adventures of the guard Valkie, who will roam the fantasy world. You have to save the kingdom of Celis by going down into dark dungeons with monsters. The project is a three-dimensional action adventure game where you have to move through levels and destroy various creatures that will be aggressive towards the character. The heroine will be able to face ordinary opponents and dangerous bosses that await at the end of each dungeon.

item.title: Ship of Fools
item.description: Game Description The comic roguelike Ship of Fools will take you to a fantasy world inhabited by strange creatures with a clearly low level of intelligence. And besides, they have an amazing ability to get into various kinds of troubles and funny situations, from which they amusingly try to find a way out. Another such situation is of a very global and sad nature. In a fictional country called the Archipelago, an Aquapocalypse is approaching, due to which all the islands may soon go under water.

Game Description The sandbox 171 stands out against the background of other GTA clones with its entourage. The action takes place in Brazil. The creators offer to ride on the suburbs of San Paulo. Poor areas with narrow streets, graffiti on the walls, dirt and garbage add a special flavor of the local atmosphere. The player controls his character with a third -person view. During shooting on the street, the camera is transferred by the hero’s shoulder.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: We Who Are About To Die
item.description: Game Description We Who Are About To Die takes the gamer back to the times of Ancient Rome and allows you to enter the arena as a gladiator. These magnificent fighters were mostly slaves and were forced to fight for their master in the hope of gaining glory on the sand and hoping for a chance to eventually become free, but only a few achieved this goal. Offers multiplayer content, thanks to which the gamer will fight against other real users in difficult battles.

item.title: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
item.description: Game Description Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes gamers on an interactive adventure that follows the development of the video game industry over fifty years. Users will watch a variety of arcade projects in which they will take part. You will be able to enjoy a variety of gameplay mechanics that underlie the following projects: Swordquest, VCTR-SCTR, Neo Breakout, Quadtank, Yars' Revenge Reimagined, Haunted Houses, etc. Users of Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration will have a wide variety of opportunities to immerse themselves in pixelated arcade games made in the spirit of old-school retro games from the 90s.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime allows users to go to the study of the galaxy by taking space knights. The game is a role-playing adventure with elements of Rowl, where you have to move along the retro-futuristic universe in order to save the kingdom from the Lords of the abyss that abducted the sun. The protagonist will be a noble traveler, which is the last hope for the salvation of mankind.

item.title: Lunistic
item.description: Game Description Lunistice may be of interest to those nostalgic for early 3D platformers. The graphics in this project are specially made in a low-poly style and in low resolution. This retro platformer imitates the console hits that came out on fifth-generation consoles in the 90s. He suggests exploring the memories of the main character named Hana. In the story, she is trying to get to the Moon. Her adventures consist of linear levels.

item.title: The Classrooms
item.description: Game Description The Classrooms is a retro-styled psychological indie survival horror game with a first-person perspective and a VHS filter overlaid on top of the screen. The project stands out for its procedural generation of levels. They are liminal spaces. The map is created anew with each new playthrough. According to the developers, their creation can generate billions of possible variations. The point of the gameplay is to explore the entities that live in the stages.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror filmSIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: USAC: Code Breach
item.description: Game Description USAC: Code Breach is a unique co-op experience based on the French cyberpunk universe. You and your partner will have to investigate the sudden shutdown of a scientific center. The protagonist will have to act in a difficult situation, where every step can lead to death. It’s the middle of the 21st century - the world is going through big changes. The climate and energy crisis is being felt around the world.

item.title: Last Command
item.description: Game Description Last Command is deceptively easy to learn. To control, the player will only need the arrows on the keyboard and the mouse, but this does not make the task easier at all. A huge number of obstacles on the way, bosses with a large area of ​​​​AoE damage and many additional small attacks will definitely not let you relax. The game is perfect for those who love hardcore challenges mixed with a puzzle.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Void Scrappers
item.description: Game Description Void Scrappers will tell about the eternal confrontation between humanity and aggressive aliens. According to the tradition of the science fiction genre, events take place in a future world in which people have achieved a high level of scientific and technological progress, which allowed them to explore the far frontiers of space. Soon they encountered other intelligent alien races and entered into a bloody war with one of them.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in theVampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: Backrooms: Escape Together
item.description: Game Description Backrooms: Escape Together is an atmospheric horror film designed for cooperative play, where in a group of 4 real users you need to find a way out of another dimension and return to the normal world. The scientists who were sent into these mysterious labyrinths almost completed their mission and were supposed to return back, but the mechanism broke down and they lost the opportunity to return. They know about one more exit, but it lies through the most separated levels, through which only a few managed to get through.

item.title: Cat Saves Halloween
item.description: Game Description Cat Saves Halloween is a game where a magical cat has to face an invasion of monsters on the eve of All Hallows' Day. The furry hero has the right to fight this threat or simply cause chaos in the city. His arsenal of skills includes both ordinary cat habits such as running and climbing, and supernatural skills, including witchcraft and control over people. The protagonist is also able to use hairballs, which creates another level of interaction with the world and its inhabitants.

item.title: CULTIC
item.description: Game Description Death inCULTIC is the beginning of a mysterious path, so you shouldn’t be afraid of it. The player will have to muster up the courage to fight through hordes of perverted cultists in order to gain the upper hand in this battle. As the character progresses, he encounters hundreds of NPCs with completely frozen minds, who are guided by blind faith in their ideals. The cultists are further corrupted by an immortal and invisible entity that seeks sole domination of the world.

item.title: Super Jagger Bomb
item.description: Game Description Super Jagger Bomb sets the gamer with the task of neutralizing incendiary devices on multi -level arenas. The main character in the cloak should quickly collect all the bombs in order to prevent the explosion. To move in locations, he uses running, jumping and jerking in the air. A special technique allows you to quickly fall down, which adds an element of tactical planning of the route to the process and turns it into a kind of puzzle.

item.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
item.description: Game Description 1428: Shadows over Silesia is a dark adventure where real historical events are intertwined with fantasy ones. There is a place here for those who worship the devil, who committed real crimes in his honor, as well as demons and other mythical creatures capable of attacking travelers. If a player accidentally finds himself in the minority, then we can say that this is certain death, since tactics cannot defeat creatures strongly, but you can learn from your own mistakes and save a larger squad at the right time.

item.title: Bibots
item.description: Game Description Bibots is a sci-fi action thriller that introduces the strange character Tayyar. This creature has the ability to transform into the mechanical robot Beebot. Moreover, there is far from just one - there are many varieties of Bibots and each of them differs in appearance, fighting style and set of perks. The protagonist’s task is to save the world from certain monsters. To complete the goal, you will have to travel through dozens of biomes, each of which has unique architecture and landscape.

item.title: NeverAwake
item.description: Game Description NeverAwake is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with beautiful hand-drawn graphics about a girl named Rem. She is still a child of 10 years old and suffers from regular nightmares in which she strives to conquer everything that brought her resentment and pain in real life. Her opponents are not the classic monsters from banal dreams, but those who were somehow able to damage her psyche. These are school friends and just classmates, dentists who hurt when they pulled out teeth and even yard dogs that try to bite her every morning when she goes to school.

item.title: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
item.description: Game Description Salt 2: Shores of Gold tells the story of the complex life of a lone pirate who travels on a small sailing ship. Unlike other games on a similar theme, this project does not focus on sea battles or robbing other ships. The player will have to spend the bulk of his time constantly exploring the vast expanses of water and searching for treasures. The main character feels that the ocean is his real home.

item.title: HYPER DEMON
item.description: Game Description HYPER DEMON is a minimalist and experimental first-person shooter. It stands out for its visual style. It has very fast and dynamic gameplay. Here you can make jerks, slide, perform regular jumps and something like rocket jumps. There are more than a dozen techniques in total. You can master all these mechanics through training. The protagonist shoots daggers at demonic creatures from his outstretched hand. He is also capable of using consumable gems.

item.title: Metal: Hellsinger
item.description: Game Description In the hellish shooter Metal: Hellsinger, you need to destroy crowds of enemies in time with the music. Half human, half demon, the main character travels to the most terrible places of the underworld in search of revenge. There, hordes of demons, their lords and the legendary Scarlet Judge are waiting for him. On his bloody path he will be accompanied by heavy metal sounds and a varied arsenal of devilish weapons.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: Gunner, Heat, PC!
item.description: Game Description Gunner, Heat, PC! - A tank simulator aimed at realistic battles between military equipment from the Cold War. The gameplay focuses on realistic behavior of each tank. Each type of combat transport has unique management features, and is also represented by individual characteristics. Gunner gameplay, Heat, PC! It is distinguished by a high level of complexity. The players have such legendary tank models as T-55A or M-60A3. By managing your tank, it is necessary to destroy enemy objects and perform many different tasks.

item.title: Gloomwood
item.description: Game Description Gloomwood is not just an indie chorror in the first person. The game offers to survive in the open world. The project has stealth elements. The Title boasts the elaborate sound system, which is believably spreads the noise during the movement of the user. Gloomwood transfers gamer to the Gothic city, in which the Victorian era and steampunk were intertwined. The user explores it freely, choosing ways independently. The protagonist was stolen and transported to a gloomy metropolis, whose inhabitants mysteriously disappeared somewhere.

item.title: Brok The Investigator
item.description: Game Description Brok The Investigator is an adventure role -playing game that combines the elements of the action, quest and detective. In the center of history, anthropomorphic creatures. You play for a crocodile-drinker named Brock, investigating a mysterious case. During the game, you have to use not only the bright mind, but also the fists. Choose a detective that has to play. You can be a good cop, trying to resolve conflicts with the help of a good word, or you can knock out information through rough power.

item.title: Kalinur
item.description: Game Description Kalinur sends a player on a trip to a huge castle to confront a wizard who plunged the kingdom into suffering. It is necessary to explore the nonlinear card in order to find the sorcerer and put an end to its influence. The main task is to return the world by overcoming the source of disasters. The adventure is built on overcoming serious trials, bringing awards and contributing to advance to the final battle with a powerful magician.

item.title: Spirit of the Island
item.description: Game Description Life simulator Spirit of the Island places the player on a tropical island, offering to grow crops, take care of pets, help the locals and much more. Spirit of the Island will require turning the deserted Archipelago into a populated tourist center. However, this requires a lot of effort and a thorny path from a small farm to a noisy city. The danger comes from pirates who are also hunting for treasure and exploring the tropical paradise.

item.title: Rollerdrome
item.description: Game Description The Rollerdrome shooter combines dynamic and vibrant battles, smooth graphics, third-person view and tactical mechanics that allow you to influence the outcome of the battle even with lower chances of winning. The player will have to participate in fierce battles with a variety of opponents. By killing opponents, the main character restores health and replenishes ammunition. During the fight, you can perform spectacular tricks, dodges, or use various tactical movements to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horrorEscape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered
item.description: Game Description Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered is an open-world action-adventure game set in New York City. Supervillains break free in the form of characters such as Mister Negative, Rhino, Scorpio, Vulture and Electro. But before he can track them down, Peter Parker contacts William Fisk. After he arrests a businessman, a gang war breaks out. Now only Spider-Man can stop the crime raging in the city. Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered includes an extensive expansion for The City That Never Sleeps.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description InCult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Estella's Nightmare: Sealed Space and a Succubus Curse
item.description: Game Description Estella’s Nightmare: Sealed Space and a Succubus’s Curse is designed for gamers over 18 years of age due to a plentiful amount of hentai censorship. There are episodes with a demonstration of sex with different people and monsters (including tenstakes). In total, in the game it will be typed for such videos for 20 minutes. This project has two -dimensional drawn graphics with worked out and detailed animation (thanks to Live2D technology).

item.title: GigaBash
item.description: Game Description GigaBash is an adventure game about huge kaiju monsters capable of destroying entire cities. One day, humanity was faced with a global threat: huge monsters appeared on Earth and began to wage a protracted battle among themselves, destroying human settlements and killing each other. Gigabash talks about how complete chaos reigned on the planet: people fight against unknown creatures, monsters fight with themselves and confront people. Absolute madness and destruction reign.

item.title: Plateup!
item.description: Game Description Plateup! -This is an arcade simulator of cooking and restaurant control with elements of time management. This arcade is designed for cooperative passage. Multiplayer is available through a local network (LAN) and the Internet. There is also the opportunity to play together at the same computer. Single mode is also available. In this video game, users own a whole franchise. Each institution is a separate level. It randomly generates the conditions, climate and visitors.

item.title: Star Valor
item.description: Game Description Star Valor gives many opportunities: to explore the huge expanses of the galaxy on the cosmic shuttle, to extract resources, to trade, to fight and create your own weapons. With the help of flexible tools, you can configure the ship by your own preference. Each decision -making affects relations with fractions and has its consequences. At the start, it is necessary to take the place of the captain of a small ship, to fulfill simple instructions and hire small personnel.

item.title: Ctrl Alt Ego
item.description: Game Description Ctrl Alt Ego uses a science fiction setting. The action takes place in the gloomy future. The plot is dedicated to the fate of human consciousness. The game is a first -person shooter and an immersion simulator. It must be controlled by the incorporeal ego of the protagonist. The main character can instill in robots and objects (for example, doors or computers). He cannot really die. In the case of the destruction of the membrane, the hero simply returns to the form of the spirit and does not lose progress.

item.title: Like Dreamer
item.description: Game Description Like Dreamer acts in a virtual space that operates as a social network in the Bullethell genre-a concept called Bullet-Shell SNS. Players control the character, passing through the streams of shells launched by other users on many digital locations. The main goal is to accumulate a larger number of likes and subscribers from the intra -game audience awarded for performance during the gameplay. This mechanics allows gamers to build a reputation and increase their recognition on the internal social platform.

item.title: Stray
item.description: Game Description Stray takes the player to the distant future, the world of cyberpunk. The story follows the adventures of a lost cat looking for his way home. A stray animal found itself in the fortified city of Kowloon, from which it is not easy to find a way out. People have not lived here for a long time, and the streets are filled with robots. Find out the secrets of a long-abandoned settlement.

item.title: Tor Eternum
item.description: Game Description Tor Eternum is an exciting role -playing online game with a cooperative regime, which offers colorful experience for players looking for exciting adventures. Take friends, because here you can unite with 10 companions and go on a trip through a huge and insidious tower, where surprises and dangers await you at every step. You will meet many enemies that will give you the opportunity to test your skills and strategic skills.

item.title: Sentry City
item.description: Game Description Sentry City, a cyberpunk adventure, immerses gamers in a dystopian future where an evil AI is destroying social order. Taking on the role of a resourceful hacker, the player races through the metropolis on a motorcycle, infiltrating various areas of the city, each of which represents a separate treacherous landscape. Dexterity and quick reflexes are crucial as opponents require precision shooting, intricate puzzles require solving, and formidable AI guardians await confrontation.

item.title: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley 2 is an isometric adventure and puzzle game. What is posted here is not the original version, but a re-release called Panoramic Edition. It contains all previously released additional content. The project was initially released on mobile devices. When transferring the title to PC, the developers adapted the controls. They also added support for ultra-wide monitors and improved the visual component, which can now be admired in Full HD.

item.title: Neon Blight
