item.description: Game Description Neon Blight is an isometric metroidvania in a cyberpunk setting in which you will manage your own underground weapons store. When collecting unique weapons, you need to sell them at a high price. The game features a huge number of locations. The battles will take place in the scenery of the metropolis of the future, in dense forests, warehouses of large corporations, etc. Most of Neon Blight’s elements are procedurally generated, changing the placement of items and some location details.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Starship Troopers - Terran Command
item.description: Game Description Starship Troopers - Terran Command is a real -time strategy developed based on the Feature Film Star landing. Engage in the construction of the base, get resources and create an army to fight with giant insects living on a foreign planet. You need to colonize the hostile planet, which was suitable for the human race, but a huge number of hostile alien creatures live on its surface. Take the role of the leader of the Terran army.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Postal: Brain Damage
item.description: Game Description Postal: Brain Damageed - Spin -Off series of a series of old -time jumper in the first person. Here, a classic dynamic gameplay for the same name is implemented, as well as the mass of black humor, satire, rudeness and recklessness. The game proposes the most crazy arsenal of weapons, there are many bonuses and a twisted plot, which is based on violence. To this end, the ability to strike the head, carry out a real massacre and even damage the brain to the opponent.

item.title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
item.description: Game Description Attack at Dawn North Africa is a military-strategic project that takes participants into the conditions of the North African campaign during the Second World War. Players will lead the Axis or Allied forces, taking command of battalions, divisions and air forces across the vast expanses of Libya and Egypt. Set across a vast map stretching from the Gulf of Sirte to the Suez Canal, the action spans the period 1940 to 1943.

item.title: Souldiers
item.description: Game Description Souldiers takes place right during the battle, where the forces of good are trying to defend their own right to exist. But at one point, an entire army ends up in Terragaya. This is a mystical country inside the underworld. They didn’t die, but they still had to get out of here to decide the outcome of their own battle. And to do this, you must first find a guard who will show the way to another world.

item.title: Kao The Kangaroo
item.description: Game Description Kao The Kangaroo is a three-dimensional platformer with a huge amount of action scenes. The game uses cartoon graphics to transmit the beauty of a fictional universe, in which the events of a single -user story campaign take place. Casual management allows players of different ages to quickly remember the keys used and enjoy the versatile mechanic used in the gameplay. The project, developed and published by the TATE Multimedia India, combines elements of constant fights with both small opponents and large, dangerous bosses, and a thoughtful plot with some dramatic turns that make virtual personalities experience.

item.title: Keplerth
item.description: Game Description The events of the futuristic Indo-video trigger Keplerth unfold in the distant future-on the previously unknown planet Kepler. According to the genre, the project can be attributed to the simulator of survival with the possibility of construction and RPG elements. According to the plot, people built a large spaceship, which was supposed to transport the colonists on board to the nearest planet suitable for life. But there is a disaster, as a result of which the ship crashes on an unknown planet.

item.title: Soda Crisis
item.description: Game Description Soda Crisis is an incredibly colorful and dynamic action game with runner elements in which the player will have to explore levels and destroy all enemies along the way using advanced weapons. The plot here is not particularly deep and is revealed only superficially, since the gameplay is mainly aimed at mild madness and constant shootings. Enemies attack from all sides, including from the air, so in order not to fall under their bullets, you need to constantly be on the move.

item.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate
item.description: Game Description Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate is an alternate version of chess with elements of classic roguelikes. Users will have to go on action missions, controlling a selected figure with a royal shotgun. The main task for the protagonist will be the destruction of enemy objects on a field designed in the form of a standard chessboard. Players have to destroy the white pieces on behalf of the Black King, who has prepared firearms.

item.title: Lost Nova
item.description: Game Description Lost Nova is an isometric adventure about a trip to space. A spaceship with the main character crashed. The girl was on an alien planet called Lost Nova. Left alone, the protagonist should explore the surface of the planet, collecting useful objects, creating tools, building a base and much more. All this is necessary in order to find the way home. The heroine is the name of Mia. She decided to spend a vacation outside the Earth, but could not even imagine what kind of disaster it would turn out.

item.title: HunterX
item.description: Game Description Gamers in HunterX will wander through dark dungeons, exploring a fantasy universe. The project is an action adventure game where you have to fight a variety of monsters. Players will move through side-view locations, encountering hardcore soulslick-style gameplay mechanics. You will have to use the protagonist’s abilities, various fighting stances and magic in battles. The heroine will use a variety of weapons for close combat, delivering slashing and piercing blows.

item.title: Metal Mind
item.description: Game Description Metal Mind is a 2D action roguelike that gives you the opportunity to control a mech that has a mind. The gameplay combines many mechanics and various physical quantities: weight, heat, power, etc. Metal Mind contains elements of looting. It is necessary to look for pieces of armor, improved weapons and create useful items. You have to transform the robot using hundreds of different assemblies. Events take place in a science fiction world where people have been able to build self-developing artificial intelligences that have managed to become self-aware.

item.title: Skabma - Snowfall
item.description: Game Description Skabma - Snowfall immerses you in a mythological setting, where users will take control of a young boy named Áilu. The hero will travel through the Scandinavian regions, encountering mystical creatures and monsters from ancient legends. The game is made in the form of a three-dimensional action-adventure game, where the main emphasis is on the deep storyline of the protagonist. The boy will face difficult challenges, fight enemies and solve various puzzles.

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Shredders
item.description: Game Description Shredders is a snowboarding simulator. The indie project contains a large number of references for fans of this sport and related media products. You can play it alone or with other users online. For single-player fans, there is a single-player story mode. The plot begins with the protagonist and best friend Scotty trying to make entertaining videos about winter extreme sports. A representative of one of the brands named Lisa contacts them and offers sponsorship along with participation in the championship.

item.title: Buccaneers!
item.description: Game Description Buccaneers adventures! takes gamers to a pirate setting, where they can become a fearless captain and go in search of lost treasures. You will have to face enemy ships, change the course of history and join one of the unique factions in order to seize full power over the Caribbean Sea. There are 4 sides in the game: British, French, Spanish and the formidable Pirate League. Each group will have unique abilities, appearances, and fighting styles during the battle at sea.

item.title: HordeCore
item.description: Game Description HordeCore is a dynamic scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. You can play alone or join forces with other players to survive together in a city plagued by a zombie epidemic. Explore, fight, survive, craft, customize, etc. Become the leader of a group that is constantly growing with new people. Try to find as many supplies as possible, develop your team’s skills, and make traps and various devices.

item.title: Elden Ring
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring is an open world role-playing game from the creators of Dark Souls and Bloodborne, in collaboration with writer George R.R. Martin. The gameplay is a third-person action RPG where you explore the expanses of a fantasy world, equip yourself with a variety of weapons and fight powerful enemies. In the game, even one enemy poses a serious threat. Battles are based on timing and parries. Carefully study the monsters' patterns to effectively counterattack their attacks.

item.title: Milling Machine Simulator 3D
item.description: Game Description Milling Machine Simulator 3D allows players to try themselves in the role of a master who will work at a milling machine. He will go out to drill, grind, cut and mill in a small hut where the protagonist’s private workshop is located. The game performs a training function, made in the form of a simulator of working at a machine in three-dimensional space, where realistic physics and the ability to carefully inspect components and equipment are implemented.

item.title: SCP: 5k
item.description: Game Description SCP: 5k - cooperative shooter in the first person with the elements of the horror. Play both alone and unite with friends. The game is represented by hardcore complexity. Particular attention is paid to the detailed environment and plot. The team can have up to four people. Go to a complex and saturated adventure! The story of SCP: 5k talks about how a foreign creature was discovered in the human psyche, which is responsible for all negative features: pain, cruelty, etc.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy is an action-adventure game that gives you the opportunity to engage in energetic sword fights with the enemy and plunge into an interesting story. The game is created on the basis of Scandinavian mythology, describing many non-standard legends, gods and their powers. The gamer will have to pick up a sword and gain strength that was previously only possessed by the celestials. The protagonist can immerse himself in a fascinating story and learn more about the bloody battle between Thor and Grungnir.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 3
item.description: Game Description GameplayTotal War: WARHAMMER 3 is a mixture of turn-based strategy and RTS. It is necessary to gather an army and move it around the global map, capturing all areas. By extracting resources and recruiting units, you will need to create settlements. You can enter into diplomacy with different factions, enter into alliances with them, or declare war. The economic part of Total War: Warhammer 3 is presented by TBS mechanics, while battles take place in real time.

item.title: OlliOlli World
item.description: Game Description OlliOlli World is the third part of an exciting action game where every user can feel like a professional skateboarder and perform several difficult tricks without the risk of driving face-first on the asphalt. The game will gladly welcome both experienced gamers and those who are getting acquainted with the universe for the first time. There is no clear linear plot, and the character can be completely customized without worrying about ride comfort.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: Chaos Chain
item.description: Game Description Chaos Chain is a role-playing project, which takes place in a dystopian world, where every alley hides danger, and every corner is fraught with the possibility of betrayal. The plot takes place in Slade City, a gloomy metropolis where crime, corruption and constant struggle for power reign. As a gamer, you step into the well-worn shoes of a citizen caught in the suffocating grip of this city. This place is not for the faint of heart.

item.title: Hidden Deep
item.description: Game Description Hidden Deep is a sci-fi thriller with shooter and puzzle elements. The scene of action is an oceanic underwater base located at a depth of 1.6 kilometers. The single-player campaign, which takes 20 hours to complete, begins with the recording of anomalous activity on the territory of the research laboratory. A group of rescuers was sent to reconnaissance of the situation and stayed there for more than a year, after which contact with them was interrupted.

item.title: Red Tether
item.description: Game Description Red Tether is a cosmic action with a view of the top, where the battle is completely dependent on the system of harpoons with cables. The player will have to resist huge armada, having at their disposal only this device for navigation according to the procedurally created fields filled with asteroids and fragments. Key project mechanics are focused on indirect destruction: enemy vessels are skillfully tied and pulled with force for destructive clashes.

item.title: God of War (2022)
item.description: Game Description God of War 2022 is an action-adventure game with a third-person view. This project is both a sequel to the previous part and a restart of the entire universe of the famous, cult slasher about the adventures of Kratos – a Spartan warrior, the protagonist of all 8 games in the “God of War” series, fighting against various gods and mythical creatures in a fit of rage and revenge.

item.title: DeadPoly
item.description: Game Description The DeadPoly universe has undergone colossal changes that have turned the lives of humanity upside down. A disaster occurred due to problems in the laboratory, where scientists did not keep track of the spread of the terrible virus. The planet gradually began to become infected, and people mutated into the walking dead, aggressively opposed to any other forms of life. The user takes control of a character who is destined to find himself in a brutal post-apocalyptic environment, where many factors besides creatures pose danger.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance may be of interest to fans of Norse mythology. The plot of the indie project is based on the legend of Sigurd’s betrayal. The entire story, including descriptions, dialogues and monologues, is presented in text form with a demonstration of local beauty in the background. This is a fantasy slasher film with a third-person perspective. In this game, the user controls a warrior who looks like a Viking.

item.title: Monster Hunter Rise
item.description: Game Description Monster Hunter Rise is a role-playing adventure set in the fictional village of Kamura. The territory is presented in the form of a vast mountainous area with studied hunting equipment and the original culture of the inhabitants. Players will play the role of hunters, and before starting the game they will have to choose one of several types of weapons, armor or special abilities. The world is filled with ancient ruins, shrines, dungeons and other locations.

item.title: Black One Blood Brothers
item.description: Game Description Black One Blood Brothers is a full-fledged immersion in combat operations, where users will take control of a special forces squad. The game is made in the genre of tactical sandbox shooter, designed for one player. Gameplay mechanics are made in the style of the Rainbow six and Ghost Recon projects. Users will perform secret missions (JSO), where the protagonist has to move from a first-person perspective, taking on the role of a French naval officer serving in the Marine Corps.

item.title: Brutal Orchestra
item.description: Game Description Immersion in Brutal Orchestra allows users to venture into a brutal world filled with insidious demons and grotesque monsters. The game is designed as a turn-based strategy with roguelike elements and deck building. Players will be exploring levels, searching for ancient artifacts and fighting treacherous monsters. You have to make deals with the devil and try to find a way out to save your own soul. The protagonist in Hieronymus Bosch’s Brutal Orchestra dies and finds himself in purgatory, where he must wander through mysterious locations and cope with difficult challenges.

item.title: Sands of Salzaar
item.description: Game Description Sands of Salzaar is a strategic game whose actions unfold in the Salzaara desert. Fight with numerous hostile factions, gathering your own army and developing your city. Choose your character, profession and faction, on whose side your army will have to fight. The eastern land is filled with various secrets and you have to solve them all. Sands of Salzaar events talk about an exotic old empire that once ruled the desert.

item.title: Savage Lands
item.description: Game Description Savage Lands is a fantasy survival game on PC in a medieval setting. Before starting the game, you are invited to customize your character a little: hair, skin color, face, tattoos. Next, you appear on the shore of the island. The wreckage of a boat is visible in the water. The only thought in my head is: “What am I doing here?” The interface is very simple: in the right corner of the screen there is a guide or tasks that you can complete.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Perfect Heist 2
item.description: Game Description The dynamic adventures in Perfect Heist 2 allow you to feel the atmosphere of a team of robbers who are hoping to commit the last global robbery and go to the bottom. Players will take control of the protagonist, who will participate in a dangerous operation, where they need to thoughtfully and harmoniously carry out certain actions with a group of partners. You have to quietly make your way through traps and police barricades, hoping to wait for the perfect moment and knock out one of the bank employees so that you can use the clothes as a disguise.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Game Description Icarus is a first -person survival that will send you to explore the secrets of one distant planet. You wake up from cryosn after your shuttle made a forced landing on the surface of a mysterious planet. Now you need to stay alive, surviving in unusual conditions. Collect resources, craft items and play both alone and along with other players. The gameplay Ikarus can be described as cooperative action with survival elements.

item.title: Fights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Fights in Tight Spaces - a mixture of a card game with a step -by -step strategy and animated battles made in classical setting. Here, a gamer will learn to build his own tactics in any conditions, knocking out the right cards and their location in order to win in battles. To create a deck in the game, there are 150 cards compiled taking into account the abilities of the enemy.

item.title: Mud and Blood
item.description: Game Description The rethought project MUD and Blood is a shootout between the two sides of the conflict, where the user has to observe the events. The setting transfers during the Second World War, where soldiers converge in battles. The updated engine and improved artificial intelligence allows you to try out the old classic flash game, filled with innovations in terms of functions and a graphic component that immerses gameplay into the process.

item.title: Battlefield 2042
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 2042 is a tactical action game, the main conflict of which is the confrontation between Russia and the United States in the world of the near future. Humanity has exhausted almost all of the Earth’s resources. Now the mighty superpowers have entered the race for the planet’s last fossils. Germany lost ground and the EU collapsed. The world is in the midst of a Second Great Depression. The gameplay is a first-person shooter.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooterGunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: Synthetik 2
item.description: Game Description In Synthetik 2, the player will fight with ruthless opponents and inexorable bosses enclosed in a constantly changing environment. The fighting offers to use 15+ types of weapons with distinctive abilities. The user is able to configure weapons and change the passage style. The central character is pumped by increasing the level or obtaining a new equipment. The gameplay includes a single -user and cooperative regime. Innovations at Synthetik 2:

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Ziggurat 2
item.description: Game Description Ziggurat 2 is a continuation of the single-player first-person shooter with the most dynamic gameplay and an unusual setting. A huge number of special effects that appear on the monitor screen during battles have high-quality visualization thanks to the use of a modern engine. The main feature of the project is the procedural generation of locations, which allows you to replay the campaign many times and not end up in the same rooms with your enemies.

item.title: Honkai Impact 3RD
item.description: Game Description Honkai Impact 3RD is a role-playing game with Hak-N-Slash elements, in which players manage three heroes called Valkyrie at once. The fighting is realized in real time. You can move freely across the battle of the battle, switching on the go between the characters. Each protagonist has its own unique features and skills. Combining their capabilities, it is necessary to look for effective tactics against enemies. The project is closely related to Genshin Impact.

item.title: Evil Tonight
item.description: Game Description Evil Tonight is an action-adventure game with role-playing game elements. Take control of a brave heroine who is not afraid to look Evil in the eye. As an experienced exorcist, the girl Sylvia encounters numerous horrors of ancient estates and crypts. She has the unusual ability to materialize evil and fight it in open battle. The visual side is represented by pixel style. Face ghosts and other evil spirits as you unravel the mystery of a huge mansion.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron's Workshop
item.description: Game Description Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron’s Workshop is an atmospheric adventure where you have to control small bubbles. The user will have to solve puzzles and various tasks that require a logical approach. You have to take control of Bub, Bob, Peb or Pub, who are capable of exploding interactive objects in the environment, in order to cope with offenders and opponents living in the locations. Players need to visit a large number of locations made in a colorful style.

item.title: MADNESS: Project Nexus
item.description: Game Description MADNESS: Project Nexus is a three-dimensional dynamic shooter with a side view, as well as a huge number of opponents and violence that happens on the monitor screen. The arcade controls are easy to remember, allowing you to quickly start enjoying the gameplay. This project from indie developers is a driving mixture of beat’em’up and slasher using not only melee weapons, but also firearms with different damage. The main feature of the gameplay is the ability to play cooperatively on one personal computer.

item.title: Elijah and the out of this world adventure
item.description: Game Description Elijah and the out of this world adventure will show a journey through Cleveland, Ohio, where a regular night turns into an incredible nightmare. The story begins with the fact that Elijah, a simple person working in a local grocery store, is attacked by an alien creature after the end of his shift. Waking up, he sees that his hometown in chaos. The military blocked the territory, and to explain the situation they come up with a bizarre legend about the spill of chemicals.

item.title: Medieval Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Medieval Dynasty is an adventure in medieval Europe, where nobles and clergy rule. The country conducts active trade with its neighbors and is prospering. You will become a poor man who lives by hunting and farming. Go from a loner to the head of a community. Set up a small camp and turn it into your own settlement. Find food by chasing wild animals, including deer, wild boar and rabbits.

item.title: World War Z: Aftermath
item.description: Game Description World War Z: Aftermath is a cross-platform zombie shooter with an emphasis on co-op, where the player participates in the Apocalypse. Here it is proposed to team up with three other participants, or try alone to resist the crowd of the walking dead in a story campaign, operating across the globe on lands destroyed by the enemy. In the continuation of World War Z, the gamer goes through new story missions, during which old, already well-known heroes are present.

item.title: Virtual Surfing
item.description: Game Description Virtual Surfing may be suitable for fans of sports games. The title offers to harness the sea and ocean waves. The project lives up to its name. This is an arcade surfing simulator. It boasts well-developed water physics. It has different weather conditions and several locations. At the very beginning, the gamer is asked to enter a name. And then the user is offered to customize the appearance of his surfer (there is a choice of gender) and customize the board.

item.title: Residual
item.description: Game Description Residual is a platformer with elements of the survival simulator. The game can boast of the worked out pixel graphics and procedural generation of the world. It is made in a science fiction setting. According to the plot, the hero crashes on one of the planets in the forgotten part of the galaxy. Its task is to study alien technologies and find a way to fix a starship.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story ofWebbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
item.description: Game Description Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - RPG about the fight against demons. Here the player will have to become a legendary warrior, and at the same time understand the true price of good and evil. The story will begin with a fault in the abyss. Crowds of terrible demons escaped from their imprisonment and now they want to enslave this world. The main character and his team of brave fighters with evil will be opposed to them.

item.title: Mecha Knights: Nightmare
item.description: Game Description Mecha Knights: Nightmare takes place in the near future. Here in 2049, with the peak of another Cold War between NATO and the Russian-Chinese alliance, the conflict is about to go global. But suddenly, humanity’s worst nightmare comes - demonic creatures begin to appear out of nowhere, wreaking havoc on Earth. As a young American pilot, Ethan, who finds himself at the epicenter of what is happening, the user will have to fight the creatures using a mechanized military development called “Mobile Armor”.

item.title: Sprocket
item.description: Game Description Sprocket will give gamers an unusual experience, because here they will create their own designs and models of tanks. Here you can not only manipulate the type of hull and guns, but also study the specifics of armor to make your model more practical. Variations from different periods are available here, from the early stages of the First World War to the last years of the Second World War.

item.title: Carrier Command 2
item.description: Game Description Carrier Command 2 is a modern continuation of the strategy that came out back in the eighties. Compared to other titles, the sequel stands out due to its gameplay features. This is not only an RTS, but also a simulator of an aircraft carrier commander. The gamer’s task: to liberate the Telos colony located on the archipelago from the terrorists who captured it. In Carrier Command 2, the user controls a huge warship.

item.title: Death Trash
item.description: Game Description Death Trash is an isometric RPG in the world of post -apocalypse, in which there is total devastation and harsh pancakes with guns. The game is a mixture of cyberpunk, science fiction, horrors and dark fantasy. All locations are made manually. The storyline can be held both alone and in the company with a friend. There is a splitiskrin mode. Game events take place on the Nexus planet.

item.title: Skydrift Infinity
item.description: Game Description Skydrift Infinity is an arcade game with simulator elements that allows you to take the controls of an airplane and rush through the picturesque expanses of an interactive world. You can fly in free mode or compete with other pilots. If it is impossible to catch up with the enemy, then you can shoot him down! Exotic islands are available for exploration, representing huge arenas for air racing.

item.title: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
item.description: Game Description Clone Drone in the Danger Zone is an exciting arcade game in which the player will play as a person whose mind has been transferred into an iron robot! The player enters the arena with the only task - to survive. It is worth considering that each opponent is endowed with individual characteristics and skills, so winning will not be easy. Each blow is under the close attention of a robot commentator, who will cover the course of the battle and your actions throughout it.

item.title: Wrestling Empire
item.description: Game Description In Wrestling Empire the player becomes a participant in the World Lightweight Championship. It is necessary to manage an athlete in the ring, apply his abilities and win rivals. The battles are presented in real time with extensive visual effects. This part includes a smooth frequency of personnel and modern graphics, while leaving the atmosphere of retro-style. This version has more functions and capabilities in pumping and battles. The user will face unique opponents with the original characteristic and special skills.

item.title: Momiji From Purgatory
item.description: Game Description Momiji From Purgatory is a first-person adventure in which a young student finds himself embroiled in a series of frightening events after his infidelity is discovered. The campus, which was once an ordinary place of study, is transformed into a location filled with traps and a strange atmosphere. The main task is to save your true love, making your way through a dangerous environment. The protagonist’s path is complicated by persecution from obsessed fans, creating constant tension.

item.title: PULSAR: Lost Colony
item.description: Game Description PULSAR: Lost Colony is a cooperative space simulator in which you will control a star shuttle and explore outer space. Players take on a specific role on the ship: captain, pilot, scientist, weapons specialist, or engineer. Only coordinated work will lead to victory over the enemy. While traveling through the universe, you need to scan the planets for life or useful resources. There will always be dangers along the way, so it is possible to launch a warp jump to avoid a collision and escape from the upcoming battle.

item.title: Agent Intercept
item.description: Game Description Agent Intercept is a dynamic arcade game full of exciting chases, intrigue, explosions and destruction. As the main character, you need to stop the crime syndicate CLAWS. They are developing a powerful transforming machine that is capable of destroying the entire world. You need to drive a car called Scepter. Transport is equipped with the latest gadgets and spy technologies. Racing along the tracks, you need to drift, jump on springboards, cut through air and water, and also try to elude death.

item.title: Cruelty Squad
item.description: Game Description Cruelty Squad is an immersive simulator that includes elements of stealth and first-person shooter. You will need to penetrate the depths of a high-tech corporation to stop its atrocities. A huge arsenal of weapons is available, including shotguns, darts, pistols, launchers and much more. The difficulty increases with each new stage. It is necessary to take part in intense firefights with a huge number of different enemies. It is possible to emerge victorious from a fight without death.

item.title: Fuzz Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Fuzz Dungeon is an arcade adventure that combines elements of role-playing games, platformers, puzzles and many other genres. The plot begins when a sexy sasquatch amulet appears in the world, absorbing all living things. The main character will have to overcome 15 absurd levels to return everything to normal. As the adventure progresses, the protagonist realizes that he can create a new society in which he no longer needs to work.

item.title: DOOMBRINGER
item.description: Game Description DOOMBRINGER is an uncompromising arena shooter, the gameplay formula of which is built on rapid movement, merciless destruction of enemies and masterful use of the arsenal. Confrontation with opponents is devoid of an element of chance, since each attack is predictable and can be prevented, which transfers all responsibility for survival to the skill of the gamer himself. The visual style refers to the classics of the genre, and the movement system with an emphasis on expressive jumping and jumping allows you to navigate the well-designed maps as efficiently as possible.

item.title: Reskue
item.description: Game Description Reskue sends an agent to a silent space station in deep space to investigate the reasons for the loss of communication and salvation of scientific personnel. The main mission is to awaken scientists from cryostasis, emerging from it in a disoriented state and in need of protection. The mysterious hostile force has taken control of the object, turning the station technology against the survivors. The operative must dispose of available equipment and ammunition, moving along dangerous locations divided into cells, and controlling the ship on radioactive fuel.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Days Gone
item.description: Game Description Days gone tells the story of Deikon Saint-Jones. The former member of the Mad Dog Motokoksluba suffers from the loss of the spouse and wanders through an almost destroyed epidemic to the open world. He is inhabited by the remaining groups of peaceful people, looters, crazy cultists, wild animals and freezers. The latter are like zombies. However, these are not revived dead, but live creatures. And these monsters move much faster than any undead.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world ofSubnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Resident Evil Village
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Village continues the adventures of Ethan from the Seven. The Roman numeral hidden in the title on the posters hints that this is not a spin-off, but the eighth part of the series. This is already the tenth project in the main line. Winters was able to escape from the cannibal mansion and save his wife Mia. They got away from the American outback and decided to live an ordinary life.

item.title: Battle Ax
item.description: Game Description Battle Ax-arcade top-downs adventure made in retro-stylistic. Events develop on the lands of Mercia. The civilian population was hostage in the evil sorceress of Etheldred. She captured almost the entire territory of the continent, and she settled in the north of the country. Every 7 years she sends her warriors south to capture even more slaves. Throughout the continent begin to gather brave warriors, eager to join an open battle with the sorceress.

item.title: Reknum Cheri Dreamland
item.description: Game Description Reknum Cheri Dreamland starts an adventure in which Cheri’s heroine awakens from fantasies and falls into a real conflict. Her wanderings in the world of dreams will force to encounter materialized nightmares that threaten the kingdom. Progress depends on the passage of the thematic stages and the deciphering of poetic instructions of the ancestors. The study of the environment prepares for a deeper immersion in the main tests and plot lines of this game, conducting the characters through a series of difficult locations and battles.

item.title: Astrodogs
item.description: Game Description Astrodogs is an arcade action game where space dogs take part in battles. The main characters will have to save the galaxy from the WOOFER company, which controls all territories and planets. Enemy dogs attack civilians, deceive ordinary workers and commit other wrong acts, because of which the ruin of the entire civilization is on the verge. The usual antics of the suspicious organization weren’t too bad until they started attacking every planet in the solar system.

item.title: First Feudal
item.description: Game Description First Feudal takes the gamer to the classic Middle Ages and invites you to become a feudal lord (landowner and lord). The game does not have a plot - users face a classic sandbox with endless gameplay. Initially it will be difficult, because a small village is vulnerable and a small landowner is not able to protect it. But try to make good money and gather your own army so that no one tries to take the resources.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: ROUNDS
item.description: Game Description ROUNDS is a competitive game with several modes and numerous locations for competition. Each match takes place in a 1v1 style, where participants try to score more points or kill their opponent. In a 2D side-scrolling world, you control round characters with arms and legs. They use the elements around them or firearms to win battles. As soon as the round ends, the next, more dynamic level immediately begins.

item.title: Metal Heads
item.description: Game Description Metal Heads is a multiplayer adventure with 1 to 8 participants simultaneously in each match. Users will compete in a variety of modes, team or single matches. The gameplay features over 15 original mini-games with multiple elements, easy process and difficult to master. The project allows you to participate via a local network, on one monitor or online. Mini-games in Metal Heads: Pipemare - takes participants to a small area where they will try to survive among a dozen dangers.

item.title: It Takes Two
item.description: Game Description The co-op adventureIt Takes Two follows two central characters: Cody and May. They decided to get a divorce, which is why they found themselves in a surreal environment, turning into dolls. Now they have to go through hundreds of obstacles and dangers while exploring a new environment. A story about the eternal problems of relationships and how the main characters will reunite after overcoming a ton of obstacles on their own path.

item.title: pureya
item.description: Game Description pureya is a collection of pixel mini-games lasting 10 seconds. The user will go through hundreds of modes with original obstacles and goals. The location, missions and traps will change constantly. Somewhere you have to travel on a spaceship and fly around objects, or fight enemies as a powerful knight. Each arcade is controlled using two buttons. The gameplay features 2 main modes: complete passage and change every 10 seconds.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: Eximius: Seize the Frontline
item.description: Game Description EXIMIUS: Seize the Frontline is a first -person shooter with real -time strategy elements. The multiplayer game consists in battles of 5 by 5, where 4 people act as officers on the front line and one commander acting as a support and giving orders. Cards for battles are represented by various cities in the world of post -apocalypse. When playing for the commander, you need to build a base, train your fighters and help allied organizations.

item.title: Forza Horizon 4
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 4 is a realistic racing simulator with an open game world, where the player is given the opportunity to explore many cities, participate in various races and interact with other players. Drive along the tracks of Great Britain, unlock new cars, and take part in tournaments and races. The gameplay is focused on interaction between players. To participate in certain races, you will need to find a suitable area, as well as gather all participants in one lobby.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: Hellish Quart
item.description: Game Description Hellish Quart - Finging on Swords, and the gameplay is endowed with a worked out physics system. The characters use fencing techniques created by capturing movement in the real world. Go as a 17th century warrior and take sabers, rapiers, broadswords and many other blades in the story campaign. Fight against artificial intelligence in single matches, Arkade, or hit with other players in multiplayer mode. The main features of Hellish Quart:

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is a survival in the open world where you will build your own base and fight with the mythical creatures of Scandinavian folklore. The events of the game take place in Valheim - the tenth world of the Vikings. The goal of the hero is to get to the gate of Walgalla. Killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit the most diverse corners of the world: thick forests, snowy mountains and much more.

item.title: DEVOUR
item.description: Game Description DEVOUR is a first-person cooperative survival game that allows up to four players to team up. In this atmospheric and scary horror, your task is to stop a dark cult that is turning people into bloodthirsty and possessed creatures. Find the leader and destroy him before he drags you to hell. Run, hide and try to resist. Never let yourself be pinned into a corner! The leader of a mystical order called the Guardians of Azazel is a certain Anna Puerta.

item.title: Binky's Trash Service
item.description: Game Description Binky’s Trash Service lays a waste collection route that runs through a series of villainous shelters. The key task at each level is to find and clean all the garbage containers, and then get to the exit. Performing a mission requires verified movements surrounded by a complete platform obstacles. Success depends on the methodical stripping of locations and accurate control of the actions of the hero. The gameplay in Binky’s Trash Service is built on three buttons responsible for a limited set of movements.

item.title: FireWorks Mania - An Explosive Simulator
item.description: Game Description FireWorks Mania - an Explosive Simulator - a simulator in which you need to deal with fireworks. Explore firecrackers, run various signal missiles into the air, etc. Your task is to arrange a real fire show. However, nothing prevents you from just blowing things up and enjoy the gameplay. The gameplay was developed with the aim of entertaining players or to please creative people who know how to think non-standard and create truly amazing fireworks.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077
item.description: Game Description Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in the futuristic city of Night City, located on the West Coast of the United States. You will play as a protagonist named V (or V). The sex, gender and appearance of the hero must be set independently. Depending on the choice of class, the character’s background differs. There are three of them: Nomad, Child of the Street and Corporate.

item.title: Elephantasy
item.description: Game Description Elephantasy puts the player under the control of a tiny elephant who has fallen into a miniature world. The main goal is to help him return home, and the path to this depends on the achievement of the mysterious tower in the clouds. The local wizard Snorri explains that the collection of gems is the method of ascent to this construction. These artifacts are scattered throughout the environment, and their presence is directly related to the promotion of the character.

item.title: Empire of Sin
item.description: Game Description Empire of Sin is a strategy whose actions unfold in Chicago of the 1920s. A dry law has been introduced, which means that the time is for the heyday of crime and smuggling. Being a boss of the criminal world, take the Office of one of the 14 groups. Many characters are based on real prototypes of gangsters such as Al Capone, Stefani Saint-Claire or Goldi Garno. Your tasks include building a whole criminal empire.

item.title: Easy Red 2
item.description: Game Description Easy Red 2 is a first -person shooter with elements of a strategy that immerses in an authentic atmosphere of World War II. The gameplay can plunge into tense and cruel battles, where the main thing is planning and tactics. The gameplay relies on realism. Take a break through the tanks and the enemy’s huge army. Do not fall into the explosion zone and look for ways to survive on the battlefield with your partners.

item.title: The Falconeer
item.description: Game Description The plot of The Falconeer tells about the secrets of already forgotten gods and ancient civilizations. The game combines fantasy, action and role-playing elements in an ocean world located on the Great Ursi. Take control of an armed man and a huge bird to soar upward and explore a gradually crumbling and beautiful world. Battles constantly take place across vast territories between militant groups and factions fighting for the secrets and mysteries hidden in these places.

item.title: Mesmer
item.description: Game Description Mesmer is a revolution simulator that is a vibrant adventure in which you need to unite people and take a fortress by storm. Take on the role of the leader of a revolutionary uprising, influencing the consciousness of people and factions operating within the city. The secret police are monitoring every action, so be vigilant! The task is simple: to lead Mesmer and his people to a better life.

item.title: Crystal Caves HD
item.description: Game Description Crystal Caves HD is a re-release of the classic platformer with high-resolution textures. The gameplay remained unchanged; the developers of the remaster wanted to leave travel through caves and dungeons in their original form, as intended by the original authors. A level editor has been implemented, which allows those who are interested in creating their own territories. To design locations, you do not need to have programming skills; the user is presented with a catalog of objects that are available for placement.

item.title: EA SPORTS FIFA 21
item.description: Game Description FIFA 21 is a football simulator that uses the latest 3D scanning system, making players realistic and as close as possible to their prototypes. The main feature of FIFA 21 will be the development of the Volta mode - street competitions. The new mode is called FIFA Street. Teams will consist of several players in various futsal and outdoor sports fields. A separate script has also been written for this mode.

item.title: 9th Dawn 3
item.description: Game Description 9th Dawn 3 is a role-playing adventure in which the player will have to explore a huge variety of dungeons, made in pixelated, two-dimensional graphics with a low-angle top-down view. The game supports a cooperative mode, which allows you to invite friends to spend time together on a project that includes more than 270 types of monsters that must be destroyed. “9th Dawn III” supports the connection of an external controller to provide more convenient control for those gamers who are used to gamepads.

item.title: STAR WARS: Squadrons
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Squadrons takes place after the sixth episode of Return of the Jedi. Events unfold during the period when Imperial forces are defeated on Endor and lose the second Death Star. The game has two main characters. One serves on the Titan squadron of the Galactic Empire, and the second is at this time on the Defender and helps the rebels. Online modes in STAR WARS: Squadrons support up to 10 users.

item.title: Kinky Fight Club
item.description: Game Description Competitive fights in Kinky Fight Club allow you to enjoy observing beautiful girls who compete on the field for winning the match. The main task of each round is to bring the enemy to orgasm, by applying cunning tricks and secret techniques. The game is designed for an adult audience of users who have reached adulthood. The project contains a large amount of erotic content, which can be unacceptable for young players.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: Phasmophobia
item.description: Game Description Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. The plot is built around paranormal phenomena, where a group of researchers is trying to prove with the help of special equipment that spirits and ghosts exist. You have to collect as much evidence as possible to find out what type of evil entity you are dealing with. Having studied the strengths and weaknesses of otherworldly forces, begin to expel demons.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelikeHades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos is a humorous adventure set in the Naheulbeuk Universe. John Lang wrote a comedy series based on role-playing game parodies and heroic adventures. The developers decided to create a game based on the author’s universe. In a dungeon set in a fantasy setting, clumsy characters try to get their hands on treasure. The RPG has complex tactical elements, with a dose of humor, unexpected surprises and ridiculous encounters.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: The Divine Invasion
item.description: Game Description The Divine Invasion is an adventure action that uses a third -person camera, which allows you to better consider dynamic fights with crowds of enemies and increases the view around the hero. The setting of this project, developed by a small indie studio, becomes a science fiction future with multiple elements of a popular direction-cyberpanus. Thanks to the main task of the gamer, which consists in the extermination of enemies, the game can be considered a simulator of a bond hunter, which serves as mysterious employers for a huge monetary reward.

item.title: Chronicon
item.description: Game Description Chronicon has a large amount of content, despite its indie-production. There are about 900 skills, abyles and perks and 700 items. The main campaign is divided into 4 acts: a fallen temple, an elven war, Clerburg Castle and dangerous wastelands. Of the classes, the choice is available: Templar, berserker, guard and sorcerer. These are a kind of analogue of the paladin, warrior, archer and magician. Each has various talent branches with active and passive skills.

item.title: Lawless Lands
item.description: Game Description Lawless Lands is a role-playing game in a dark fantasy setting. You will challenge the Darkness itself and explore the territory of Crossia - a formerly great kingdom, which is now plunged into poverty and crime. Hunger and death reign all around. The army has lost its power and the country is in turmoil. You take on the role of a hero rising from the ashes. He challenges the entire empire and is the only one capable of restoring Crossia’s greatness.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Horizon Zero Dawn is an action game in the world of a post-apocalyptic future, in which the world is inhabited by robotic dinosaurs that destroyed modern civilization. The few surviving people formed into small primitive tribes and resist mechanical monsters using primitive weapons combined with high technology. The main character of Horizon Zero Dawn is a girl named Aloy. She was raised by a man named Rast, who is an Outcast.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
item.description: Game Description Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends is a dynamic and bloody fighting game, the action of which takes place in an alternative version of our reality, where characters from books, urban legends, cryptozoology, mythology and folklore exist. All heroes of Terrordrome are monsters and villains. The game shows a hypothetical world where all the scary stories heard turned out to be true. There is a story campaign for Alex Van Helsing.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.

item.title: Detroit Become Human
item.description: Game Description Detroit: Become Human is a rather interesting game in the interactive cinema genre. It is based on the Quantic Dream graphics core, so the excellent graphics component immediately catches your eye. It is impossible not to note the titanic work of the animators, who created truly gorgeous animations and scenes that were plausible from the point of view of anatomy and physics. The game takes place in the future, in an era of highly developed technology, where androids have already firmly taken their place next to people as loyal and multifunctional humanoid servants.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Colt Canyon
item.description: Game Description Colt Canyon is an isometric action game filled with brutal shootouts in the vastness of a wild canyon. Here, armed thugs, dangers and treasures await at every turn. The plot tells about a hero who armed himself with his trusty Colt and went in search of his best friend. The player controls a cowboy, but as the game progresses, new heroes will be available. A friend was captured by local bandits and getting to their camp is not so easy.

item.title: Baldi's Basics Plus
item.description: Game Description Baldi’s Basics Plus - a parody of the first -person horror and educational games of the 90s. All levels are randomly generated, and mini-games are made in bright colors and allow you to go to nature. Baldi’s Basics Plus is an extended version of the original game containing more objects and characters. The game contains a huge number of strange characters and useful objects necessary for passing. Exploring the confusing corridors of Baldie’s school, the hero will come across many random and hilarious events.

item.title: Sea of ​​Thieves
item.description: Game Description Sea of ​​Thieves – seas, ships and a bottle of rum. Immerse yourself in the world of piracy, ship battles, treasure hunting and fun. Create your character, team up with other players, and assemble a team of pirates. A huge open world opens up before you, full of riddles, secrets and adventures. The gameplay of Sea of ​​Thieves is rich in content: The endless ocean and deserted islands - assemble a team of your kind, surf the seas and oceans enjoying the sunset over the waves, sing pirate songs and drink strong rum from barrels in the hold.

item.title: Crosshair X
item.description: Game Description The Crosshair X software application for gamers will allow you to freely customize your sight in any way for games focused on shooter gameplay mechanics, and gives the final answer to the question: “how to make a sight for Rasta or CS GO?” Players can choose one of the presented presets to apply it or create their own based on it. The project has the ability to make the desired skin and size for the cursor from scratch, using a flexible editor with a settings window.

item.title: Cepheus Protocol
item.description: Game Description Cepheus Protocol is a real-time strategy game where you are given a large open world so that you have the opportunity to find patient zero. A terrible virus has taken over San Francisco, turning residents into bloodthirsty monsters. You will lead a squad of soldiers from the Center for Epidemic Research and Control (CERC) fighting on the streets of an infected city. The task is to find the zero infected person to defeat the epidemic.

item.title: Pyro Fighters
item.description: Game Description Pyro Fighters sets the fighters to recapture the attack of an alien army at long levels. Each character is armed with flamethrower - a universal tool for attack and movement. If you direct the weapon down, reactive traction is created for flight. The same stream of flame destroys enemies, which forces to constantly choose between the retention of heights and fire. Monitoring the only resource underlies each clash and requires a competent distribution of forces in stressful conditions.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic is a co-op shooter with fast-paced gameplay in which you will fight with other users against alien monsters. The game is made in a sci-fi style and has procedurally generated levels in which you will fight. The mission can be completed by 1 to 4 players. Act as one. Dig, explore the area and shoot with enemies waiting for you in huge numbers around every corner.

item.title: Fury Unleashed (Badass Hero)
item.description: Game Description Fury Unleashed (formerly Badass Hero) is a dynamic roguelike made in the style of comics, where the main resource is ink. The main character of the game is John Kowalski, who is working on a story of the same name. The author is experiencing a crisis of ideas, and the player must help overcome it. The combat is tied to a combo system, which motivates you to kill enemies as quickly as possible, thereby increasing the protagonist’s rage and making him more aggressive.

item.title: Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics
item.description: Game Description Supreme Mechanics - Challenges out-of-the-box thinking and explores different genres and perspectives. It is a first-person puzzle game that combines elements of dystopian fantasy, crime-solving, and horror with deep philosophical questions. You’ll have to solve some dark and twisted cases as you explore the world around you, uncover your character’s hidden identity, overcome the boundaries of danger and logic, and create your own version of time and history.

item.title: Drug Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Drug Dealer Simulator will allow you to create your own criminal empire without moral and legal consequences. The player starts in a shabby shelter and begins to develop his business. You can either become a dark genius or a cruel gangster. The player needs to purchase goods from the cartels, avoid the police and organize safe houses. You can sell goods both in small quantities and individually, and in large quantities to entire gangs.

item.title: Resident Evil 3 Remake
item.description: Game Description [s][/s]Resident Evil 3: Remake is positioned as a remake of the original Resident Evil 3: Nemesis, released back in 1999. The time gap between the reissue and the original is 20 years. During this time, Capcom managed to radically rethink the series and enrich it with various innovations both in plot and gameplay, since progress does not stand still. If Resident Evil 2 in 2019 offered the player a slower and more intense gameplay, steeped in horror, then the new product in 2020 looks a little different.

item.title: Zompiercer
item.description: Game Description Conceptively Zompiercer is a sandbox with an open detailed world, but the whole thing is played as a first-person shooter about survival during the zombie apocalypse. The planet is covered by a virus. People mutated in bloodthirsty walking corpses. Not many managed to survive, but you are lucky more than the rest. Or not? Survival is just beginning! The game from an independent developer under the nickname DDDIMANN is not a comprehension not by the setting, but by the scale and the implementation of ideas.

item.title: GTA 4
item.description: Game Description GTA 4 became a revolutionary, breakthrough game in the series of criminal action games with a conditionally open world and almost complete freedom of action. It is not only technically and plot-wise different from its predecessors, but also sets a new standard of quality for all representatives of this and other genres. It is worth noting that the concept of GTA has gone far beyond the scope of this franchise, and some mechanics from this series of games are used in projects from other studios.

item.title: Half-Life: Alyx
item.description: Game Description Half-Life: Alyx became the first AAA quality game in history for virtual reality devices, the passage of which can be enjoyed on a PC only with the help of an appropriate device, namely a VR headset from Steam and related gadgets. The plot is a spin-off, the events of which unfold in the interval between the actions of the first and second parts. The Black Mesa Incident allowed Alliance forces to gain a foothold on the planet, leaving the remaining humans trapped in the cities.

item.title: DOOM Eternal
item.description: Game Description DOOM Eternal, a first-person shooter, continues the campaign of DOOM (developed in 2016). Our hero is the Doom Slayer. He will kill mutants and monsters on the territory of Mars, the attached spaceship, its satellites and Earth. In many ways, the plot scenes are taken from the second part of the series. The main addition to the game was moving through the levels. If earlier we could move to the next level only after finishing it, then in the new part it will be possible to “climb” to another location where the events of the next level take place.

item.title: Borderlands 3
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 3 is a continuation of the acclaimed series of shooters, containing tons of loot. The player will take on the role of one of the Vault Hunters and set off to explore the expanses of Pandora. All heroes have their own tree of characteristics, unique abilities and character. The gameplay allows you to go through the adventure solo or enlist the help of friends. The protagonist of Borderlands 3 learned to climb ledges and make tackles.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Avorion
item.description: Game Description People have always been attracted to space. And Avorion is one of the embodiments of human desires. This game doesn’t have much of a story or great graphics. Like many indie games, Avoiron is built on a specific idea for which the creators consciously sacrificed everything else. The backstory is this: several hundred years ago, a cataclysm almost destroyed the entire galaxy. Since then, no one has been able to break into the central regions of the galaxy.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: JEF
item.description: Game Description The protagonist of JEF is an alien who does not remember his name or how he even ended up in the place of the initial events. Soon, he discovers that his home planet has been taken over by a huge, evil spa cult. Now you need to find a way to escape and make your way through space and time to get to other colonies. And the main goal is to get to Earth.

item.title: Maiden and Spell
item.description: Game Description Maiden and Spell is a scrolling shooter in which the main characters are girls.
