The user is given a choice of 8 female characters, which differ from each other not only in appearance, but also in their ability sets. The fictional universe created by indie developers is filled with magic and unusual creatures. The setting is the Kingdom of Stars, which is represented by many locations in the background, because the game has a top-down camera.

item.title: Senren＊Banka
item.description: Game Description Senren＊Banka is primarily aimed at anime fans. The project uses the appropriate style (including chibi art) and Japanese voice acting. The plot combines romantic, tragic, mystical and humorous elements. The story revolves around supernatural incidents. A group of young people are trying to hide them from ordinary people. The premise in Senren＊Banka: A Thousand Colors of Love is as follows. A guy named Arichi Masaomi comes to the provincial town of Hoori in the summer.

item.title: Necesse
item.description: Game Description Necesse is an adventure sandbox with a procedurally generated world. Controlling the main character, you need to build a settlement and upgrade your character. There are many spacious locations available for exploration where you can extract various minerals. You can craft items from collected materials. Traveling around the world, the protagonist meets different characters. You can take quests from them or trade with NPCs. In the dungeons you can find powerful weapons.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
item.description: Game Description Red Dead Redemption 2 is a third-person shooter adventure game set in the Wild West in 1899. The action involves the Dutch Van Der Linde gang, which is being pursued by lawmen after a botched ferry robbery. The player will take control of Arthur Morgan, one of the gang members. Some time after the unsuccessful prank, the gang decides that it is time to retire and live the rest of their lives like ordinary people, not bandits.

item.title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
item.description: Game Description Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a complete collection of the cult shooter series about the Master Chief. The collection includes all numbered games in the series that were released before Halo: Infinite. At the same time, the developers have improved the visual component of the game, providing 4k resolution and HDR support for modern monitors. The story tells of the confrontation between the United Nations Space Command and the religious alien alliance Covenant.

item.title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
item.description: Game Description In the epic gameStar Wars Jedi: Fallen Order you will find amazing adventures, new challenges, modern graphics and high-quality laser sword battles! Immerse yourself in this saga of the Jedi and intergalactic war, in which you will play one of the key roles. The story takes place after Episode III, 5 years after the ominous Order 66. You will take on the role of a young Jedi Padawan who barely managed to escape from a trap created by the Sith.

item.title: Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game released in 1999 under the name “The Age of Kings”. The game is famous for the fact that the player develops his civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Age. The gameplay is based on the fact that it is necessary to hire peasants, gather troops, erect buildings, study maps, develop the era and explore new capabilities, technologies and, most importantly, destroy the enemy.

item.title: Unity of Command 2
item.description: Game Description In Unity of Command 2 you have to control your teammates, design routes and develop your own battle tactics. Transform from a novice into a seasoned commander and manage anti-Hitler coalitions on the Western Front, Africa, or take command of Allied divisions. With a dynamic campaign, you can write your own history of World War II. Non-linear paths will lead you to completely different endings. In combat you will need to clear the fog of war, one of the innovations in the sequel to the cult classic Unity of Command II.

item.title: NFS Heat
item.description: Game Description Need for Speed: Heat is an arcade racing simulator with an open game world and a large selection of cars of a wide variety of brands. The plot takes place in Palm City, a fictional city very similar to sunny Miami. You will be able to ride around the city, along the coast, and also take part in stunning races. The story begins with police captain Mercer catching one of the participants in night racing, which is prohibited by law.

item.title: Beat Hazard 2
item.description: Game Description Beat Hazard 2 - continuation of the bright representative of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre. You have to plunge into dizzying shootings on flying ships, and destroy the hordes of enemies to drive music. The latter occupies most in the video game, and the help of it in each battle can find its tone and rhythm, on which even the outcome of the battle can depend. Or connect your tracks to destroy the hordes of enemies to your favorite compositions much more fun.

item.title: Police Stories
item.description: Game Description John Reims and Rick Jones are two brave cops trying to put the streets of his hometown in order. Police Stories is a story full of intrigues and conspiracies. Having learned the motives of some heroes, a terrible truth will open. But on the way to the answers, many hostages have to be saved, kill the pack of bandits and neutralize a huge number of bombs. Police Stories implemented mechanics:

item.title: Green Hell
item.description: Game Description Green Hell is a survival simulator that fans of real hero exhaustion in the wild jungle have been waiting for a long time! The main character will visit the dark forests of the Amazon with only a walkie-talkie from objects of “his time”, and he will be helped by his hands and head, which over time will begin to betray. Survival, exhaustion, mentally damaged health of the main character.

item.title: River City Girls
item.description: Game Description River City Girls is a beat-em-up, stylized as an anime, where the player will go through an adventure with the girls Kyoko and Misako, who will go to the dangerous streets of River City to find their missing friends Kunio and Riki. Girls have charisma, constantly joke, communicate with each other, remember moments from the lives of their boyfriends, etc. The gameplay is not quite the usual beat-em-up. River City Girls has an open world with many forks, fast travel points and a full map.

item.title: Singled Out
item.description: Game Description Singled Out is a test of reaction speed and observation, where the task is to accurately identify a target in a crowd. The player is presented with a kaleidoscope of eccentric creatures, but only one of them matches the three descriptive characteristics provided. An inexorable ten-second timer forces you to act as quickly as possible, because any mistake or delay leads to failure. The search process turns into an intense visual puzzle, where every second counts and extreme concentration on the smallest details of appearance is required.

item.title: Dude Simulator 3
item.description: Game Description Dude Simulator 3 is a dude simulator that is characterized by absurdity and black humor. You play the role of a “friend” who is preparing for his friend’s birthday. The day begins with you buying him a gift. Now we need to deliver it, but my friend lives in another city. You are about to go on an adventure that promises many funny and exciting moments. Gameplay Dude Simulator 3 features an open world sandbox with a unique cubic visual style.

item.title: Shortest Trip to Earth
item.description: Game Description Shortest Trip to Earth, a futuristic spaceship control simulator, sends the character to the distant future, where he must conquer the Universe. The project is not tied to the plot and the gameplay is presented through the passage of a large number of procedurally generated levels. The developers did not focus on the story campaign, but did a good job on the ship control capabilities and real-time tactical battles.

item.title: People Playground
item.description: Game Description People Playground is an indie game, a kind of murder simulator in different ways. Here you can simply drag mannequins of creatures across the screen and throw them from a height, or create dangerous situations with your own hands - accidents, torture chambers, obstacle courses. There are 5 types of creatures available for destruction: a fragile person, a heavier and stronger robot, a gorse (spider), a regular and improved turret.

item.title: Streets of Rogue
item.description: Game Description A new measures come to a prosperous futuristic city, which introduces a dry law. This caused the rebellion and chaos in Streets of Rogue. The inhabitants of the town created the headquarters of resistance, which is hidden underground. They plan to overthrow a cruel dictator, so we need a hero who will fulfill this task. Having chosen the class of the protagonist, the user will begin his path from the lower floor.

item.title: Muse Dash
item.description: Game Description Muse Dash is a dynamic rhythm game in anime style, where you will visit many colorful locations, dance to the rhythm of fiery songs and send enemies into outer space. At the center of the story are three charismatic beauties. Having chosen one of the heroines, you need to fight with various creatures in the rhythm of the dance. The action will take place on a colorful background accompanied by dynamic dance music.

item.title: Steel Division 2
item.description: Game Description Steel Division 2 is a real -time strategy, during which you will visit the role of Army General during the Bagration Operation. The plot was established during the Second World War on the Eastern Front, and there are thousands of fighters under your command. Thanks to an extensive list of opportunities, the gameplay can take you tens of hours. Pass the plot missions or participate in free mode in a multi -user or single game.

item.title: Cooking Simulator
item.description: Game Description A real cooking simulator - Cooking Simulator is an ambiguous opportunity to try yourself in the role of a real chef. You will be able to cook several hundred dishes, learn real recipes for most of the appetizers served, and much more. In order to give the game more realism, people who devoted themselves to cooking for several decades worked on the creation. The game itself has about 80 complex recipes, but there are also simple ones, like “cooking tomato paste” or “onion rings for baking.

item.title: Quake II RTX
item.description: Game Description Quake II RTX offers a new look at the classic project. This became possible thanks to the introduction of RTX technology. So, now the usual corridors and battle arenas look completely new, the hero models have a more acceptable appearance, and the shot animations have become more spectacular. As for the gameplay component, Quake II RTX is no different from the original in this component. Users are transported to arenas where they fight each other in a certain number of rounds.

item.title: Pixark
item.description: Game Description Pixark is made in the style of the famous Maycraft, but the game has a good plot, which is revealed in different ways for each player. The world of wildlife includes more than 100 different creatures that we can clone, tame and use for our own purposes. Among them will be friendly inhabitants of the jungle, as well as aggressive representatives of the game world. The mysterious lands made in the form of cubes are destroyed and built every minute.

item.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
item.description: Game Description Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first game in the series that recreates epic conflicts in Ancient China. The game combines a turn-based campaign of empire building and conquest with epic real-time battles. 190 AD. A beautiful but fragmented country awaits a new emperor and a new life. The player will have to unify China, create the next great dynasty and leave a legacy that will endure for millennia.

item.title: Beat Saber
item.description: Game Description A musical game designed for the good taste of the playerBeat Saber. The levels are a small interactive location where blocks of 2 colors fly towards the player. The player must cut these blocks. The difficulty of the game is that the number of blocks and the method of destruction are always different. For example, in some levels you will have to chop them with a sword of a certain color, in others you will have to hit them from the right side.

item.title: Yakuza Kiwami 2
item.description: Game Description Yakuza Kiwami 2 is an action RPG created in the style of Japanese animators. The game is a continuation of the first part of the franchise of the same name. From the very beginning, the memories of the main character appear before us - various echoes of past conflicts between clans. The character carries all this heavy burden with him. He cannot start a new and peaceful, calm life.

item.title: Descenders
item.description: Game Description Descenders is a sports bike racing simulator. But as the creators themselves describe it: an extreme speed cycling downhill game. The developer was RageSquid studio, which developed the unusual indie racing game Action Henk. The player chooses a bike and a team for which he will take part in extreme races across the hills and plains. There are three teams in total, each of which has its own unique characteristics:

item.title: Starlink: Battle for Atlas
item.description: Game Description Starlink: Battle for Atlas is an adventure game in which you become a space pilot to rid the Atlas system of the villains Grax and the Forgotten Legion. You will lead your Starlink squad and take a stand against despotism to save the entire galaxy from powerful invaders. There are four ships to choose from to participate in the competition: Zenith, Neptune, Pulse, Lance. The game provides a choice of six pilots, including Mason, Judge, Chase, Hunter, Levi, Razor, who have their own skills and characteristics.

item.title: MORDHAU
item.description: Game Description MORDHAU is a hack and slash game. Fights take place online on the company’s servers; offline you can train your skills in fights against artificial intelligence. A training session is also available, in which you will learn the basic mechanics and get your initial gold capital. The name refers to a special German grip on the weapon, which, by the way, is available for selection. The main, but not the only feature is a fencing system that is as close to reality as possible, created through consultations with experts.

item.title: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition
item.description: Game Description Despite the average ratings for the 10th part of the franchise,Mortal Kombat 11 became a continuation of the story, and the developers tried to improve and add a lot of new things to players. The eleventh fighting game in the Mortal Kombat universe has new gameplay, plot, graphics, and character relationships that reveal the story as it progresses. We arrive in the world after the defeat of Shinnok, who was defeated by Cassie Cage.

item.title: Katana ZERO
item.description: Game Description Katana ZERO is an extraordinary and dynamic platformer in the genre of science fiction and action, created in the best traditions of pixel graphics. The plot of the game tells us about a dystopian city, the main character lives in the third quarter, his name is Zero. He was severely wounded in the war, causing him to lose his memory. At night he has nightmares about past battles, and during the day he has to visit a psychotherapist.

item.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
item.description: Game Description Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an incredibly challenging action game that makes feudal Japan look dark, burning, and beautiful at the same time. The third-person stealth action game combines the features of RPGs and the themes of Souls games. Well-designed graphics of feudal Japan allow us to plunge into the difficult process of returning our master of the Ashina clan. The leader of the opposition - Genichiro - kidnapped a samurai from Shinobi, and now we must cope with a huge number of his followers in order to save the teacher, master, master and good friend who paid us well in a past life.

item.title: Devil May Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Devil May Cry 5 is a new third-person slasher for fans of the series. Dante and Nero return to the game universe to defeat all the demons, but will they have a different task? Let’s take a closer look. The developers did not touch the game mechanics; they only significantly changed the speed of the battle. If shooters have a subgenre - FPS - then this slasher is an analogue.

item.title: Intruder
item.description: Game Description Intruder is a multiplayer stealth action game in which two factions confront each other: spies and guards. One team plays on the side of the Intruders, who are trying to get into the vault. Various tactical gadgets are available to them. The second team attempts to lure the criminals into a trap, acting as representatives of the Guardians. The winner is the side that acts more competently and more organized.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Touhou Luna Nights
item.description: Game Description Touhou Luna Nights is a platformer that immerses you in the atmosphere of gothic mysticism. The main character is Sakuya Izaei, who works as a senior maid for the vampire Remilia Scarlet. The girl was calmly doing housework when the mistress deprived her of her powers and sent her to the “Magical Space.” Sakuya is looking for her way home and is eager to find out what her treacherous boss is up to.

item.title: Yakuza Kiwami
item.description: Game Description The plot of the role-playing game Yakuza Kiwami introduces us to the same character from the previous parts, who made us fall in love with his charisma and the fact that the most difficult life-changing tasks fall on him. Events tell a little about the protagonist’s past. Kazuma Kiryu, the main character, kills a crime boss. Thus, he saves Akira Nishikiyama and Yumi. After that, in 2005, Akira changed a lot, and Yumi disappeared.

item.title: Metro Exodus: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description The events ofMetro Exodus - a first-person shooter with elements of stealth and horror - take place in the same areas as the previous parts. The Russian Federation and the Republic of Kazakhstan are still waging a fierce war for life inside, in underground territories, with representatives of hostile clans, factions and monsters who devour, rather than kill, their prey. Artyom leaves the Order after the battle for D6.

item.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
item.description: Game Description RESIDENT EVIL 2 / BIOHAZARD RE:2 - a complete rework, allowing players to enjoy modern graphics, a new engine, enemies, weapons and a much more advanced game story. Follow the story of police officer Leon S. Kennedy and student Claire Redfield. Due to an unknown outbreak of a virus, the entire city of Raccoon City was enveloped in monsters, people began to turn into strange creatures, and then kill the survivors.

item.title: ATLAS
item.description: Game Description Embark on a grand adventure as a pirate and explore the islands. ATLAS is a sandbox role-playing game in which players can do whatever they want. Travel the islands with hundreds of other players, fight with them or join alliances. Create the ship of your dreams. More than a hundred different materials, many types of rafts and additions to the ship. Set up a flag, cannons, a mast, a rudder and hire a crew.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: Hunt and Snare
item.description: Game Description Hunt and Snare is an open-world action-RPG with extensive sexual content for fans of furries - anthropomorphic creatures with animal-like body shapes and fur. Thanks to the large number of options for interacting with the environment on the Skig archipelago, this game has its own fan base and is constantly updated by the developers. In addition to erotic fantasies, the project also raises darker themes, for example, the war of the enslaved population against invaders led by a dragon, poverty and frequent outbreaks of unknown diseases that lead to epidemics.

item.title: BallisticNG
item.description: Game Description BallisticNG is a dynamic racing simulator in the setting of a sci-fi distant future, in which all available technologies have made an unprecedented leap thanks to the painstaking work of the best minds of the human race. In 2159, battles on the tracks take place in vehicles equipped with an anti-gravity unit that allows them to hover above the earthen surface. The game supports earning achievements from a pre-prepared list of 26 awards, a built-in level editor, a leaderboard, as well as modern technology - a virtual reality helmet.

item.title: DayZ
item.description: Game Description The multiplayer sandboxDayZ is a reworked version of the mod of the same name for Arma 2. The game is distinguished by its extremely realistic setting and hardcore survival in a post-apocalyptic environment. The game takes place in the fictional post-Soviet country of Chernarus. After the outbreak of an unknown virus, most of the population has turned into zombies, and the survivors are forced to fight for their lives and valuable resources.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: DUSK
item.description: Game Description DUSK is a canonical first-person shooter created in a retro style. The plot is quite simple and clear - there is a small town called DUSK, in its vicinity ruins were discovered that have mystical properties. Many scientists and soldiers came here, studying strange objects and everyone gradually went crazy. They became possessed, and the government surrounded the entire area with a wall. A brave hero was found who entered the forbidden territory in search of these unique artifacts, but was captured by occultists and hung on hooks.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: X4: Foundations
item.description: Game Description In X4: Foundations you can create any spaceship, and then sit down for its helm and start to smash the enemies right and left. The first -person shooter with RPG and sandboxes combines several temporary eras enclosed in a couple of hours of game, but it is impossible to enjoy the gameplay of this project even in a week. You can construct ships of different sizes and goals. It can be small scouts and large ships, wearing several hundred combat birds on their huge backs.

item.title: FIGHTING EX LAYER
item.description: Game Description FIGHTING EX LAYER, as the name suggests, is a fighting game. The game has two types of controls - classic and progressive. The first is designed for fans of fighting, and the second is suitable for beginners. Battles take place in 2.5D in closed arenas. The gameplay of the project is reminiscent of the second or third part of SF and other virtual battles of the 90s. The super canceling mechanic allows you to abruptly cancel a combo during the attack animation in order to quickly carry out another series of attacks.

item.title: Granny
item.description: Game Description Granny is a first-person horror game in which you visit granny’s house. It is located far from civilization. However, the trip does not end entirely well. You find yourself locked in the mansion of a distraught old lady. You have five days to find a way to leave this damned place. Do you think you can do it?.. The old woman locks you in a dark basement, after hitting you on the head.

item.title: Among Us
item.description: Game Description Among Us (Among As) is a multiplayer game designed for 4 to 10 people on the server at the same time for exciting gameplay with a variety of scenarios. The setting of the project is boundless outer space, in which maps with different structures of surrounding objects are located. Casual controls and the ability to play on a local network in cross-platform mode make it possible to invite a noisy group to spend time together on the Among Us project.

item.title: BATTLEFIELD 5
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 5 is a first-person shooter, the fifteenth game in the Battlefield series. Unlike previous games in the series, Battlefield 5 sacrifices historical accuracy for the sake of the player: weapon handling, for example, has been noticeably improved, making the game more like an arcade shooter. Most of the changes made to BFV are solid improvements over its predecessor. War Stories is a series of single-player missions introduced in Battlefield V, where the player is invited to become an eyewitness to tragic events.

item.title: Pocket Rogues
item.description: Game Description Pocket Rogues is a role RPG created in the fantasy genre with pixel graphics. The plot tells us about the young young man, who is the seeker of treasures, he found the greatest and mysterious dungeon. Many heroes did not return from here, but we are destined to see a real evil. Ambition, a thirst for wealth and genuine interest simply do not leave a gamer. The gamer has to break through with each subsequent battle through many levels, the generation of which is carried out by an endless random creation.

item.title: Assassins Creed Odyssey
item.description: Game Description For the first time in the history of the series, you will be able to choose a character for whom you will administer justice and change history. Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is the first slasher RPG in the history of the developers, in which we do not play as an assassin, but choose a real warrior of Ancient Greece! We are offered two characters to choose from: Alexios or Kassandra.

item.title: Crosscode
item.description: Game Description Crosscode fantasy pitch tells about the young girl Lea, playing in the MMO called Crosscode. That is how, this ambitious project tells about the usual routine rutin classes. According to the plot, events unfold in the near future, where virtual reality has become more interesting than the real one. That is why many people spend days in their favorite toys in search of fun. Lea spends extremely a lot of time here, but there is misfortune.

item.title: Mad Restaurant People
item.description: Game Description Mad Restaurant People makes it possible to feel all the difficulty of working as a waiter. The game is presented with a top distance, which makes it possible to observe the entire hall at once. Take orders, serve customers, serve dishes in time, count the guests and much more. Mad Restaurant People is a full -fledged waiter’s simulator who will not let you relax for a second. The gameplay requires attentiveness, reaction speed, good memory and many other important qualities.

item.title: Pro Evolution Socker 2019
item.description: Game Description PES 2019 - one of the games that won the recognition of fans through the territory of the entire planet - Pro Evolution Soccer 2019 is a new football league hidden in the old filling. Gradually improving their brainchild, the developers came to a perfect schedule, plausible sound and real physics of movement. This part includes several additions in which you will hire professional football players for several matches and prove that the team management is your craft from birth!

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: Airships: Conquer the Skies
item.description: Game Description Airships: Conquer the Skies (2018) is a multiplayer sandbox indie action and strategy game developed by David Stark under his own publishing house for various platforms, including PC. Airships has extremely positive reviews on various resources. The game is truly loved by gamers from all over the world. So what will you have to do? Build pixelated skyships in steampunk style! The buildings are shown in cross-section and from the side, and their modules are controlled by crew members.

item.title: Mist Survival
item.description: Game Description Another survival game among zombies is Mist Survival. A completely open world, a unique system of characteristics, new types of weapons, shelters and the ability to create their own gang, attracted new players to fight on an open map against the crowd of enraged people absorbed in the epidemic. The main character, like all real players, will be protected from the epidemic, because in their body there is a special hormone that needs to be nourished every day.

item.title: MONSTER HUNTER: WORLD
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofMONSTER HUNTER: WORLD has been slightly reworked compared to the previous part. We don’t just kill monsters, make new equipment, but now weapons are divided into several classes, and, in fact, at the beginning of the game we are something like a “neutral character”. In the new ecosystem, hunters have emerged who will create incredibly difficult conditions for the existence of monsters. Dragons, flying dinosaurs (not like dragons), and other creatures inhabit this eco-system.

item.title: Dead Cells
item.description: Game Description A stunning rogue-like platformer with metroidvania elements -Dead Cells - features a real fight between the hero and constantly changing levels on the territory of the castle. Our hero is a creature who is trying to get out of the castle’s maze. He will try over and over again to cope with constantly generated opponents. But in random places on the map you will find many weapons with random characteristics.

item.title: PUSS!
item.description: Game Description PUSS! - a psychedelic game about a cute cat in the genre of avoid-em up. Get ready for madness, absurdity and real hardcore. The gameplay is a real challenge, which only the most daring and experienced players can do. You control a cat who has found himself in another dimension. He has only two choices: stay here forever or try to get out of this nightmare. The controls are designed for one hand, but you need to practice and get used to it in order to have sufficient dexterity to dashingly control the cat.

item.title: Yakuza 0
item.description: Game Description As a dialogue-heavy role-playing game that explores a deep story,Yakuza 0 claims to be a game that combines friendship, self-love, and the search for true calling. The Yakuza is the largest mafia group in Japan, which controls everything that can be controlled. Events begin in 1988, when two Yakuza characters - Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima - take part in a battle for a small industrial plot in the center of Kamurocho.

item.title: Chasm
item.description: Game Description Chasm is an adventure game where the player takes on the role of a new recruit on his first mission. The main character is in the Guild Kingdom, he has to prove his worth as a knight. First you need to track down strange rumors that say that a very important mine for the entire Kingdom is closed. Upon arrival in the mining town, the hero discovers news much worse than what he heard from ordinary townspeople.

item.title: Super Destronaut DX
item.description: Game Description Super Destronaut DX puts the player under the control of one ship at the base of the screen, opposing the ordered waves of alien vessels descending the system. The gameplay consists of horizontal movement and firing up - a structure borrowed from classic arcade shoot ‘Em Up. Success is measured not only with survival, but also by a continuous set of glasses with multiple for the effective destruction of enemy columns.

item.title: The Crew 2
item.description: Game Description In The Crew 2 you can ride anything, as long as you have money for this equipment. The game includes several game modes in the genre of a sports racing simulator from a third/first person: free, cooperative, career, multiplayer mode. A free race usually takes place on a separate map. We choose one unlocked vehicle element and try to win the race. In this simulator you can sail on a boat, drive a fast, high-speed car, or fly on an airplane.

item.title: Lust for Darkness
item.description: Game Description Lust for Darkness is a horror adventure with elements of erotica and psychological thriller. Immerse yourself in the exciting, twisted worlds of a Victorian mansion and the otherworldly dimension of Lusst’ghaa. The plot begins with the disappearance of the wife of the protagonist, Jonathan Moon, who, having received the letter, immediately goes in search of his loved one. Arriving at the area, you will find suspicious and half-naked individuals.

item.title: Just Shapes & Beats
item.description: Game Description Just Shapes & Beats offers gameplay based on the sound of music and beats. The difficulty level of the game depends on the rhythm of the soundtrack. The user takes control of a blue square; Many difficulties await him ahead. In the process, the hero is helped by friends, with whom he fights enemies. The game supports online and local co-op with 4 players in Story Mode and Challenge Runs.

item.title: DARK SOULS: REMASTERED
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS: REMASTERED is an already iconic Japanese action/RPG released in 2011. The development was carried out by From Software. A remastered version was released in May 2018 at the instigation of QLOC. So, what are the acclaimed “Dark Souls”? Firstly, this is a high-quality action RPG, with a third-person view. At the very beginning, you will need to set a number of characteristics for your character: appearance and class.

item.title: FAR: Lone Sails
item.description: Game Description A simulator of controlling a unique ship in a platformer - FAR: Lone Sails - allows you to explore all the land on Earth after the apocalypse. The plot tells very little about the ship itself, but we understand that the owner of the ship several times cut out, changed, and improved the ship so that it could travel unhindered through the desert. The gameplay consists of us moving the ship around locations, but not forgetting about the character inside it.

item.title: Hyperspace Dogfights
item.description: Game Description Hyperspace Dogfights is a two -dimensional horned focused on jet battles. It is necessary to break through through the waves of opponents, using acceleration to bypass threats, as well as gravity for occupying a profitable position. A special hyperople-decline helps to fly through dense fire. Each departure becomes unique thanks to the collection and installation of more than 300 items that modify the characteristics of the fighter, which allows you to create unlike each other assemblies.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Basingstoke
item.description: Game Description Basingstoke is an action-adventure roguelike with stealth elements that is used in specific locations to achieve a goal set by the developers from a small indie team. The arcade controls and fast-paced gameplay work well together to entice more people to try Basingstoke. The gamer will have to explore the ruins of the fictional world of the same name, created specifically based on the real Great Britain. The universe is inhabited by giant hordes of monsters and ravaged by alien invasions, which has had a detrimental effect on the prospects for further growth of the local inhabitants.

item.title: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition is a fantasy role-playing game, an improved version of the original part. The player will move into a surreal world in which there has been a war for a long time between the forces of Light and Darkness. Take control of a dwarven paladin, half-elven thief, gnome sorcerer, or other race. Each class has a unique branch of abilities, its own weapons and storyline.

item.title: Far Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Finally, the plot ofFar Cry 5 has reached America. Crazed fanatics unleashed their might on the state of Montana. A first-person shooter with action elements brings us to a reality in which even the movements of dogs will be more than real. The modernization of the shooter took several years, so the development studio warns us in advance that the game is based on religious motives. Age limit: 18+.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: The Void Rains Upon Her Heart
item.description: Game Description The Void Rains Upon Her Heart shows what can happen when you mix the bullet hell and roguelike genres. The title uses the boss rush concept. That is, it focuses on boss battles. There are no battles with ordinary opponents here. The Void Rains Upon Her Heart is a horizontal scrolling shooter with an interesting duel system. The game contains 60 leaders. With each new run, a certain number of bosses are randomly selected from the general list.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot ofKingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: DRAGON BALL FighterZ
item.description: Game Description A good, juicy anime fighting game with the Tag Team system - DRAGON BALL FighterZ - takes us on a fascinating journey through the beautiful animation of the fight itself, where “press all the buttons at once” and “use according to your abilities” are practically the same thing. The gameplay of the fighting game is, on the one hand, incredibly simple, but on the other hand, difficult and interesting if you play by the rules.

item.title: Celeste
item.description: Game Description Madeline must climbCeleste . No one knows why she needs this, but the characters around her gradually reveal this secret to us. The game is a complex platformer that combines a storyline, pixel graphics, character leveling and aspects of human existence buried in dialogue scripts. The heroine will fight with ghosts in abandoned cities, with her demons while she walks into the wasteland; will explore the secret corners of his soul while learning a new location and ways to climb the mountain more painlessly.

item.title: Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands
item.description: Game Description In Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands, the player follows the trip of the Elf of the Rinna, which goes to the title territory. Its main goal is to complete the complex task created by the goddess Illeria, in order to ultimately become the chosen champion of this deity. The sacred lands obey one special rule: the entrance to this territory is voluntary, but the exit is given only after the complete passage of the test from the goddess.

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Game Description In the world ofSubnautica, your ship has crashed in an oceanic area, and there is only one straight line - down to the bottom. The landscapes around you are illuminated by the sun, the coral reefs shimmer beautifully under the sun as you slowly sink towards the endless darkness of space. Exploring a huge open world allows you not only to plunge under the water and look at the inhabitants of this ocean, but also to build your own underwater base there and build a research center on it.

item.title: StationEers
item.description: Game Description Stationeers will transfer the player to outer space, in which it is necessary to control the space station alone or with other participants. You will follow all aspects of the station. Manage and deal with complex atmospheric, electric, production, medical and other equally important technologies inside a large room. You will need to correctly build mechanisms and other objects to create a beautiful architecture, and also not to die due to a lack of oxygen or an excess of electricity.

item.title: CarX Drift Racing Online
item.description: Game Description Arcade car simulatorCarX Drift Racing Online is a new word in the world of racing, where the main component is drifting! From the very beginning, you will have a huge number of opportunities that you can use in the world of real graphics and pumping up cars with modifications from famous manufacturers. From the first to the last minute in the game you will be able to upgrade your car so that it becomes a world prize-winner in the world of drifting!

item.title: Hand of Fate 2
item.description: Game Description A role-playing game using card strategies - Hand of Fate 2 is a lot of beautiful battles, partially drawn by hand; This is a completely random combat system where your enemies will become stronger, and you will rely on luck to give you a new weapon. A typical dark fantasy dungeon crawl, this card game features a random drop system. Those cards that you were able to pick up in battle will be randomly given to you before the next one.

item.title: Call of Duty: WW2
item.description: Game Description The events of the new part of Call of Duty: Wwii unfold during the Second World War. The developers again returned to the origins, adding to the old plot campaigns the schedule of our time, the gameplay of the last parts and the voice acting from the professional studio within the company. The basis of the plot is a landing in Normandy. The narrative of the European Theater of Acts of the Second World War begins with it.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Origins
item.description: Game Description The story of the third-person slasher is fully explored inAssassin’s Creed Origins. Only in this part we are told and described in detail how the brotherhood of Assassins was actually created, why the entire caste of killers hid for several hundred years, and how the principles of the brotherhood were formed. The plot begins with the fact that we kill one of the pharaohs who own an entire pyramid, hundreds of subjects and countless hired killers.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description The action takes place in the fictional world of the writer Tolkien. The Middle Lands are full of adventures for our player, so the plot unfolds from half of them. Events introduce us to the continuation of the previous part. Talion and Celebrimbor forge a new ring, which Sauron does not know about - he will not be able to influence it. The new ring carries with it another responsibility: inMiddle-earth: Shadow of War, Celebrimbor loses his freedom in exchange for a new One Ring.

item.title: A Hat in Time
item.description: Game Description In the 3D platformerA Hat in Time we will have to play as a girl who both looks and is called Hat Girl. She goes on an interplanetary journey to return home, but ends up in the city of the Mafia. At this location, a Mafioso gets into our ship and completely inspects the ship, but after checking, he scatters “time particles”, and then spreads them throughout the entire Mafia planet.

item.title: Cuphead
item.description: Game Description InCuphead we choose one of two heroes and set off to conquer a world that looks like very old cartoons, with tons of weapons, special moves and immortality. A classic, in the truest sense of the word, platformer, in which everything is set in the world of the 1930s. The music is jazz accompaniment, the graphics are standard Disney of the time, and the bosses are neither good nor evil.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2
item.description: Game Description Total War: WARHAMMER 2 is a turn-based strategy that invites you to immerse yourself in the gloomy campaign of the New World. The gameplay is highlighted by large-scale battles between six races. Enter the battlefield to save or destroy the world. Total War Warhammer 2 consists of two parts: a turn-based campaign in the open world and tactical battles in real time. Play both in single mode and take part in multiplayer battles.

item.title: Escape from Tarkov
item.description: Game Description Escape from Tarkov, a first -ized shooter with the first person with RPG and MMO elements, is one of the few games in which the plot is transmitted on the basis of a fictional conflict, but real interests. On the territory of Tarkov, in the Norvinsky region, there is a war between the soldiers of the USEC and Bear. Our hero is a simple soldier who is trying to get out of Tarkov at all costs, but for this he has to get acquainted with the same survivors after the conflict, try to survive and grab something valuable with him.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world ofARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous. The game does not have any interesting plot, but there is a huge open world in which you have to build your base, hunt with a group of people (your friends), attack, defend, make weapons and explore the area. This is a full-fledged survival simulator from the first person (possibly from the 3rd person), where survival is limited to a base with a fire.

item.title: VTOL VR
item.description: Game Description VTOL VR is a military flight simulator with a first-person view and in the surroundings of the near future. The game requires a VR headset and a motion controller. The title allows you to freely rotate your head while sitting in the virtual cockpit. Modes include training, campaign and free flight. There are a lot of tasks here. In addition to other aircraft, ships, tanks, anti-aircraft and artillery installations act as opponents and allies.

item.title: Aztez
item.description: Game Description Aztez is a 2D beat-em-up set in the Aztec Empire. You control an elite unit who is carrying out an important mission on behalf of the Emperor. There are many human warriors and mythical creatures standing in your way. The visual style is presented in black and white, where only the blood of enemies clearly stands out in red. Aztez’s gameplay includes turn-based strategy elements. A global map is available where you lead an entire squad of fighters.

item.title: Slime Rancher
item.description: Game Description A funny open-world first-person shooter -Slime Rancher is a mixture of genres in one complex picture, which the developers called - Boundless Outland. We plunge into a special experimental environment. Our hero’s name is Beatrix LeBeau, and he is a farmer. Armed with courage, madness and a funny vacuum cleaner, he decides to stay on the planet of the Boundless Outlands, because a certain Hobson Twillgers left us his farm.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered - reprinting the popular game about hostilities in the hot spots of the planet. Now the gamers have the opportunity to go through the familiar episodes “Everything in camouflage”, “Charlie is not a surf”, “Permission to eliminate the crew” only with improved textures, a more clear picture, which is extremely close to reality by physics, overwritten sound and other technologies of our time.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: Unturned
item.description: Game Description Unturned combines a zombie-player and a sandbox with survival elements. In the single, the user studies locations, destroys the undead, looking for a useful lutus. In the multiplayer, the user is engaged in about the same, but also fights with living opponents. There is also a separate regime of the royal battle. Players who kill other gamers for no reason become bandits. You can become a hero, having taken up the shooting of criminals.

item.title: Colony Survival
item.description: Game Description Colony Survival is a unique first-person sandbox strategy game developed by a team of just two people! Build your own colony in the open world. Command guardsmen, farmers, miners and other colonists. Protect your colony from monsters that raid every night! Build bridges, tunnels, stairs and underground passages to make sure your colonists get where they want to go and the monsters don’t! As your colony grows, the number of monsters around will also increase.

item.title: NEKO Navy
item.description: Game Description In Neko Navy, gamers are taken under the management of flying cats, opposing a whole army of various opponents. The main conflict of this scroll-player is unfolding at seven dynamic levels with horizontal scrolling, filled with continuous air battles. Six unique cat pilots are available to choose from, each of which acts as an avatar of the player and has its own characteristics. The storyline consistently leads to a special final event designed to resolve the main intrigue and complete the main story.

item.title: Star of Providence
item.description: Game Description Star of Providence is a vertical scroller, the actions of which take place in procedurally generated locations, where obstacles, traps and enemy locations are also randomly created. You will have to explore the huge abandoned Monolith complex to find the source of ancient power. Get new weapons, upgrade your shuttle and fight a huge number of enemies. Having descended into the depths of the underground complex, it is necessary not only to find the source of powerful power, but also to find fragments of one’s past.

item.title: TEKKEN 7
item.description: Game Description TEKKEN 7 is a side-scrolling 3D fighting game that tells the true story of the Mishima clan’s feud. In the storyline we learn why Heitachi killed his wife, for what reasons Kazuya Mishima survived. The basis of the game’s action is a fighting game based on love, family relationships with friendly fights. Each battle in Tekken 7 is a separate branch in the plot, so after the end of the battle (victory in it), we see a small interactive video of the creation of the entire universe, Kazuya growing up, and the formation of the Mishima clan.

item.title: Friday the 13th: The Game
item.description: Game Description Friday The 13th: The Game is a horror with a third -person view, where the player will test the role of the victim or become a maniac. 7 people try to survive and escape from Jason Wurchis. The game takes place in a small town near the forest. You can hide in houses, hide in the foliage, but the inexorable killer will still overtake you. The main goal is to get out of the damned place by leading the engine of the car or calling the police.

item.title: Endless Space 2
item.description: Game Description In addition to the RTS filling, the developers added the ability to move to Endless Space 2, as was done in the same Civilization. And this choice is quite worthy. You are a worthy ruler of your people. People will not ask for constant improvements, but the senate you created requires the gradual adoption of new laws. Engineers cannot sit without work, and the army gradually refuses to fight if no one trains and trains the soldiers.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooterRavenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Little Nightmares
item.description: Game Description Little Six is ​​a girl who was brought on board the ship as a servant. She, like many nomes - the characters of the game - hides her face for unknown reasons. In the game we have to get out from the lowest sector to the upper decks, but the levels will not immediately allow us to do this. First, the player needs to know that sinister hands will always hunt for us.

item.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact that Bendy and the Ink Machine is a horror game with quite interesting graphics that keep you in the atmosphere even after beating the game, the developers manage to create a plot and a general feeling of fear through non-standard decisions regarding scares. We play as Henry Stein, who used to work as a cartoonist. One day he receives an invitation to the studio where he has been working for the last few years.

item.title: Rain World
item.description: Game Description Rain World is a conceptually original indie video game created by just 4 people. Brings something new to the platformer genre, focusing on hardcore. You take control of an unusual creature - a slugcat. He had not yet grown up, and always lived under the supervision of adults. But an unfortunate incident occurs, and the protagonist ends up in the industrial areas of the city, where his race obtains provisions.

item.title: NieR: Automata
item.description: Game Description An open-world action-adventure game,NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 as they battle a dystopia created by powerful machines. All of humanity was evicted from their planet by mechanical creatures that arrived from another world. In an attempt to retake the Earth from aliens, people send combat robots to somehow resist the invaders. This must be the final attempt, the last hope to get your home back.

item.title: Revhead
item.description: Game Description In the REVHEAD car racing simulator, the user will have to design his own car. The protagonist has a friend named Charlie who is well versed in creating cars. He invites the central character to Australia to help him with something. It will be necessary to win the competition and get recognition from Charlie, then it will create improved transport. There is an opportunity to sell and buy cars, as well as trade in various details and customization items.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part -Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: Hollow Knight
item.description: Game Description The classic action-platformer gives us several hours of exciting travel into underground cities to creatures that have only guarded wealth for the last thousand years, being possessed by it. Our hero inHollow Knight is one of those who believe in legends. He goes to the dungeons under Mudmouth to gain riches, fame, general respect and popularity among the knights who did not gather the strength to descend, but will it really be so?

item.title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is a survival horror game that continues the famous series of games, one of the founders of the genre. The release is timed to coincide with the twentieth anniversary of the universe. An option is available to play using a virtual reality helmet and control of special complete controllers from VR glasses. The seventh part was a return to the roots of the first games in the series, because, unlike parts 5 and 6, which were focused on action, shooting and the plot taking place in different parts of the world, this project has the main location in the form of a small estate of the Baker family, which gives the atmosphere is claustrophobic and increases the degree of fear.

item.title: Arcade saga
item.description: Game Description Arcade Saga throws the player in the position of newfound artificial intelligence. This essence should fight for survival against the overlords of AI who seek to destroy its independent thinking. The struggle for freedom from digital slavery takes place in three different futuristic sports. To succeed, it is necessary to use a quick reaction and apply strategic thinking to deceive the hostile forces of the system and overcome the established obstacles.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Space Cat
item.description: Game Description Space Cat sends a cat to a changeable asteroid field with the main task of collecting production. Players have to collect precious stones, coins and diamonds, moving in a dangerous environment. The area itself is constantly transformed: rockets destroy its areas, and the ULO is restored, requiring an instant reaction for survival. The difficulty level is adjusted - you can turn on or disable individual threats before the start, as well as change the parameters of the character.

item.title: Killing Floor 2
item.description: Game Description A cooperative first-person shooter in which there are only two modes - survival and battle in the territory. Killing Floor 2 does not have a plot, but there is sharp FPS on several maps, where each player chooses the desired role for himself - a zombie or a department fighting an epidemic. In addition to the fact that the gameplay differs on both sides of the barricades, players can buy additional weapons, make skins and show who can stand up best on the map.

item.title: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2
item.description: Game Description DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 is a fighting game with RPG and MMO elements. The project is designed for fans of the Dragon Ball universe, consisting of manga, anime, films and other video games. The sequel brought few changes to the series. The developers have improved graphics and network code. Many techniques moved from the first part to the second and were diluted with new options. DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 has many familiar characters: Goku, Krillin, Gohan, Vegeta, Trunks, Nappa, Kid Buu, Great Saiyaman, Tien, Piccolo, Goten, Zarbon, Jaco, Yamcha, Hit, Raditz, Lord Slug, Videl, Cell, Broly, Mira, Gogeta, Janemba, Gotenks, Whis, Towa, Pan, Omega Shenron and others.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Special Edition
item.description: Game Description Skyrim has become one of the favorite games on two continents of our planet. The first/third person slasher captivated players not only with its open-world RPG content, but also with its graphics, sounds, characters, features, and, of course, dragons. Our character inThe Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition begins the same story, but you immediately notice that everything around him is completely different. If in the original version of the game we move along a snowy road, now the colors of the autumn forest prevail, maintaining the same atmosphere.

item.title: Titanfall 2
item.description: Game Description Titanfall 2 is a first-person shooter in a fantasy future setting. Continuation of the first game, released in 2014. In this part, in addition to online battles, there is a single-player campaign about Jack Cooper, a soldier who does not have his own titanium, but wants to get it. At the center of the story is the conflict between the militia, assembled from the common people, and the giant corporation IMC.

item.title: Battlefield 1
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 1 is a first-person shooter in the setting of the First World War. The game is the 15th in the series of the same name. The plot is divided into five chapters and begins with a prologue. The story takes place in 1918 and is told from the perspective of tankman Daniel Edwards, who controls the Black Bass tank. Before the war, he was an ordinary driver, but now he has to break through the German line.

item.title: Super Destronaut
item.description: Game Description Super Destronaut puts a player at the head of one warship, opposing built alien invaders built. Gamers control their horizontal axis vessel in the lower part of the screen, which is a design borrowed from the Arcadian shooters of the 1980s. The main task is to methodically disassemble the waves of opponents, descending along the specified trajectories, where each eliminated enemy replenishes the general account. During clashes, defeated aliens can leave temporary amplifiers that directly increase the rate of fire or scatter of shells, providing a tactical advantage for cleaning the battlefield.

item.title: N++ (NPLUSPLUS)
item.description: Game Description N++ (NPLUSPLUS) is a dynamic indie platformer, each level of which is built using the simplest graphics possible, using many shades to create a memorable picture. The gamer is given a side view of a two-dimensional space, through which it is necessary to move a small man, shown schematically. The project uses the player’s skills to correctly and quickly assess the environment to make the most correct decisions. To perform precise and complex jumps, gamers will need skill and experience in this genre of video game entertainment.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers ofNo Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: Human: Fall Flat
item.description: Game Description Human: Fall Flat is an adventure puzzle game with amazing physics and engine. Take control of Bob, who every time has a dream from which he must find a way out. Usually such dreams are accompanied by colorful locations in which he needs to get to a certain point and solve many difficult problems. Explore the open world in your own way. Climb any building, rock, tree or other object, going through the same place differently each time.

item.title: Starbound
item.description: Game Description Starbound is a 2D side-scrolling indie RPG adventure with graphics that reference the classic 8-bit titles of the last century. The project has become widespread thanks to the ability to play with a friend in co-op mode on different platforms, as well as a well-developed system of achievements and rewards that motivate you to improve your own skills and collect all kinds of items for crafting and collecting. The surrounding world is presented in the form of open territories, where there are no prohibitions on colonizing unknown planets or performing secondary tasks; you can even not touch the story campaign at all.

item.title: Death Road to Canada
item.description: Game Description Death Road to Canada is a zombie apocalypse game. It differs from other projects on this topic in its gameplay and humor. It’s a mixture of beat ‘em up and roguelike. The premise here is simple: in the USA, the dead began to rise from their graves and eat living people. After which their victims were also resurrected. The remainder of the population decided to move to Canada because this country was not affected by the epidemic.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: INSIDE
item.description: Game Description A side-view platformer -INSIDE - tells the story of a small and unarmed boy who, through an unknown means, ended up in a closed, scary space. The physics of the game and the gameplay invite us to go through the platformer to the last level with a lot of deaths, puzzles, solving difficult problems and good visuals, combined with the atmosphere and the usual soundtrack. The death of our hero is an endlessly scary animation.

item.title: Dead by Daylight
item.description: Game Description Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical cooperative horror game inspired by youth slashers. The story centers on four survivors facing off against a fifth player who controls a bloodthirsty maniac. The defending team’s job is to do everything possible to ensure they aren’t dead by dawn. Finding yourself in the same location with the killer, you need to use the environment and interact with your partners, trying to resist the monster.

item.title: Hearts of Iron 4
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact thatHearts of Iron 4 is famous for its realism, the new part has completely redesigned the focus tree for individual countries and nationalities. The strategy, dedicated to the Second World War, invites you to play in countries such as Italy, Ethiopia, Spain, Japan and China. Two scenarios that differ in their dates: 1936 and 1939. In one of them you will take part in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War and the Spanish Civil War, and in the second you will see how Japan invaded China, and the Second World War was fought.

item.title: Planet Centauri
item.description: Game Description Planet Centauri is a sandbox with action RPG elements, made in 2D style. Unlike other games of this genre, Planet Centauri starts with a really well-developed character editor: the player can choose from a wide range of not only different clothes, but also unique appearance features. There are two modes available in Planet Centauri: story mode and free mode. The goal of the protagonist in both cases is to grow a new civilization on the planet Centauri from scratch.

item.title: DOOM (2016)
item.description: Game Description DOOM 2016, unlike DOOM Ethernal, has less dynamics, but is more related to the horror genre. We can say that it began the evolution of the series towards speed and platforming, and it is considered closer in spirit to the series than its brother released in 2020. It was the first step towards a global rethinking of the franchise. The game takes place inside the corridors of a giant research complex.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofDARK SOULS 3 provides all the same opportunities that were in the second part. For us, a third-person slasher with elements of stealth and survival remained at the same level in terms of combat, but the entire combat system was made more dynamic. So much so that sometimes we don’t have time to jump away to recharge our skill, and they already kill us. The real hassle and face of the game genre is difficulty at every turn.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description InEnter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn inGrim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following provides the players with an extensive game world, a large arsenal of weapons, modifications, secondary and plot tasks, as well as dozens of gameplay hours. Visit in the post-apocalyptic world, teeming zombies and other bloodthirsty creatures in the action of the first person. Pour blood in epic battles! Use dozens of ways to kill zombies, as well as interact with surrounding objects that allow the enemies to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task inRise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4
item.description: Game Description Familiar to many fans of the Naruto series,NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 transcends the fighting game genre, taking the game to the next level. In the final part, we will find out who will win in the confrontation between Naruto and Sasuke. We will learn a lot of details about the 4th Shinobi War, and also go over some aspects of the anime that were missed in previous parts.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning ofXCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER – third-person survival horror, re-released with new, higher-quality texture resolution and improved animation and lighting. A “Wesker Mode” with another playable character has also been added. The number zero in the title means that the story told in this part is a prequel to the first part of the legendary series, which spawned many projects in a single universe and created a real fashion for zombies and horror films with elements of survival.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives.
